sqlMap.select:
select t.BAAPPBASEID, t.APNO, t.SEQNO, t.APITEM, t.APPDATE, t.EVTIDNNO, t.EVTNAME, t.EVTBRDATE, t.EVTJOBDATE, t.PAYKIND, t.PAYTYP, t.BENIDNNO, t.BENNAME, t.BENEVTREL, t.COMMZIP, t.COMMADDR, t.PAYBANKID, t.BRANCHID, t.PAYEEACC, t.CHKPAYBANKID, t.CHKBRANCHID, t.CHKPAYEEACC, t.BENDIEDATE, t.EVTJOBDATE, t.REGETCIPBMK, t.SPECIALACC, t.SPEACCDATE from BAAPPBASE t
1 = 0
t.EVTIDNNO = #evtIdnNo:VARCHAR#
t.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
t.SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR#
t.PROCSTAT = #procStat:VARCHAR#
t.PROCSTAT in
t.PROCSTAT not in
#procStat[]#
t.APNO LIKE #payKind#||'%'
order by t.BAAPPBASEID

SELECT A.APNO FROM BAAPPBASE A
1 = 0
A.APNO >= #apNoBegin:VARCHAR#
A.APNO <= #apNoEnd:VARCHAR#
AND SEQNO = '0000' AND (A.CASEMK <> 'D' OR A.CASEMK IS NULL) AND A.BENPAYMK = '1' AND SUBSTR(A.APNO, 1, 1) = 'L' AND A.ISSUYM IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY A.APNO

SELECT A.BAAPPBASEID, A.APNO, A.SEQNO, A.IMK, A.APITEM, A.PAYKIND, A.APPDATE, A.CASETYP, A.MAPNO, A.MAPROOTMK, A.COMBAPMARK, A.CASEMK, A.PROCSTAT, A.ACCEPTMK, A.MANCHKMK, A.CHGNOTE, A.EXESTAT, A.APUBNO, A.APUBNOCK, A.LSUBNO, A.LSUBNOCK, A.EVTIDS, A.EVTIDNNO, A.EVTNAME, A.EVTBRDATE, A.EVTSEX, A.EVTNATIONTPE, A.EVTNATIONCODE, A.EVTIDENT, A.EVTJOBDATE, A.EVTDATE, A.EVTDIEDATE, A.EVTAGE, A.BENIDS, A.BENIDNNO, A.BENNAME, A.BENBRDATE, A.BENSEX, A.BENNATIONTYP, A.BENNATIONCODE, A.BENEVTREL, A.BENDIEDATE, A.BENPAYMK, A.IDNCHKYM, A.IDNCHKNOTE, A.TEL1, A.TEL2, A.COMMTYP, A.COMMZIP, A.COMMADDR, A.PAYTYP, A.BANKNAME, A.PAYBANKID, A.BRANCHID, A.PAYEEACC, A.CHKPAYBANKID, A.CHKBRANCHID, A.CHKPAYEEACC, A.ACCIDN, A.ACCNAME, A.ACCREL, A.MITRATE, A.GRDIDNNO, A.GRDNAME, A.GRDBRDATE, A.ASSIGNIDNNO, A.ASSIGNNAME, A.ASSIGNBRDATE, A.ISSUYM, A.PAYYM, A.ISSUEAMT, A.ONCEPAYMK, A.OLDSENIAB, A.MUSTISSUEAMT, A.PAYDATE, A.PAYYMS, A.PAYYME, A.PAUSEYM, A.UNPAUSEYM, A.NOTIFYFORM, A.LOANMK, A.MEXCLVL, A.REALEXCLVL, A.CHKDATE, A.CHKMAN, A.RECHKDATE, A.RECHKMAN, A.EXEDATE, A.EXEMAN, A.ARCDATE, A.ARCPG, A.CLOSEDATE, A.CLOSECAUSE, A.PROMOTEUSER, A.DUPEIDNNOMK, A.CRTUSER, A.CRTTIME, A.UPDUSER, A.UPDTIME, A.EVTEXPIREDATE, A.EVTELIGIBLEDATE, A.EVTMISSINGDATE, A.LSINSMAMT, A.LSCHKMK, A.LSCOUNT, A.LNCHKMK, A.DABAPNO, A.DABANNUAMT, A.RESENIMK, A.OFFINSURDATE, A.LAWRETIREDATE, A.EVTAPPNAME, A.CUTAMT, A.ACCSEQNO, A.BENMARRMK, A.CHGMK, A.PAYAMTS, A.EVTAPPIDNNO, A.EVTAPPBRDATE, A.OLDAPLDPT, A.CHOICEYM, A.MOBILEPHONE, A.ANNUAMT, A.INTERVALMONTH, A.SPECIALACC, A.SPEACCDATE, A.UNQUALIFIEDCAUSE, A.ISSUNOTIFYINGMK, A.EVTJOBAGE, A.SAMTY, A.SAMTD, A.ONCETY, A.ONCEPAYM, A.CHECKIN, NVL(A.ONCEISSUEAMT,0) AS ONCEISSUEAMT, NVL(A.MARGINAMT,0) AS MARGINAMT FROM BAAPPBASE A
1 = 0
A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
A.SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR#
A.SEQNO < #seqNo:VARCHAR#
A.SEQNO <= #seqNo:VARCHAR#
A.SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR#
A.SEQNO >= #seqNo:VARCHAR#
A.SEQNO > #seqNo:VARCHAR#
A.SEQNO != #seqNo:VARCHAR#
AND (A.CASEMK <> 'D' OR A.CASEMK IS NULL) AND A.BENPAYMK = '1' AND SUBSTR(A.APNO, 1, 1) = 'L' AND A.ISSUYM IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY A.APNO, A.SEQNO

SELECT A.BAAPPBASEID, A.APNO, A.SEQNO, A.IMK, A.APITEM, A.PAYKIND, A.APPDATE, A.CASETYP, A.MAPNO, A.MAPROOTMK, A.COMBAPMARK, A.CASEMK, A.PROCSTAT, A.ACCEPTMK, A.MANCHKMK, A.CHGNOTE, A.EXESTAT, A.APUBNO, A.APUBNOCK, A.LSUBNO, A.LSUBNOCK, A.EVTIDS, A.EVTIDNNO, A.EVTNAME, A.EVTBRDATE, A.EVTSEX, A.EVTNATIONTPE, A.EVTNATIONCODE, A.EVTIDENT, A.EVTJOBDATE, A.EVTDATE, A.EVTDIEDATE, A.EVTAGE, A.BENIDS, A.BENIDNNO, A.BENNAME, A.BENBRDATE, A.BENSEX, A.BENNATIONTYP, A.BENNATIONCODE, A.BENEVTREL, A.BENDIEDATE, A.BENPAYMK, A.IDNCHKYM, A.IDNCHKNOTE, A.TEL1, A.TEL2, A.COMMTYP, A.COMMZIP, A.COMMADDR, A.PAYTYP, A.BANKNAME, A.PAYBANKID, A.BRANCHID, A.PAYEEACC, A.CHKPAYBANKID, A.CHKBRANCHID, A.CHKPAYEEACC, A.ACCIDN, A.ACCNAME, A.ACCREL, A.MITRATE, A.GRDIDNNO, A.GRDNAME, A.GRDBRDATE, A.ASSIGNIDNNO, A.ASSIGNNAME, A.ASSIGNBRDATE, A.ISSUYM, A.PAYYM, A.ISSUEAMT, A.ONCEPAYMK, A.OLDSENIAB, A.MUSTISSUEAMT, A.PAYDATE, A.PAYYMS, A.PAYYME, A.PAUSEYM, A.UNPAUSEYM, A.NOTIFYFORM, A.LOANMK, A.MEXCLVL, A.REALEXCLVL, A.CHKDATE, A.CHKMAN, A.RECHKDATE, A.RECHKMAN, A.EXEDATE, A.EXEMAN, A.ARCDATE, A.ARCPG, A.CLOSEDATE, A.CLOSECAUSE, A.PROMOTEUSER, A.DUPEIDNNOMK, A.CRTUSER, A.CRTTIME, A.UPDUSER, A.UPDTIME, A.EVTEXPIREDATE, A.EVTELIGIBLEDATE, A.EVTMISSINGDATE, A.LSINSMAMT, A.LSCHKMK, A.LSCOUNT, A.LNCHKMK, A.DABAPNO, A.DABANNUAMT, A.RESENIMK, A.OFFINSURDATE, A.LAWRETIREDATE, A.EVTAPPNAME, A.CUTAMT, A.ACCSEQNO, A.BENMARRMK, A.CHGMK, A.PAYAMTS, A.EVTAPPIDNNO, A.EVTAPPBRDATE, A.OLDAPLDPT, A.CHOICEYM, A.MOBILEPHONE, A.ANNUAMT, A.INTERVALMONTH, A.SPECIALACC, A.SPEACCDATE, A.UNQUALIFIEDCAUSE, A.ISSUNOTIFYINGMK, A.EVTJOBAGE, A.SAMTY, A.SAMTD, A.ONCETY, A.ONCEPAYM, A.ONCEISSUEAMT, A.MARGINAMT FROM BAAPPBASE A WHERE A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND A.SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR#

SELECT A.BAAPPBASEID, A.APNO, A.SEQNO, A.IMK, A.APITEM, A.PAYKIND, A.APPDATE, A.CASETYP, A.MAPNO, A.MAPROOTMK, A.COMBAPMARK, A.CASEMK, A.PROCSTAT, A.ACCEPTMK, A.MANCHKMK, A.CHGNOTE, A.EXESTAT, A.APUBNO, A.APUBNOCK, A.LSUBNO, A.LSUBNOCK, A.EVTIDS, A.EVTIDNNO, A.EVTNAME, A.EVTBRDATE, A.EVTSEX, A.EVTNATIONTPE, A.EVTNATIONCODE, A.EVTIDENT, A.EVTJOBDATE, A.EVTDATE, A.EVTDIEDATE, A.EVTAGE, A.BENIDS, A.BENIDNNO, A.BENNAME, A.BENBRDATE, A.BENSEX, A.BENNATIONTYP, A.BENNATIONCODE, A.BENEVTREL, A.BENDIEDATE, A.BENPAYMK, A.IDNCHKYM, A.IDNCHKNOTE, A.TEL1, A.TEL2, A.COMMTYP, A.COMMZIP, A.COMMADDR, A.PAYTYP, A.BANKNAME, A.PAYBANKID, A.BRANCHID, A.PAYEEACC, A.CHKPAYBANKID, A.CHKBRANCHID, A.CHKPAYEEACC, A.ACCIDN, A.ACCNAME, A.ACCREL, A.MITRATE, A.GRDIDNNO, A.GRDNAME, A.GRDBRDATE, A.ASSIGNIDNNO, A.ASSIGNNAME, A.ASSIGNBRDATE, A.ISSUYM, A.PAYYM, A.ISSUEAMT, A.ONCEPAYMK, A.OLDSENIAB, A.MUSTISSUEAMT, A.PAYDATE, A.PAYYMS, A.PAYYME, A.PAUSEYM, A.UNPAUSEYM, A.NOTIFYFORM, A.LOANMK, A.MEXCLVL, A.REALEXCLVL, A.CHKDATE, A.CHKMAN, A.RECHKDATE, A.RECHKMAN, DECODE(A.CASETYP, '3', A.EXEDATE) AS EXEDATE, A.EXEMAN, A.ARCDATE, A.ARCPG, A.CLOSEDATE, A.CLOSECAUSE, A.PROMOTEUSER, A.DUPEIDNNOMK, A.CRTUSER, A.CRTTIME, A.UPDUSER, A.UPDTIME, A.EVTEXPIREDATE, A.EVTELIGIBLEDATE, A.EVTMISSINGDATE, A.LSINSMAMT, A.LSCHKMK, A.LSCOUNT, A.LNCHKMK, A.DABAPNO, A.DABANNUAMT, A.RESENIMK, A.OFFINSURDATE, A.LAWRETIREDATE, A.EVTAPPNAME, A.CUTAMT, A.ACCSEQNO, A.BENMARRMK, A.CHGMK, A.PAYAMTS, A.EVTAPPIDNNO, A.EVTAPPBRDATE, A.OLDAPLDPT, A.CHOICEYM, A.MOBILEPHONE, A.ANNUAMT, A.INTERVALMONTH, A.SPECIALACC, A.SPEACCDATE, A.UNQUALIFIEDCAUSE, A.ISSUNOTIFYINGMK, A.EVTJOBAGE, A.SAMTY, A.SAMTD, A.ONCETY, A.ONCEPAYM, A.ONCEISSUEAMT, A.MARGINAMT FROM BAAPPBASE A
1 = 0
A.APNO <> #apNo:VARCHAR#
A.EVTIDNNO = #evtIdnNo:VARCHAR#
A.EVTBRDATE = #evtBrDate:VARCHAR#
AND (A.CASEMK <> 'D' OR A.CASEMK IS NULL) AND A.BENPAYMK = '1' AND SUBSTR(A.APNO, 1, 1) = 'L' AND A.SEQNO = '0000'

SELECT A.BENNAME FROM BAAPPBASE A
1 = 0
A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
A.SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR#

SELECT A.EVTNAME, A.APPDATE, A.APNO, A.EVTJOBDATE, A.CASETYP, A.PROCSTAT, A.CLOSEDATE, A.CLOSECAUSE, A.ISSUYM, A.PAYYM, A.ISSUEAMT, (C.CRIINJDP1||' '||C.CRIINJDP2||' '||C.CRIINJDP3||' '||C.CRIINJDP4||' '||C.CRIINJDP5||' '||C.CRIINJDP6||' '||C.CRIINJDP7||' '||C.CRIINJDP8||' '||C.CRIINJDP9||' '||C.CRIINJDP10) AS CRIINJDP, (C.CRIINJCL1||' '||C.CRIINJCL2||' '||C.CRIINJCL3) AS CRIINJCL, (SELECT PARAMNAME FROM BAPARAM WHERE PARAMGROUP = (SUBSTR(A.APNO,1,1)||'CLOSECAUSE') AND PARAMCODE = A.CLOSECAUSE) AS CLOSECAUSESTR FROM BAAPPBASE A, BAAPPEXPAND C WHERE A.EVTIDNNO = #evtIdnNo:VARCHAR# AND A.APNO = C.APNO(+) AND A.BAAPPBASEID = C.BAAPPBASEID(+) AND A.SEQNO = C.SEQNO(+)
AND A.APNO <> #apNo:VARCHAR#
AND A.SEQNO = '0000' AND SUBSTR(A.APNO,1,1) in ('K') ORDER BY A.ISSUYM, A.PAYYM

SELECT A.EVTNAME, A.APPDATE, A.APNO, A.ISSUYM, A.PAYYM, A.EVTJOBDATE, A.ISSUEAMT, A.CASETYP, A.PROCSTAT, A.CLOSEDATE, A.CLOSECAUSE, (SELECT PARAMNAME FROM BAPARAM WHERE PARAMGROUP = (SUBSTR(A.APNO,1,1)||'CLOSECAUSE') AND PARAMCODE = A.CLOSECAUSE) AS CLOSECAUSESTR FROM BAAPPBASE A WHERE A.EVTIDNNO = #evtIdnNo:VARCHAR# AND A.SEQNO = '0000' AND SUBSTR(A.APNO,1,1) = 'S'

SELECT A.BAAPPBASEID, A.APNO, A.SEQNO, A.IMK, A.APITEM, A.PAYKIND, A.APPDATE, A.CASETYP, A.MAPNO, A.MAPROOTMK, A.COMBAPMARK, A.CASEMK, A.PROCSTAT, A.ACCEPTMK, A.MANCHKMK, A.CHGNOTE, A.EXESTAT, A.APUBNO, A.APUBNOCK, A.LSUBNO, A.LSUBNOCK, A.EVTIDS, A.EVTIDNNO, A.EVTNAME, A.EVTBRDATE, A.EVTSEX, A.EVTNATIONTPE, A.EVTNATIONCODE, A.EVTIDENT, A.EVTJOBDATE, A.EVTDATE, A.EVTDIEDATE, A.EVTAGE, A.BENIDS, A.BENIDNNO, A.BENNAME, A.BENBRDATE, A.BENSEX, A.BENNATIONTYP, A.BENNATIONCODE, A.BENEVTREL, A.BENDIEDATE, A.BENPAYMK, A.IDNCHKYM, A.IDNCHKNOTE, A.TEL1, A.TEL2, A.COMMTYP, A.COMMZIP, A.COMMADDR, A.PAYTYP, A.BANKNAME, A.PAYBANKID, A.BRANCHID, A.PAYEEACC, A.CHKPAYBANKID, A.CHKBRANCHID, A.CHKPAYEEACC, A.ACCIDN, A.ACCNAME, A.ACCREL, A.MITRATE, A.GRDIDNNO, A.GRDNAME, A.GRDBRDATE, A.ASSIGNIDNNO, A.ASSIGNNAME, A.ASSIGNBRDATE, A.ISSUYM, A.PAYYM, A.ISSUEAMT, A.ONCEPAYMK, A.OLDSENIAB, A.MUSTISSUEAMT, A.PAYDATE, A.PAYYMS, A.PAYYME, A.PAUSEYM, A.UNPAUSEYM, A.NOTIFYFORM, A.LOANMK, A.MEXCLVL, A.REALEXCLVL, A.CHKDATE, A.CHKMAN, A.RECHKDATE, A.RECHKMAN, A.EXEDATE, A.EXEMAN, A.ARCDATE, A.ARCPG, A.CLOSEDATE, A.CLOSECAUSE, A.PROMOTEUSER, A.DUPEIDNNOMK, A.CRTUSER, A.CRTTIME, A.UPDUSER, A.UPDTIME, A.EVTEXPIREDATE, A.EVTELIGIBLEDATE, A.EVTMISSINGDATE, A.LSINSMAMT, A.LSCHKMK, A.LSCOUNT, A.LNCHKMK, A.DABAPNO, A.DABANNUAMT, A.RESENIMK, A.OFFINSURDATE, A.LAWRETIREDATE, A.EVTAPPNAME, A.CUTAMT, A.ACCSEQNO, A.BENMARRMK, A.CHGMK, A.PAYAMTS, A.EVTAPPIDNNO, A.EVTAPPBRDATE, A.OLDAPLDPT, A.CHOICEYM, A.MOBILEPHONE, A.ANNUAMT, A.INTERVALMONTH, A.SPECIALACC, A.SPEACCDATE, A.UNQUALIFIEDCAUSE, A.ISSUNOTIFYINGMK, A.EVTJOBAGE, A.SAMTY, A.SAMTD, A.ONCETY, A.ONCEPAYM, A.ONCEISSUEAMT, A.MARGINAMT FROM BAAPPBASE A
1 = 0
A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
AND A.SEQNO = '0000' AND A.LSCHKMK = '3'

A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#

A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
AND A.SEQNO = '0000' AND A.LSCOUNT > 0

SELECT A.BAAPPBASEID, A.APNO, A.SEQNO, A.IMK, A.APITEM, A.PAYKIND, A.APPDATE, A.CASETYP, A.MAPNO, A.MAPROOTMK, A.COMBAPMARK, A.CASEMK, A.PROCSTAT, A.ACCEPTMK, A.MANCHKMK, A.CHGNOTE, A.EXESTAT, A.APUBNO, A.APUBNOCK, A.LSUBNO, A.LSUBNOCK, A.EVTIDS, A.EVTIDNNO, A.EVTNAME, A.EVTBRDATE, A.EVTSEX, A.EVTNATIONTPE, A.EVTNATIONCODE, A.EVTIDENT, A.EVTJOBDATE, A.EVTDATE, A.EVTDIEDATE, A.EVTAGE, A.BENIDS, A.BENIDNNO, A.BENNAME, A.BENBRDATE, A.BENSEX, A.BENNATIONTYP, A.BENNATIONCODE, A.BENEVTREL, A.BENDIEDATE, A.BENPAYMK, A.IDNCHKYM, A.IDNCHKNOTE, A.TEL1, A.TEL2, A.COMMTYP, A.COMMZIP, A.COMMADDR, A.PAYTYP, A.BANKNAME, A.PAYBANKID, A.BRANCHID, A.PAYEEACC, A.CHKPAYBANKID, A.CHKBRANCHID, A.CHKPAYEEACC, A.ACCIDN, A.ACCNAME, A.ACCREL, A.MITRATE, A.GRDIDNNO, A.GRDNAME, A.GRDBRDATE, A.ASSIGNIDNNO, A.ASSIGNNAME, A.ASSIGNBRDATE, A.ISSUYM, A.PAYYM, A.ISSUEAMT, A.ONCEPAYMK, A.OLDSENIAB, A.MUSTISSUEAMT, A.PAYDATE, A.PAYYMS, A.PAYYME, A.PAUSEYM, A.UNPAUSEYM, A.NOTIFYFORM, A.LOANMK, A.MEXCLVL, A.REALEXCLVL, A.CHKDATE, A.CHKMAN, A.RECHKDATE, A.RECHKMAN, A.EXEDATE, A.EXEMAN, A.ARCDATE, A.ARCPG, A.CLOSEDATE, A.CLOSECAUSE, A.PROMOTEUSER, A.DUPEIDNNOMK, A.CRTUSER, A.CRTTIME, A.UPDUSER, A.UPDTIME, A.EVTEXPIREDATE, A.EVTELIGIBLEDATE, A.EVTMISSINGDATE, A.LSINSMAMT, A.LSCHKMK, A.LSCOUNT, A.LNCHKMK, A.DABAPNO, A.DABANNUAMT, A.RESENIMK, A.OFFINSURDATE, A.LAWRETIREDATE, A.EVTAPPNAME, A.CUTAMT, A.ACCSEQNO, A.BENMARRMK, A.CHGMK, A.PAYAMTS, A.EVTAPPIDNNO, A.EVTAPPBRDATE, A.OLDAPLDPT, A.CHOICEYM, A.MOBILEPHONE, A.ANNUAMT, A.INTERVALMONTH, (SELECT DISTINCT B.PRODATE FROM MAADMREC B WHERE B.APNO = A.APNO AND B.LETTERTYPE = '21'
AND nvl(trim(B.DELMK), ' ') <> 'D'
AND B.PRODATE = (SELECT MAX(PRODATE) FROM MAADMREC WHERE APNO = A.APNO AND LETTERTYPE = '21' AND LETTERTYPE = B.LETTERTYPE

A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
AND A.SEQNO = '0000' AND (A.ARCPG <> '' OR A.ARCPG IS NOT NULL) AND (A.ARCDATE <> '' OR A.ARCDATE IS NOT NULL)

select 'K1' AS PAYCODE, 'D' AS DM, min(APNO) AS MINAPNO, max(APNO) AS MAXAPNO, count(*) AS RECCORDCOUNT, 1 AS ORDERNO from BAAPPBASE where APNO LIKE 'K%' AND SUBSTR(CRTTIME, 1, 8) = #crtDate:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = '0000' AND PAYKIND <> '36' UNION select 'K1' AS PAYCODE, 'M' AS DM, min(APNO) AS MINAPNO, max(APNO) AS MAXAPNO, count(*) AS RECCORDCOUNT, 2 AS ORDERNO from BAAPPBASE where APNO LIKE 'K%' AND SUBSTR(CRTTIME, 1, 6) = #crtYm:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = '0000' AND PAYKIND <> '36' UNION select 'K2' AS PAYCODE, 'D' AS DM, min(APNO) AS MINAPNO, max(APNO) AS MAXAPNO, count(*) AS RECCORDCOUNT, 3 AS ORDERNO from BAAPPBASE where APNO LIKE 'K%' AND SUBSTR(CRTTIME, 1, 8) = #crtDate:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = '0000' AND PAYKIND = '36' UNION select 'K2' AS PAYCODE, 'M' AS DM, min(APNO) AS MINAPNO, max(APNO) AS MAXAPNO, count(*) AS RECCORDCOUNT, 4 AS ORDERNO from BAAPPBASE where APNO LIKE 'K%' AND SUBSTR(CRTTIME, 1, 6) = #crtYm:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = '0000' AND PAYKIND = '36' ORDER BY ORDERNO

AND 1 = 0
t.PROCSTAT = #procStat:VARCHAR#
t.PROCSTAT in
t.PROCSTAT not in
#procStat[]#
t.BENIDS = #benIds:VARCHAR#

SELECT A.BAAPPBASEID, A.SEQNO, (A.BENIDNNO||'-'||A.BENNAME) as BENNAME FROM BAAPPBASE A WHERE A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND A.BENPAYMK = '1' AND (TRIM(BENDIEDATE) IS NULL OR NVL(TRIM(BENDIEDATE),' ') = ' ')
AND NVL(TRIM(A.CASEMK),' ') <> 'D'
AND 1 = 0
A.BAAPPBASEID <> #baappbaseId:NUMERIC#
A.ACCREL = #accRel:VARCHAR#
A.BENEVTREL in
#benEvtRel[]#
A.SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR#
ORDER BY SEQNO

Select A.BAAPPBASEID, A.SEQNO, (A.BENIDNNO||'-'||A.BENNAME) as BENNAME from BAAPPBASE A WHERE A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND A.BENDIEDATE is null
AND 1 = 0
A.BAAPPBASEID <> #baappbaseId:NUMERIC#
A.ACCREL = #accRel:VARCHAR#
A.BENEVTREL in
#benEvtRel[]#
A.SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR#
ORDER BY SEQNO

DELETE FROM BAAPPBASE WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
AND SEQNO <> '0000' AND (CASEMK IS NULL OR CASEMK <> 'D') AND PROCSTAT IN ('01','10','11','12','20')
sqlMap.update: UPDATE BAAPPBASE SET MUSTISSUEAMT = #mustIssueAmt:NUMERIC#, PROCSTAT = #procStat:VARCHAR#, CHGMK = #chgMk:VARCHAR#, UPDUSER = #updUser:VARCHAR#, UPDTIME = #updTime:VARCHAR# WHERE BAAPPBASEID = #baappbaseId:NUMERIC# AND PROCSTAT in ('01','10','11', '12','20','30')
sqlMap.select:
SELECT A.BAAPPBASEID, A.APNO, A.SEQNO, A.IMK, A.APITEM, A.PAYKIND, A.APPDATE, A.CASETYP, A.MAPNO, A.MAPROOTMK, A.COMBAPMARK, A.CASEMK, A.PROCSTAT, A.ACCEPTMK, A.MANCHKMK, A.CHGNOTE, A.EXESTAT, A.APUBNO, A.APUBNOCK, A.LSUBNO, A.LSUBNOCK, A.EVTIDS, A.EVTIDNNO, A.EVTNAME, A.EVTBRDATE, A.EVTSEX, A.EVTNATIONTPE, A.EVTNATIONCODE, A.EVTIDENT, A.EVTJOBDATE, A.EVTDATE, A.EVTDIEDATE, A.EVTAGE, A.BENIDS, A.BENIDNNO, A.BENNAME, A.BENBRDATE, A.BENSEX, A.BENNATIONTYP, A.BENNATIONCODE, A.BENEVTREL, A.BENDIEDATE, A.BENPAYMK, A.IDNCHKYM, A.IDNCHKNOTE, A.TEL1, A.TEL2, A.COMMTYP, A.COMMZIP, A.COMMADDR, A.PAYTYP, A.BANKNAME, A.PAYBANKID, A.BRANCHID, A.PAYEEACC, A.CHKPAYBANKID, A.CHKBRANCHID, A.CHKPAYEEACC, A.ACCIDN, A.ACCNAME, A.ACCREL, A.MITRATE, A.GRDIDNNO, A.GRDNAME, A.GRDBRDATE, A.ASSIGNIDNNO, A.ASSIGNNAME, A.ASSIGNBRDATE, A.ISSUYM, A.PAYYM, (Select SUM(t.ISSUEAMT) From BADAPR t Where t.APNO = a.APNO And t.SEQNO = a.SEQNO And t.VERISEQ = (SELECT MAX(TO_NUMBER(VERISEQ)) FROM BADAPR WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND ISSUYM = t.ISSUYM) And t.ISSUYM = a.ISSUYM And t.payym = a.payym) AS "ISSUEAMT", A.ONCEPAYMK, A.OLDSENIAB, A.MUSTISSUEAMT, A.PAYDATE, A.PAYYMS, A.PAYYME, A.PAUSEYM, A.UNPAUSEYM, A.NOTIFYFORM, A.LOANMK, A.MEXCLVL, A.REALEXCLVL, A.CHKDATE, A.CHKMAN, A.RECHKDATE, A.RECHKMAN, A.EXEDATE, A.EXEMAN, A.ARCDATE, A.ARCPG, A.CLOSEDATE, A.CLOSECAUSE, A.PROMOTEUSER, A.DUPEIDNNOMK, A.CRTUSER, A.CRTTIME, A.UPDUSER, A.UPDTIME, A.EVTEXPIREDATE, A.EVTELIGIBLEDATE, A.EVTMISSINGDATE, A.LSINSMAMT, A.LSCHKMK, A.LSCOUNT, A.LNCHKMK, A.DABAPNO, A.DABANNUAMT, A.RESENIMK, A.OFFINSURDATE, A.LAWRETIREDATE, A.EVTAPPNAME, A.CUTAMT, A.ACCSEQNO, A.BENMARRMK, A.CHGMK, A.PAYAMTS, A.EVTAPPIDNNO, A.EVTAPPBRDATE, A.OLDAPLDPT, A.CHOICEYM, A.MOBILEPHONE, A.ANNUAMT, A.SPECIALACC, A.SPEACCDATE, A.INTERVALMONTH, A.UNQUALIFIEDCAUSE, A.ISSUNOTIFYINGMK, A.EVTJOBAGE, A.SAMTY, A.SAMTD, A.ONCETY, A.ONCEPAYM, A.ONCEISSUEAMT, A.MARGINAMT, B.MAXPAYYM, B.MINPAYYM, (Select SUM(t.APLPAYAMT) From BADAPR t Where t.APNO = a.APNO
AND t.SEQNO = '0000'
AND t.SEQNO = '0000'
AND t.SEQNO <> '0000'
And t.VERISEQ = (SELECT MAX(TO_NUMBER(VERISEQ)) FROM BADAPR WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND ISSUYM = t.ISSUYM) And t.ISSUYM = a.ISSUYM ) AS "APLPAYAMT", B.OTHERAMT, (Select SUM(DECODE(t.MCHKTYP,'2',DECODE(t.SUPRECMK,'C',t.SUPAMT,'D','0',t.BEFISSUEAMT),'5',DECODE(t.SUPRECMK,'C',t.SUPAMT,'D','0',t.BEFISSUEAMT),t.BEFISSUEAMT)) From BADAPR t Where t.APNO = a.APNO And t.SEQNO = a.SEQNO And t.VERISEQ = (SELECT MAX(TO_NUMBER(VERISEQ)) FROM BADAPR WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND ISSUYM = t.ISSUYM) And t.ISSUYM = a.ISSUYM And t.payym = a.payym ) AS "BEFISSUEAMT", B.OFFSETAMT, B.SUPAMT, C.VERISEQ, C.MCHKTYP, C.NITRMY, C.NITRMM, C.ITRMY, C.ITRMD, C.APLPAYSENIY, C.APLPAYSENIM, C.NOLDTY, C.NOLDTM, C.VALSENIY, C.VALSENIM, C.INSAVGAMT, C.OLDAB, C.OLDAMT, C.OLDRATE, C.OLDRATESDATE, C.OLDRATEEDATE, C.COMPENAMT, C.LECOMAMT, C.RECOMAMT, C.OLDAAMT, C.OLDBAMT, C.OLDEXTRARATE FROM (SELECT X.BAAPPBASEID, X.APNO, X.SEQNO, X.IMK, X.APITEM, X.PAYKIND, X.APPDATE, X.CASETYP, X.MAPNO, X.MAPROOTMK, X.COMBAPMARK, X.CASEMK, X.PROCSTAT, X.ACCEPTMK, X.MANCHKMK, X.CHGNOTE, X.EXESTAT, X.APUBNO, X.APUBNOCK, X.LSUBNO, X.LSUBNOCK, X.EVTIDS, X.EVTIDNNO, X.EVTNAME, X.EVTBRDATE, X.EVTSEX, X.EVTNATIONTPE, X.EVTNATIONCODE, X.EVTIDENT, X.EVTJOBDATE, X.EVTDATE, X.EVTDIEDATE, X.EVTAGE, X.BENIDS, X.BENIDNNO, X.BENNAME, X.BENBRDATE, X.BENSEX, X.BENNATIONTYP, X.BENNATIONCODE, X.BENEVTREL, X.BENDIEDATE, X.BENPAYMK, X.IDNCHKYM, X.IDNCHKNOTE, X.TEL1, X.TEL2, X.COMMTYP, X.COMMZIP, X.COMMADDR, X.PAYTYP, X.BANKNAME, X.PAYBANKID, X.BRANCHID, X.PAYEEACC, X.CHKPAYBANKID, X.CHKBRANCHID, X.CHKPAYEEACC, X.ACCIDN, X.ACCNAME, X.ACCREL, X.MITRATE, X.GRDIDNNO, X.GRDNAME, X.GRDBRDATE, X.ASSIGNIDNNO, X.ASSIGNNAME, X.ASSIGNBRDATE, X.ISSUYM, X.PAYYM, X.ISSUEAMT, X.ONCEPAYMK, X.OLDSENIAB, X.MUSTISSUEAMT, X.PAYDATE, X.PAYYMS, X.PAYYME, X.PAUSEYM, X.UNPAUSEYM, X.NOTIFYFORM, X.LOANMK, X.MEXCLVL, X.REALEXCLVL, X.CHKDATE, X.CHKMAN, X.RECHKDATE, X.RECHKMAN, X.EXEDATE, X.EXEMAN, X.ARCDATE, X.ARCPG, X.CLOSEDATE, X.CLOSECAUSE, X.PROMOTEUSER, X.DUPEIDNNOMK, X.CRTUSER, X.CRTTIME, X.UPDUSER, X.UPDTIME, X.EVTEXPIREDATE, X.EVTELIGIBLEDATE, X.EVTMISSINGDATE, X.LSINSMAMT, X.LSCHKMK, X.LSCOUNT, X.LNCHKMK, X.DABAPNO, X.DABANNUAMT, X.RESENIMK, X.OFFINSURDATE, X.LAWRETIREDATE, X.EVTAPPNAME, X.CUTAMT, X.ACCSEQNO, X.BENMARRMK, X.CHGMK, X.PAYAMTS, X.EVTAPPIDNNO, X.EVTAPPBRDATE, X.OLDAPLDPT, X.CHOICEYM, X.MOBILEPHONE, X.ANNUAMT, X.SPECIALACC, X.SPEACCDATE, X.INTERVALMONTH, X.UNQUALIFIEDCAUSE, X.ISSUNOTIFYINGMK, X.EVTJOBAGE, X.SAMTY, X.SAMTD, X.ONCETY, X.ONCEPAYM, X.ONCEISSUEAMT, X.MARGINAMT FROM BAAPPBASE X WHERE X.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND X.SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR#
AND x.PROCSTAT in
AND x.PROCSTAT not in
#procStat[]#
X.PAYKIND in
X.PAYKIND not in
#payKind[]#
)A, (SELECT Y.APNO, Y.ISSUYM, Y.VERISEQ, MAX(Y.PAYYM) AS MAXPAYYM, MIN(Y.PAYYM) AS MINPAYYM, SUM(Y.APLPAYAMT) AS APLPAYAMT, SUM(Y.OTHERAMT) AS OTHERAMT, SUM(DECODE(Y.MCHKTYP,'2',DECODE(Y.SUPRECMK,'C',Y.SUPAMT,'D','0',Y.BEFISSUEAMT),'5',DECODE(Y.SUPRECMK,'C',Y.SUPAMT,'D','0',Y.BEFISSUEAMT),Y.BEFISSUEAMT)) AS BEFISSUEAMT, SUM(Y.SUPAMT) AS SUPAMT, SUM(DECODE(Y.BENEVTREL,'F',0,Y.OFFSETAMT)) AS OFFSETAMT FROM BADAPR Y WHERE Y.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND Y.VERISEQ = (SELECT MAX(TO_NUMBER(VERISEQ)) FROM BADAPR WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND ISSUYM = Y.ISSUYM)
Y.PAYKIND in
Y.PAYKIND not in
#payKind[]#
AND Y.SEQNO = '0000'
AND Y.SEQNO = '0000'
AND Y.SEQNO <> '0000'
GROUP BY Y.APNO ,Y.VERISEQ , Y.ISSUYM) B, (SELECT Z.APNO, Z.SEQNO, Z.ISSUYM, Z.PAYYM, Z.VERISEQ, Z.MCHKTYP, Z.NITRMY, Z.NITRMM, Z.ITRMY, Z.ITRMD, Z.APLPAYSENIY, Z.APLPAYSENIM, Z.NOLDTY, Z.NOLDTM, Z.VALSENIY, Z.VALSENIM, Z.INSAVGAMT, Z.OLDAB, DECODE(Z.OLDAB,'1',Z.OLDAAMT,Z.OLDBAMT) AS OLDAMT, Z.OLDRATE, Z.OLDRATESDATE, Z.OLDRATEEDATE, Z.COMPENAMT, Z.LECOMAMT, Z.RECOMAMT, Z.OLDAAMT, Z.OLDBAMT, Z.OLDEXTRARATE FROM BADAPR Z WHERE Z.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND Z.SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR#
Z.PAYKIND in
Z.PAYKIND not in
#payKind[]#
)C WHERE A.APNO = B.APNO AND A.APNO = C.APNO AND B.APNO = C.APNO AND A.SEQNO = C.SEQNO AND A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND A.ISSUYM = B.ISSUYM AND A.ISSUYM = C.ISSUYM AND A.PAYYM = C.PAYYM AND B.VERISEQ = C.VERISEQ
SELECT A.BENNAME FROM BAAPPBASE A WHERE A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND A.BENPAYMK = #benPayMk:VARCHAR# ORDER BY SEQNO

SELECT (SELECT PARAMNAME FROM BAPARAM WHERE PARAMGROUP = (SUBSTR(T.APNO,1,1)||'CLOSECAUSE') AND PARAMCODE = T.CLOSECAUSE) AS CLOSECAUSE, T.OLDSENIAB, T.ONCEPAYMK, T.DABAPNO, T.DABANNUAMT FROM BAAPPBASE T WHERE T.APNO=#apNo:VARCHAR# AND T.SEQNO='0000'

SELECT DECODE(NVL(TRIM(LSUBNO),'N'),'N','Y','N') ISSHOWCOND1, NVL((SELECT DECODE(DATACOUNT,0,'Y',null,'Y','N') FROM (SELECT AA1.APNO, AA1.ISSUYM FROM BAAPPBASE AA1 WHERE AA1.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND AA1.SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR#) A1, (SELECT DISTINCT AA2.APNO A2_APNO, AA2.ISSUYM A2_ISSUYM FROM BADAPR AA2 WHERE AA2.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND AA2.SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR# AND (NITRMY||NITRMM)<>(APLPAYSENIY||APLPAYSENIM)) A2, (SELECT COUNT(*) DATACOUNT ,AA3.APNO A3_APNO ,AA3.ISSUYM A3_ISSUYM FROM BACHKFILE AA3 WHERE AA3.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND AA3.CHKCODE = 'UF' GROUP BY AA3.APNO,AA3.ISSUYM) A3 WHERE A1.APNO = M1.APNO AND A1.APNO = A2.A2_APNO AND A1.APNO = A3.A3_APNO(+) AND A1.ISSUYM = M1.ISSUYM AND A1.ISSUYM = A2.A2_ISSUYM AND A1.ISSUYM = A3.A3_ISSUYM(+)),'N') ISSHOWCOND2, NVL((SELECT DECODE(COUNT(*),0,'N','Y') FROM BAAPPBASE A1 WHERE A1.APNO = M1.APNO AND A1.ISSUYM = M1.ISSUYM AND A1.BENEVTREL = 'A' AND NVL(TRIM(A1.MUSTISSUEAMT),0) = 0 ),'N') ISSHOWCOND3, NVL((SELECT DECODE(COUNT(*),0,'N','Y') FROM BAAPPBASE A1 WHERE A1.APNO = M1.APNO AND A1.ISSUYM = M1.ISSUYM AND A1.BENEVTREL = 'Z' AND NVL(TRIM(A1.MUSTISSUEAMT),0) = 0 ),'N') ISSHOWCOND4, 'N' AS ISSHOWCOND5, NVL((SELECT DECODE(SUM(A1.MUSTISSUEAMT),SUM(A2.APLPAYAMT),'N','Y') MUSTISSUEAMT FROM (SELECT AA1.APNO, AA1.ISSUYM, AA1.MUSTISSUEAMT, AA1.SEQNO FROM BAAPPBASE AA1 WHERE AA1.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#) A1, (SELECT AA2.APNO A2_APNO ,AA2.ISSUYM A2_ISSUYM ,SUM(AA2.APLPAYAMT) APLPAYAMT ,AA2.SEQNO FROM BADAPR AA2 WHERE AA2.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# GROUP BY AA2.APNO,AA2.ISSUYM,AA2.SEQNO ) A2 WHERE A1.APNO = M1.APNO AND A1.APNO = A2.A2_APNO AND A1.ISSUYM = M1.ISSUYM AND A1.ISSUYM = A2.A2_ISSUYM AND A1.SEQNO = A2.SEQNO ),'N') ISSHOWCOND6, NVL((SELECT DECODE(COUNT(*),0,'N','Y') FROM BAAPPBASE A1 WHERE A1.APNO = M1.APNO AND A1.ISSUYM = M1.ISSUYM AND NVL(TRIM(A1.COMMADDR),'N') = 'N' ),'N') ISSHOWCOND7, NVL((SELECT DECODE(COUNT(*),0,'N','Y') FROM BADAPR A1 WHERE A1.APNO = M1.APNO AND A1.ISSUYM = M1.ISSUYM AND (NVL(TRIM(A1.MANCHKMK),'N')<>'Y' AND NVL(TRIM(A1.MANCHKMK),'N')<>'N')),'N') ISSHOWCOND8, NVL((SELECT DECODE(COUNT(*),0,'N','Y') FROM MAADMREC A1 WHERE A1.APNO = M1.APNO AND A1.ISSUYM = M1.ISSUYM AND A1.LETTERTYPE<>'21' AND NVL(TRIM(CLOSDATE),'0')='0'),'N') ISSHOWCOND9 FROM BAAPPBASE M1 WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR# AND PROCSTAT IN ('10','11','12','20')

SELECT T.BAAPPBASEID, T.APNO, T.SEQNO, T.APPDATE, T.BENIDNNO, T.BENNAME, T.BENBRDATE, T.BENDIEDATE, T.BENSEX, T.BENNATIONTYP, T.BENNATIONCODE, (SELECT NVL(X.CNAME, '') FROM BACOUNTRY X WHERE LPAD(X.COUNTRY_ID, 3, '0') = T.BENNATIONCODE) as BENNATIONNAME, T.BENEVTREL, T.IDNCHKYM, T.TEL1, T.TEL2, T.COMMTYP, T.COMMZIP, T.COMMADDR, T.PAYTYP, T.BANKNAME, T.PAYBANKID, T.BRANCHID, T.PAYEEACC, T.ACCNAME, T.ACCREL, T.GRDIDNNO, T.GRDNAME, T.GRDBRDATE, T.CUTAMT, T.OLDAPLDPT, (SELECT DISTINCT UNAME FROM CAUB WHERE UBNO = T.OLDAPLDPT) AS UNAME, DECODE(T.BENEVTREL,'A',' ','C',' ','F',' ','N',' ','Z',' ','O',' ',T.APPDATE) AS BENEVTAPPDATE, (SELECT DECODE(SEQNO,'0000',EVTNAME,BENNAME) FROM BAAPPBASE WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO=RPAD(SUBSTR(T.SEQNO,1,DECODE((INSTR(T.SEQNO,'0',2,1)),0,3,(INSTR(T.SEQNO,'0',2,1)-2))),4,'0') ) AS BENEVTNAME, T.BENMARRMK, (SELECT PARAMNAME FROM BAPARAM WHERE PARAMGROUP = (decode(SUBSTR(T.APNO, 1, 1),'S','SURVIVORCLOSECAUSE', SUBSTR(T.APNO, 1, 1) || 'CLOSECAUSE')) AND PARAMCODE = T.CLOSECAUSE) AS CLOSECAUSE, T.CLOSEDATE, T.SPECIALACC, T.SPEACCDATE, (SELECT PARAMCODE || '-' || PARAMNAME FROM BAPARAM WHERE PARAMGROUP = 'UNQUALIFIEDCAUSE' AND PARAMCODE = T.UNQUALIFIEDCAUSE) AS UNQUALIFIEDCAUSE FROM BAAPPBASE T WHERE T.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND T.BENPAYMK='1' ORDER BY SEQNO

SELECT A.BAAPPBASEID, A.APNO, A.SEQNO, A.BENIDNNO, A.BENNAME, A.BENBRDATE, A.BENEVTREL, A.ISSUYM, B.BADAPRID, B.PAYYM, B.ISSUEAMT, B.RECAMT, B.PAYBANANCE, B.SUPAMT, B.OFFSETAMT, B.OTHERAMT, B.APLPAYAMT, B.ACCEPTMK, B.MANCHKMK FROM (SELECT X.BAAPPBASEID, X.APNO, X.SEQNO, X.BENIDNNO, X.BENNAME, X.BENBRDATE, X.BENEVTREL, X.ISSUYM FROM BAAPPBASE X WHERE X.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND X.SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR# AND X.BENPAYMK='1' AND
X.PROCSTAT in
X.PROCSTAT not in
#procStat[]#
) A, (SELECT Y.BADAPRID, Y.BAAPPBASEID, Y.APNO, Y.ISSUYM, Y.PAYYM, Y.SEQNO, Y.ISSUEAMT, Y.RECAMT, Y.SUPAMT, (nvl(Y.PAYBANANCE,0)+nvl(Y.REMITAMT,0)+nvl(Y.OVRCUTAMT,0)) AS PAYBANANCE, Y.OTHERAMT, Y.OFFSETAMT, Y.APLPAYAMT, Y.ACCEPTMK, Y.MANCHKMK FROM BADAPR Y WHERE Y.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND Y.SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR# AND Y.VERISEQ = (SELECT MAX(TO_NUMBER(VERISEQ)) FROM BADAPR WHERE APNO = Y.APNO AND ISSUYM = Y.ISSUYM)) B WHERE A.BAAPPBASEID = B.BAAPPBASEID AND A.APNO = B.APNO AND A.ISSUYM = B.ISSUYM AND A.SEQNO = B.SEQNO ORDER BY SEQNO, PAYYM

SELECT X.BAAPPBASEID, X.APNO, X.EVTNAME, X.APPDATE, X.ISSUYM, X.PAYYM, X.EVTDATE, X.LSUBNO, X.ISSUEAMT, X.EVTIDNNO, X.EVTBRDATE, X.EXEDATE, X.PRODATE, X.NDOMK1, Y.CHKDATE, Y.APLPAYDATE, Y.RECAMT, Y.SUPAMT FROM (SELECT BAAPPBASEID, APNO, EVTNAME, APPDATE, ISSUYM, PAYYM, EVTDATE, LSUBNO, ISSUEAMT, EVTIDNNO, EVTBRDATE, DECODE(CASETYP,'3',EXEDATE,' ') AS EXEDATE, (SELECT PRODATE FROM MAADMREC WHERE LETTERTYPE = '11' AND APNO = M1.APNO AND ISSUYM = M1.ISSUYM ) AS PRODATE, (SELECT NDOMK1 FROM MAADMREC WHERE LETTERTYPE = '11' AND APNO = M1.APNO AND ISSUYM = M1.ISSUYM ) AS NDOMK1 FROM BAAPPBASE M1 WHERE EVTIDNNO = #evtIdnNo:VARCHAR# AND EVTBRDATE = #evtBrDate:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = '0000' AND BENPAYMK = '1' AND SUBSTR(APNO,1,1) = 'L' AND (CASEMK <> 'D' OR CASEMK IS NULL) AND APNO <> #apNo:VARCHAR# ) X, (SELECT BAAPPBASEID, ISSUYM, PAYYM, CHKDATE, DECODE(APLPAYMK,'3',APLPAYDATE,' ') AS APLPAYDATE, RECAMT, SUPAMT FROM BADAPR WHERE BENIDN = #evtIdnNo:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = '0000' AND APNO <> #apNo:VARCHAR# ) Y WHERE X.BAAPPBASEID = Y.BAAPPBASEID AND X.ISSUYM = Y.ISSUYM AND X.PAYYM = Y.PAYYM
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE BAAPPBASE SET
CHGNOTE = #chgNote:VARCHAR#,
MANCHKMK = #manchkMk:VARCHAR#,
PROCSTAT = #procStat:VARCHAR#,
NOTIFYFORM = #notifyForm:VARCHAR#,
CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR#, CHKMAN = #chkMan:VARCHAR# WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND PROCSTAT IN ('10','11','12','20')
sqlMap.select:
SELECT A.BAAPPBASEID, A.APNO, A.ISSUYM, A.EVTNAME, A.EVTIDNNO, A.CASETYP, A.PROCSTAT, A.CHKMAN, A.CHKDATE, A.MANCHKMK, NVL(A.MEXCLVL, '0') MEXCLVL, SUBSTR(A.APNO,1,1) PAGEPAYKIND, B.BALP0D020ID, B.VERISEQ, B.TISSUEAMT, B.TAPLPAYAMT, B.PAYSYM, B.PAYEYM, B.RPTDATE, B.PAGENO, A.RECHK, NVL(A.EXEMK, '0') EXEMK, DECODE(B.EXEMK,'1','Y','N') REBOX, DECODE(B.EXEMK,'2','Y','N') EXEBOX, A.PAYKIND FROM (SELECT A1.BAAPPBASEID, A1.APNO, A1.ISSUYM, A1.EVTNAME, A1.EVTIDNNO, A1.MANCHKMK, A1.CASETYP, A1.PROCSTAT, A1.CHKMAN, A1.CHKDATE, A1.MEXCLVL, A1.PAYKIND, (SELECT DECODE(SIGNL2, NULL, '', 'Y') As "SIGNL1" FROM BCCMF01 WHERE PRPNO = #empId:VARCHAR# AND INSKD = '1' AND (PAYTYP = (Select min(DECODE(PAYTYP, '00', '99', PAYTYP)) As "PAYTYP" From BCCMF01 where PRPNO = #empId:VARCHAR# AND INSKD = '1' And (PAYTYP = SUBSTR(A1.APNO, 1, 1) OR (PAYTYP = '99'))))) AS RECHK, (SELECT (CASE WHEN SIGNL2>SIGNL3 THEN SIGNL2 ELSE SIGNL3 END) FROM BCCMF01 WHERE PRPNO = #empId:VARCHAR# AND INSKD = '1' AND (PAYTYP = (Select min(DECODE(PAYTYP, '00', '99', PAYTYP)) As "PAYTYP" From BCCMF01 where PRPNO = #empId:VARCHAR# AND INSKD = '1' And (PAYTYP = SUBSTR(A1.APNO, 1, 1) OR (PAYTYP = '99'))))) AS EXEMK FROM BAAPPBASE A1 WHERE A1.APNO IN (SELECT APNO FROM BALP0D020 WHERE RPTDATE = #rptDate:VARCHAR# AND PAGENO = #pageNo:VARCHAR# AND PAYCODE = #payCode:VARCHAR#
AND PROCMK <> '2'
AND 1 = 0
CHKMAN = #chkMan:VARCHAR#
) AND A1.SEQNO = '0000' AND A1.PROCSTAT IN ('20','30','40')
AND NVL(TRIM(A1.MANCHKMK),' ')<>' ' AND A1.MANCHKMK IS NOT NULL AND ((A1.MEXCLVL<=(SELECT (CASE WHEN SIGNL2>SIGNL3 THEN SIGNL2 ELSE SIGNL3 END) FROM BCCMF01 WHERE PRPNO = #empId:VARCHAR# AND INSKD = '1' AND (PAYTYP = (Select min(DECODE(PAYTYP, '00', '99', PAYTYP)) As "PAYTYP" From BCCMF01 where PRPNO = #empId:VARCHAR# AND INSKD = '1' And (PAYTYP = SUBSTR(A1.APNO, 1, 1) OR (PAYTYP = '99')))))) OR(MEXCLVL>(SELECT (CASE WHEN SIGNL2>SIGNL3 THEN SIGNL2 ELSE SIGNL3 END) FROM BCCMF01 WHERE PRPNO = #empId:VARCHAR# AND INSKD = '1' AND (PAYTYP = (Select min(DECODE(PAYTYP, '00', '99', PAYTYP)) As "PAYTYP" From BCCMF01 where PRPNO = #empId:VARCHAR# AND INSKD = '1' And (PAYTYP = SUBSTR(A1.APNO, 1, 1) OR (PAYTYP = '99'))))) AND(SELECT DECODE(SIGNL2, NULL, '', 'Y') As "SIGNL1" FROM BCCMF01 WHERE PRPNO = #empId:VARCHAR# AND INSKD = '1' AND (PAYTYP = (Select min(DECODE(PAYTYP, '00', '99', PAYTYP)) As "PAYTYP" From BCCMF01 where PRPNO = #empId:VARCHAR# AND INSKD = '1' And (PAYTYP = SUBSTR(A1.APNO, 1, 1) OR (PAYTYP = '99')))))='Y'))
) A, (SELECT B1.BALP0D020ID, B1.APNO, B1.ISSUYM, B1.VERISEQ, B1.RPTDATE, B1.PAGENO, B1.PAYSYM, B1.PAYEYM, B1.TISSUEAMT, B1.TAPLPAYAMT, B1.CHKDATE, B1.CHKMAN, B1.EXEMK FROM BALP0D020 B1 WHERE B1.RPTDATE = #rptDate:VARCHAR# AND B1.PAYCODE = #payCode:VARCHAR# AND B1.PAGENO = #pageNo:VARCHAR#
AND 1 = 0
B1.CHKMAN = #chkMan:VARCHAR#
AND B1.PROCMK <> '2' ) B WHERE A.APNO = B.APNO AND A.CHKDATE = B.CHKDATE AND A.CHKMAN = B.CHKMAN ORDER BY B.BALP0D020ID
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE BAAPPBASE SET PROCSTAT = #procStat:VARCHAR#,
RECHKMAN = #rechkMan:VARCHAR#, RECHKDATE = #rechkDate:VARCHAR#, EXEMAN = #exeMan:VARCHAR#, EXEDATE = #exeDate:VARCHAR#, ARCDATE = #arcDate:VARCHAR#, ARCPG = #arcPg:VARCHAR#,
RECHKMAN = #rechkMan:VARCHAR#, RECHKDATE = #rechkDate:VARCHAR#,
RECHKMAN = DECODE(NVL(TRIM(RECHKMAN), ''), '', #rechkMan:VARCHAR#, RECHKMAN), RECHKDATE = DECODE(NVL(TRIM(RECHKDATE), ''), '', #rechkDate:VARCHAR#, RECHKDATE), EXEMAN = #exeMan:VARCHAR#, EXEDATE = #exeDate:VARCHAR#,
REALEXCLVL = (SELECT (CASE WHEN SIGNL2>SIGNL3 THEN SIGNL2 ELSE SIGNL3 END) FROM BCCMF01 WHERE PRPNO = #empId:VARCHAR# AND INSKD = '1' AND (PAYTYP = (Select min(DECODE(PAYTYP, '00', '99', PAYTYP)) As "PAYTYP" From BCCMF01 where PRPNO = #empId:VARCHAR# AND INSKD = '1' And (PAYTYP = SUBSTR(#apNo:VARCHAR#, 1, 1) OR (PAYTYP = '99'))))) WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND PROCSTAT in ('20','30','40')
sqlMap.select:
SELECT DISTINCT T1.APNO, T1.EVTIDNNO, T1.EVTNAME, T1.EVTBRDATE, SUBSTR(T1.APNO,1,1) AS PAGEPAYKIND, T1.APPDATE, T1.CASETYP, T1.PROCSTAT, T1.PAYKIND, T1.SYSCODE FROM (SELECT APNO, EVTIDNNO, EVTNAME, EVTBRDATE, APPDATE, CASETYP, PROCSTAT, BENIDNNO, SEQNO, PAYKIND, SYSCODE FROM BAAPPBASE WHERE BENEVTREL NOT IN ('A','C','E','F','N','Z','O')
AND 1 = 0
APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
(BENIDNNO like #benIdnNo:VARCHAR#||'%' OR EVTIDNNO like #benIdnNo:VARCHAR#||'%' )
(BENBRDATE = #benBrDate:VARCHAR# OR EVTBRDATE = #benBrDate:VARCHAR# )
(BENNAME = #benName:VARCHAR# OR EVTNAME = #benName:VARCHAR#)
SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR#
) T1, (SELECT APNO ,SEQNO ,BENIDN FROM BADAPR WHERE BENEVTREL NOT IN ('A','C','E','F','N','Z','O')
AND 1 = 0
APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
BENIDN like #benIdnNo:VARCHAR#||'%'
ISSUYM >= #startYm:VARCHAR# AND ISSUYM <= #endYm:VARCHAR#
PAYYM >= #startYm:VARCHAR# AND PAYYM <= #endYm:VARCHAR#
SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR#
) T2 WHERE T1.APNO = T2.APNO(+) AND T1.SEQNO = T2.SEQNO(+) AND T1.BENIDNNO = T2.BENIDN(+)
AND 1 = 0
T1.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
T1.SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR#
UNION SELECT DISTINCT T1.APNO, T1.EVTIDNNO, T1.EVTNAME, T1.EVTBRDATE, SUBSTR(T1.APNO,1,1) AS PAGEPAYKIND, T1.APPDATE, T1.CASETYP, T1.PROCSTAT, T1.PAYKIND, T1.SYSCODE FROM (SELECT APNO, EVTIDNNO, EVTNAME, EVTBRDATE, APPDATE, CASETYP, PROCSTAT, BENIDNNO, SEQNO, PAYKIND, SYSCODE FROM BAAPPBASE T1 WHERE BENEVTREL NOT IN ('A','C','E','F','N','Z','O')
AND 1 = 0
APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR#
) T1, (SELECT APNO ,SEQNO ,BENIDN FROM BADAPR
1 = 0
APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
ISSUYM >= #startYm:VARCHAR# AND ISSUYM <= #endYm:VARCHAR#
PAYYM >= #startYm:VARCHAR# AND PAYYM <= #endYm:VARCHAR#
SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR#
) T2, (SELECT APNO FROM BAFAMILY
1 = 0
APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
FAMIDNNO like #benIdnNo:VARCHAR#||'%'
FAMBRDATE = #benBrDate:VARCHAR#
FAMNAME = #benName:VARCHAR#
) T3 WHERE T1.APNO = T2.APNO(+) AND T1.SEQNO = T2.SEQNO(+) AND T1.APNO = T3.APNO
AND 1 = 0
T1.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
T1.SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR#
ORDER BY APNO

SELECT NULL AS BAAPPBASEID, T1.APNO, T1.SEQNO, T1.IMK, T1.APITEM, T1.PAYKIND, T1.APPDATE, T1.CASETYP, T1.MAPNO, T1.MAPROOTMK, T1.COMBAPMARK, T1.CASEMK, T1.PROCSTAT, T1.ACCEPTMK, T1.MANCHKMK, T1.CHGNOTE, T1.EXESTAT, T1.APUBNO, T1.APUBNOCK, T1.LSUBNO, T1.LSUBNOCK, T1.EVTIDS, T1.EVTIDNNO, T1.EVTNAME, T1.EVTBRDATE, T1.EVTSEX, T1.EVTNATIONTPE, T1.EVTNATIONCODE, T1.EVTNATIONNAME, T1.EVTIDENT, T1.EVTJOBDATE, T1.EVTDATE, T1.EVTDIEDATE, T1.EVTAGE, T1.BENIDS, T1.BENIDNNO, T1.BENNAME, T1.BENBRDATE, T1.BENSEX, T1.BENNATIONTYP, T1.BENNATIONCODE, T1.BENNATIONNAME, T1.BENEVTREL, T1.BENDIEDATE, T1.BENPAYMK, T1.IDNCHKYM, T1.IDNCHKNOTE, T1.TEL1, T1.TEL2, T1.COMMTYP, T1.COMMZIP, T1.COMMADDR, T1.PAYTYP, T1.BANKNAME, T1.PAYBANKID, T1.BRANCHID, T1.PAYEEACC, T1.CHKPAYBANKID, T1.CHKBRANCHID, T1.CHKPAYEEACC, T1.ACCIDN, T1.ACCNAME, T1.ACCREL, T1.MITRATE, T1.GRDIDNNO, T1.GRDNAME, T1.GRDBRDATE, T1.ASSIGNIDNNO, T1.ASSIGNNAME, T1.ASSIGNBRDATE, T1.ISSUYM, T1.PAYYM, T1.ISSUEAMT, T1.ONCEPAYMK, T1.OLDSENIAB, T1.MUSTISSUEAMT, T1.PAYDATE, T1.PAYYMS, T1.PAYYME, T1.PAUSEYM, T1.UNPAUSEYM, T1.NOTIFYFORM, T1.LOANMK, T1.MEXCLVL, T1.REALEXCLVL, T1.CHKDATE, T1.CHKMAN, T1.RECHKDATE, T1.RECHKMAN, T1.EXEDATE, T1.EXEMAN, T1.ARCDATE, T1.ARCPG, T1.CLOSEDATE, T1.CLOSECAUSE, T1.PROMOTEUSER, T1.DUPEIDNNOMK, T1.CRTUSER, T1.CRTTIME, T1.UPDUSER, T1.UPDTIME, T1.EVTEXPIREDATE, T1.EVTELIGIBLEDATE, T1.EVTMISSINGDATE, T1.LSINSMAMT, T1.LSCHKMK, T1.LSCOUNT, T1.LNCHKMK, T1.DABAPNO, T1.DABANNUAMT, T1.RESENIMK, T1.OFFINSURDATE, T1.LAWRETIREDATE, T1.EVTAPPNAME, T1.CUTAMT, T1.ACCSEQNO, T1.BENMARRMK, T1.CHGMK, T1.PAYAMTS, T1.EVTAPPIDNNO, T1.EVTAPPBRDATE, T1.OLDAPLDPT, T1.PAGEPAYKIND, T1.CHOICEYM, T1.MOBILEPHONE, T1.INTERVALMONTH, T1.SPECIALACC, T1.SPEACCDATE, T1.CLOSECAUSECODE, T1.UNQUALIFIEDCAUSE, T1.ISSUNOTIFYINGMK, T1.EVTJOBAGE, T1.SAMTY, T1.SAMTD, T1.ONCETY, T1.ONCEPAYM, T1.ONCEISSUEAMT, T1.MARGINAMT, T1.SYSCODE, T1.APNOFM, T2.ANNUAMT, T2.MAXPAYYM, T2.MINPAYYM, T2.BEFISSUEAMT, T2.APLPAYAMT, T2.VERISEQ, T2.MCHKTYP, T2.NITRMY, T2.NITRMM, T2.ITRMY, T2.ITRMD, T2.APLPAYSENIY, T2.APLPAYSENIM, T2.NOLDTY, T2.NOLDTM, T2.VALSENIY, T2.VALSENIM, T2.INSAVGAMT, T2.OLDAB, T2.OLDAMT, T2.OLDRATE, T2.OLDRATESDATE, T2.OLDRATEEDATE, T2.COMPENAMT, T2.LECOMAMT, T2.RECOMAMT, T2.OLDAAMT, T2.OLDBAMT, T2.OLDEXTRARATE, T2.INHERITORAMT FROM (SELECT X.APNO, X.SEQNO, X.IMK, X.APITEM, X.PAYKIND, X.APPDATE, X.CASETYP, X.MAPNO, X.MAPROOTMK, X.COMBAPMARK, X.CASEMK, X.PROCSTAT, X.ACCEPTMK, X.MANCHKMK, (SELECT PARAMNAME FROM BAPARAM WHERE PARAMGROUP = 'CHGNOTE' AND PARAMCODE = X.CHGNOTE) AS CHGNOTE, X.EXESTAT, X.APUBNO, X.APUBNOCK, X.LSUBNO, X.LSUBNOCK, X.EVTIDS, X.EVTIDNNO, X.EVTNAME, X.EVTBRDATE, X.EVTSEX, X.EVTNATIONTPE, X.EVTNATIONCODE, (SELECT NVL(CNAME, '') FROM BACOUNTRY WHERE LPAD(COUNTRY_ID, 3, '0') = X.EVTNATIONCODE) AS EVTNATIONNAME, X.EVTIDENT, X.EVTJOBDATE, X.EVTDATE, X.EVTDIEDATE, X.EVTAGE, X.BENIDS, X.BENIDNNO, X.BENNAME, X.BENBRDATE, X.BENSEX, X.BENNATIONTYP, X.BENNATIONCODE, (SELECT NVL(CNAME, '') FROM BACOUNTRY WHERE LPAD(COUNTRY_ID, 3, '0') = X.BENNATIONCODE) AS BENNATIONNAME, X.BENEVTREL, X.BENDIEDATE, X.BENPAYMK, X.IDNCHKYM, X.IDNCHKNOTE, X.TEL1, X.TEL2, X.COMMTYP, X.COMMZIP, X.COMMADDR, X.PAYTYP, X.BANKNAME, X.PAYBANKID, X.BRANCHID, X.PAYEEACC, X.CHKPAYBANKID, X.CHKBRANCHID, X.CHKPAYEEACC, X.ACCIDN, X.ACCNAME, X.ACCREL, X.MITRATE, X.GRDIDNNO, X.GRDNAME, X.GRDBRDATE, X.ASSIGNIDNNO, X.ASSIGNNAME, X.ASSIGNBRDATE, X.ISSUYM, X.PAYYM, X.ISSUEAMT, X.ONCEPAYMK, X.OLDSENIAB, X.MUSTISSUEAMT, X.PAYDATE, X.PAYYMS, X.PAYYME, X.PAUSEYM, X.UNPAUSEYM, X.NOTIFYFORM, X.LOANMK, X.MEXCLVL, X.REALEXCLVL, X.CHKDATE, X.CHKMAN, X.RECHKDATE, X.RECHKMAN, X.EXEDATE, X.EXEMAN, X.ARCDATE, X.ARCPG, X.CLOSEDATE, (SELECT PARAMNAME FROM BAPARAM WHERE PARAMGROUP = (SUBSTR(X.APNO,1,1)||'CLOSECAUSE') AND PARAMCODE = X.CLOSECAUSE) AS CLOSECAUSE, X.PROMOTEUSER, X.DUPEIDNNOMK, X.CRTUSER, X.CRTTIME, X.UPDUSER, X.UPDTIME, X.EVTEXPIREDATE, X.EVTELIGIBLEDATE, X.EVTMISSINGDATE, X.LSINSMAMT, X.LSCHKMK, X.LSCOUNT, X.LNCHKMK, X.DABAPNO, X.DABANNUAMT, X.RESENIMK, X.OFFINSURDATE, X.LAWRETIREDATE, X.EVTAPPNAME, X.CUTAMT, X.ACCSEQNO, X.BENMARRMK, X.CHGMK, X.PAYAMTS, X.EVTAPPIDNNO, X.EVTAPPBRDATE, X.OLDAPLDPT, X.CHOICEYM, SUBSTR(X.APNO,1,1) AS PAGEPAYKIND, X.MOBILEPHONE, X.INTERVALMONTH, X.SPECIALACC, X.SPEACCDATE, X.CLOSECAUSE AS CLOSECAUSECODE, X.UNQUALIFIEDCAUSE, X.ISSUNOTIFYINGMK, X.EVTJOBAGE, X.SAMTY, X.SAMTD, X.ONCETY, X.ONCEPAYM, X.ONCEISSUEAMT, X.MARGINAMT, X.SYSCODE, X.APNOFM FROM BAAPPBASE X WHERE X.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND X.SEQNO = '0000'
X.PAYKIND = #payKind:VARCHAR#
) T1, (SELECT DISTINCT Y.APNO, Y.ANNUAMT, Y.ISSUYM, Y.PAYYM, Y.OLDAB, (DECODE(Y.OLDAB,'1',Y.OLDAAMT,Y.OLDBAMT)) AS OLDAMT, Y.ITRMY, Y.ITRMD, Y.NITRMY, Y.NITRMM, Y.APLPAYSENIY, Y.APLPAYSENIM, Y.NOLDTY, Y.NOLDTM, Y.VALSENIY, Y.VALSENIM, Y.OLDRATESDATE, Y.OLDRATEEDATE, Y.OLDRATE, Y.INSAVGAMT, Y.VERISEQ, Y.MCHKTYP, Y.COMPENAMT, Y.LECOMAMT, Y.RECOMAMT, Y.OLDAAMT, Y.OLDBAMT, Z.MAXPAYYM, Z.MINPAYYM, Z.BEFISSUEAMT, Z.APLPAYAMT, Y.OLDEXTRARATE, Z.INHERITORAMT FROM BADAPR Y, (SELECT A.APNO, A.ISSUYM, MAX(A.PAYYM) MAXPAYYM, MIN(A.PAYYM) MINPAYYM, A.VERISEQ VERISEQ, SUM(DECODE(A.MCHKTYP,'2',deCode(A.SUPRECMK,'C',A.SUPAMT,'D','0',A.BEFISSUEAMT) ,'5',deCode(A.SUPRECMK,'C',A.SUPAMT,'D','0',A.BEFISSUEAMT) ,A.BEFISSUEAMT)) AS BEFISSUEAMT, SUM(A.APLPAYAMT) AS APLPAYAMT, SUM(A.INHERITORAMT) AS INHERITORAMT FROM BADAPR A, (SELECT MAX(TO_NUMBER(VERISEQ)) AS VERISEQ, ISSUYM FROM BADAPR WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# GROUP BY ISSUYM) B WHERE A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND A.VERISEQ = B.VERISEQ AND A.ISSUYM = B.ISSUYM
AND A.SEQNO = '0000'
AND A.SEQNO = '0000'
AND A.SEQNO <> '0000'
A.PAYKIND = #payKind:VARCHAR#
GROUP BY A.APNO,A.ISSUYM,A.VERISEQ ) Z WHERE Y.ISSUYM = Z.ISSUYM AND Y.VERISEQ = Z.VERISEQ AND Y.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND Y.SEQNO = '0000' AND Y.PAYKIND NOT IN ('34','44','54')
Y.PAYKIND = #payKind:VARCHAR#
) T2 WHERE T1.APNO = T2.APNO(+) AND T1.ISSUYM = T2.ISSUYM(+) AND T1.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND T1.PAYYM = T2.PAYYM(+)

SELECT T1.BAAPPBASEID, T1.APNO, T1.SEQNO, T1.BENIDNNO, T1.BENNAME, T1.BENBRDATE, T1.BENEVTREL, (SELECT PARAMNAME FROM BAPARAM WHERE PARAMGROUP = 'CHGNOTE'AND PARAMCODE = T1.CHGNOTE) AS CHGNOTE, T1.ISSUYM, T2.PAYYM, T2.ACCEPTMK, T2.MANCHKMK, T2.ISSUEAMT, T2.ADJUSTAMT, T2.RECAMT, T2.SUPAMT, T2.OTHERAMT, T2.PAYRATE, T2.APLPAYAMT FROM (SELECT TT1.BAAPPBASEID, TT1.APNO, TT1.SEQNO, TT1.BENIDNNO, TT1.BENNAME, TT1.BENBRDATE, TT1.BENEVTREL, TT1.CHGNOTE, TT1.ISSUYM FROM BAAPPBASE TT1 WHERE TT1.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND TT1.SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR# AND TT1.BENPAYMK = '1' AND TT1.BENEVTREL IN ('1','2','3','4','5','6','7') ) T1, (SELECT TT2.BAAPPBASEID, TT2.APNO, TT2.ISSUYM, TT2.SEQNO, TT2.PAYYM, TT2.ACCEPTMK, TT2.MANCHKMK, TT2.ISSUEAMT, TT2.ADJUSTAMT, TT2.RECAMT, TT2.SUPAMT, TT2.OTHERAMT, TT2.PAYRATE, TT2.APLPAYAMT FROM BADAPR TT2 WHERE TT2.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND TT2.SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR#
TT2.ISSUYM >= #startYm:VARCHAR# AND TT2.ISSUYM <= #endYm:VARCHAR#
TT2.PAYYM >= #startYm:VARCHAR# AND TT2.PAYYM <= #endYm:VARCHAR#
) T2 WHERE T1.BAAPPBASEID = T2.BAAPPBASEID AND T1.APNO = T2.APNO AND T1.ISSUYM = T2.ISSUYM AND T1.SEQNO = T2.SEQNO
ORDER BY SEQNO,ISSUYM DESC,PAYYM DESC
ORDER BY SEQNO,PAYYM DESC,ISSUYM DESC

Select BAAPPBASEID, APNO, SEQNO, IMK, APITEM, PAYKIND, APPDATE, CASETYP, MAPNO, MAPROOTMK, COMBAPMARK, CASEMK, PROCSTAT, ACCEPTMK, MANCHKMK, CHGNOTE, EXESTAT, APUBNO, APUBNOCK, LSUBNO, LSUBNOCK, EVTIDS, EVTIDNNO, EVTNAME, EVTBRDATE, EVTSEX, EVTNATIONTPE, EVTNATIONCODE, EVTIDENT, EVTJOBDATE, EVTDATE, EVTDIEDATE, EVTAGE, BENIDS, BENIDNNO, BENNAME, BENBRDATE, BENSEX, BENNATIONTYP, BENNATIONCODE, BENEVTREL, BENDIEDATE, BENPAYMK, IDNCHKYM, IDNCHKNOTE, TEL1, TEL2, COMMTYP, COMMZIP, COMMADDR, PAYTYP, BANKNAME, PAYBANKID, BRANCHID, PAYEEACC, CHKPAYBANKID, CHKBRANCHID, CHKPAYEEACC, ACCIDN, ACCNAME, ACCREL, MITRATE, GRDIDNNO, GRDNAME, GRDBRDATE, ASSIGNIDNNO, ASSIGNNAME, ASSIGNBRDATE, ISSUYM, PAYYM, ISSUEAMT, ONCEPAYMK, OLDSENIAB, MUSTISSUEAMT, PAYDATE, PAYYMS, PAYYME, PAUSEYM, UNPAUSEYM, NOTIFYFORM, LOANMK, MEXCLVL, REALEXCLVL, CHKDATE, CHKMAN, RECHKDATE, RECHKMAN, EXEDATE, EXEMAN, ARCDATE, ARCPG, CLOSEDATE, CLOSECAUSE, PROMOTEUSER, DUPEIDNNOMK, CRTUSER, CRTTIME, UPDUSER, UPDTIME, EVTEXPIREDATE, EVTELIGIBLEDATE, EVTMISSINGDATE, LSINSMAMT, LSCHKMK, LSCOUNT, LNCHKMK, DABAPNO, DABANNUAMT, RESENIMK, OFFINSURDATE, LAWRETIREDATE, EVTAPPNAME, CUTAMT, ACCSEQNO, BENMARRMK, CHGMK, PAYAMTS, EVTAPPIDNNO, EVTAPPBRDATE, OLDAPLDPT, CHOICEYM, MOBILEPHONE, ANNUAMT, INTERVALMONTH, SPECIALACC, SPEACCDATE, UNQUALIFIEDCAUSE, ISSUNOTIFYINGMK, EVTJOBAGE, SAMTY, SAMTD, ONCETY, ONCEPAYM, ONCEISSUEAMT, MARGINAMT From BAAPPBASE Where MANCHKMK = 'Y' And PROCSTAT = '50' And SEQNO = '0000' And (CASEMK = '' Or CASEMK Is Null)
1 = 0
APNO like #apNo:VARCHAR#||'%'
ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR#
Order By CASETYP,APNO

SELECT * FROM( SELECT APNO, SEQNO, APPDATE, EVTNAME, EVTIDNNO, EVTBRDATE, EVTJOBDATE, EVTDATE, EVTELIGIBLEDATE, EVTDIEDATE, ASSIGNNAME, ASSIGNIDNNO, ASSIGNBRDATE, PAYTYP, BENNAME, BENIDNNO, BENBRDATE, BENNATIONTYP, COMMZIP, COMMADDR, CASETYP, LSUBNO, COMBAPMARK, APUBNO, IDNCHKYM, NOTIFYFORM, ISSUYM, BENEVTREL, APITEM, GRDNAME, PAYYMS, UNQUALIFIEDCAUSE, ISSUNOTIFYINGMK, BAAPPBASEID, BENNATIONCODE, BENDIEDATE, DIGAMYDATE, CLOSECAUSE, CLOSEDATE, ACCREL, EVTYP, DATACOUNT, BENSEX, ACCEPTMK, EVTIDS, rank() over(PARTITION BY APNO,BENNAME ORDER BY SEQNO) top FROM (Select A.APNO, A.SEQNO, A.APPDATE, A.EVTNAME, A.EVTIDNNO, A.EVTBRDATE, A.EVTJOBDATE, A.EVTDATE, A.EVTELIGIBLEDATE, A.EVTDIEDATE, A.ASSIGNNAME, A.ASSIGNIDNNO, A.ASSIGNBRDATE, A.PAYTYP, NVL(A.GRDNAME,A.BENNAME) AS BENNAME, A.BENIDNNO, A.BENBRDATE, A.BENNATIONTYP, NVL((SELECT A1.COMMZIP FROM BAAPPBASE A1 WHERE A1.APNO = A.APNO AND A1.BENNAME = NVL(A.GRDNAME, A.BENNAME) AND ROWNUM = 1),A.COMMZIP) COMMZIP, NVL((SELECT A1.COMMADDR FROM BAAPPBASE A1 WHERE A1.APNO = A.APNO AND A1.BENNAME = NVL(A.GRDNAME, A.BENNAME) AND ROWNUM = 1),A.COMMADDR) COMMADDR, A.CASETYP, A.LSUBNO, A.COMBAPMARK, A.APUBNO, A.IDNCHKYM, A.NOTIFYFORM, A.ISSUYM, A.BENEVTREL, A.APITEM, A.GRDNAME, A.PAYYMS, A.UNQUALIFIEDCAUSE, A.ISSUNOTIFYINGMK, A.BAAPPBASEID, A.BENNATIONCODE, A.BENDIEDATE, C.DIGAMYDATE, A.CLOSECAUSE, A.CLOSEDATE, A.ACCREL, C.EVTYP, A.EVTIDS, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BACHKFILE D WHERE D.APNO = A.APNO AND D.SEQNO = A.SEQNO AND D.ISSUYM = A.ISSUYM AND D.PAYYM = (SELECT MAX(B.PAYYM) FROM BACHKFILE B WHERE B.SEQNO = '0000' AND B.APNO = A.APNO AND B.ISSUYM = A.ISSUYM) AND D.CHKCODE = '25') DATACOUNT, A.BENSEX, (SELECT ACCEPTMK FROM BADAPR WHERE APNO = A.APNO AND SEQNO = A.SEQNO AND ISSUYM = A.ISSUYM AND PAYYM = A.PAYYM AND VERISEQ = (SELECT MAX(TO_NUMBER(VERISEQ)) FROM BADAPR WHERE APNO = A.APNO AND SEQNO = A.SEQNO AND ISSUYM = A.ISSUYM AND PAYYM = A.PAYYM) AND PAYKIND = A.PAYKIND) ACCEPTMK From BAAPPBASE A, BAAPPEXPAND C Where A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND A.APNO = C.APNO(+) AND A.BAAPPBASEID = C.BAAPPBASEID(+) AND A.SEQNO = C.SEQNO(+)
)) WHERE top = 1 Order By SEQNO

SELECT * FROM( SELECT APNO, SEQNO, APPDATE, EVTNAME, EVTIDNNO, EVTBRDATE, EVTJOBDATE, EVTDATE, EVTELIGIBLEDATE, EVTDIEDATE, ASSIGNNAME, ASSIGNIDNNO, ASSIGNBRDATE, PAYTYP, BENNAME, BENIDNNO, BENBRDATE, BENNATIONTYP, COMMZIP, COMMADDR, CASETYP, LSUBNO, COMBAPMARK, APUBNO, IDNCHKYM, NOTIFYFORM, ISSUYM, BENEVTREL, APITEM, GRDNAME, PAYYMS, UNQUALIFIEDCAUSE, ISSUNOTIFYINGMK, BAAPPBASEID, BENNATIONCODE, BENDIEDATE, DIGAMYDATE, CLOSECAUSE, CLOSEDATE, ACCREL, EVTYP, DATACOUNT, BENSEX, ACCEPTMK, EVTIDS, rank() over(PARTITION BY APNO,BENNAME ORDER BY SEQNO) top FROM (Select A.APNO, A.SEQNO, A.APPDATE, A.EVTNAME, A.EVTIDNNO, A.EVTBRDATE, A.EVTJOBDATE, A.EVTDATE, A.EVTELIGIBLEDATE, A.EVTDIEDATE, A.ASSIGNNAME, A.ASSIGNIDNNO, A.ASSIGNBRDATE, A.PAYTYP, NVL(A.GRDNAME,A.BENNAME) AS BENNAME, A.BENIDNNO, A.BENBRDATE, A.BENNATIONTYP, NVL((SELECT A1.COMMZIP FROM BAAPPBASE A1 WHERE A1.APNO = A.APNO AND A1.BENNAME = NVL(A.GRDNAME, A.BENNAME) AND ROWNUM = 1),A.COMMZIP) COMMZIP, NVL((SELECT A1.COMMADDR FROM BAAPPBASE A1 WHERE A1.APNO = A.APNO AND A1.BENNAME = NVL(A.GRDNAME, A.BENNAME) AND ROWNUM = 1),A.COMMADDR) COMMADDR, A.CASETYP, A.LSUBNO, A.COMBAPMARK, A.APUBNO, A.IDNCHKYM, A.NOTIFYFORM, A.ISSUYM, A.BENEVTREL, A.APITEM, A.GRDNAME, A.PAYYMS, A.UNQUALIFIEDCAUSE, A.ISSUNOTIFYINGMK, A.BAAPPBASEID, A.BENNATIONCODE, A.BENDIEDATE, C.DIGAMYDATE, A.CLOSECAUSE, A.CLOSEDATE, A.ACCREL, C.EVTYP, A.EVTIDS, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BACHKFILE D WHERE D.APNO = A.APNO AND D.SEQNO = A.SEQNO AND D.ISSUYM = A.ISSUYM AND D.PAYYM = (SELECT MAX(B.PAYYM) FROM BACHKFILE B WHERE B.SEQNO = '0000' AND B.APNO = A.APNO AND B.ISSUYM = A.ISSUYM) AND D.CHKCODE = '25') DATACOUNT, A.BENSEX, (SELECT ACCEPTMK FROM BADAPR WHERE APNO = A.APNO AND SEQNO = A.SEQNO AND ISSUYM = A.ISSUYM AND PAYYM = A.PAYYM AND VERISEQ = (SELECT MAX(TO_NUMBER(VERISEQ)) FROM BADAPR WHERE APNO = A.APNO AND SEQNO = A.SEQNO AND ISSUYM = A.ISSUYM AND PAYYM = A.PAYYM) AND PAYKIND = A.PAYKIND) ACCEPTMK From BAAPPBASE A, BAAPPEXPAND C Where A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND A.APNO = C.APNO(+) AND A.BAAPPBASEID = C.BAAPPBASEID(+) AND A.SEQNO = C.SEQNO(+) AND A.BENEVTREL BETWEEN '1' AND '7'
)) WHERE top = 1 Order By SEQNO

Select APNO, SEQNO, APPDATE, EVTNAME, EVTIDNNO, EVTBRDATE, EVTJOBDATE, EVTDATE, EVTELIGIBLEDATE, EVTDIEDATE, ASSIGNNAME, ASSIGNIDNNO, ASSIGNBRDATE, PAYTYP, PAYYM, BENNAME, BENIDNNO, BENBRDATE, BENNATIONTYP, COMMZIP, COMMADDR, CASETYP, LSUBNO, COMBAPMARK, (select DABAPNO From BAAPPBASE Where APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = '0000' And CASEMK is null) DABAPNO, APUBNO, IDNCHKYM, NOTIFYFORM, ISSUYM, BENEVTREL, APITEM, GRDNAME, UNQUALIFIEDCAUSE, ISSUNOTIFYINGMK, BENNATIONCODE, CLOSECAUSE, EVTIDS From BAAPPBASE Where APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# And CASEMK is null AND BENEVTREL BETWEEN '2' AND '7' Order By SEQNO

SELECT * FROM( SELECT APNO, SEQNO, APPDATE, EVTNAME, EVTIDNNO, EVTBRDATE, EVTJOBDATE, EVTDATE, EVTELIGIBLEDATE, EVTDIEDATE, ASSIGNNAME, ASSIGNIDNNO, ASSIGNBRDATE, PAYTYP, BENNAME, BENIDNNO, BENBRDATE, BENNATIONTYP, COMMZIP, COMMADDR, CASETYP, LSUBNO, COMBAPMARK, APUBNO, IDNCHKYM, NOTIFYFORM, ISSUYM, BENEVTREL, APITEM, GRDNAME, PAYYMS, UNQUALIFIEDCAUSE, ISSUNOTIFYINGMK, BAAPPBASEID, BENNATIONCODE, BENDIEDATE, DIGAMYDATE, CLOSECAUSE, CLOSEDATE, ACCREL, EVTYP, DATACOUNT, BENSEX, ACCEPTMK, rank() over(PARTITION BY APNO,BENNAME ORDER BY SEQNO) top FROM ( SELECT A.APNO, A.SEQNO, A.APPDATE, A.EVTNAME, A.EVTIDNNO, A.EVTBRDATE, A.EVTJOBDATE, A.EVTDATE, A.EVTELIGIBLEDATE, A.EVTDIEDATE, A.ASSIGNNAME, A.ASSIGNIDNNO, A.ASSIGNBRDATE, A.PAYTYP, NVL(A.GRDNAME, A.BENNAME) AS BENNAME, A.BENIDNNO, A.BENBRDATE, A.BENNATIONTYP, NVL((SELECT A1.COMMZIP FROM BAAPPBASE A1 WHERE A1.APNO = A.APNO AND A1.BENNAME = NVL(A.GRDNAME, A.BENNAME) AND ROWNUM = 1),A.COMMZIP) COMMZIP, NVL((SELECT A1.COMMADDR FROM BAAPPBASE A1 WHERE A1.APNO = A.APNO AND A1.BENNAME = NVL(A.GRDNAME, A.BENNAME) AND ROWNUM = 1),A.COMMADDR) COMMADDR, A.CASETYP, A.LSUBNO, A.COMBAPMARK, A.APUBNO, A.IDNCHKYM, A.NOTIFYFORM, A.ISSUYM, A.BENEVTREL, A.APITEM, A.GRDNAME, A.PAYYMS, A.UNQUALIFIEDCAUSE, A.ISSUNOTIFYINGMK, A.BAAPPBASEID, A.BENNATIONCODE, A.BENDIEDATE, C.DIGAMYDATE, A.CLOSECAUSE, A.CLOSEDATE, A.ACCREL, C.EVTYP, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BACHKFILE D WHERE D.APNO = A.APNO AND D.SEQNO = A.SEQNO AND D.ISSUYM = A.ISSUYM AND D.PAYYM = (SELECT MAX(B.PAYYM) FROM BACHKFILE B WHERE B.SEQNO = '0000' AND B.APNO = A.APNO AND B.ISSUYM = A.ISSUYM) AND D.CHKCODE = '25') DATACOUNT, A.BENSEX, (SELECT ACCEPTMK FROM BADAPR WHERE APNO = A.APNO AND SEQNO = A.SEQNO AND ISSUYM = A.ISSUYM AND PAYYM = A.PAYYM AND VERISEQ = (SELECT MAX(TO_NUMBER(VERISEQ)) FROM BADAPR WHERE APNO = A.APNO AND SEQNO = A.SEQNO AND ISSUYM = A.ISSUYM AND PAYYM = A.PAYYM) AND PAYKIND = A.PAYKIND) ACCEPTMK FROM BAAPPBASE A, BAAPPEXPAND C WHERE A.apno = #apNo:VARCHAR#
AND A.seqno <> '0000'
AND A.CASEMK is null AND A.APNO = C.APNO(+) AND A.BAAPPBASEID = C.BAAPPBASEID(+) AND A.SEQNO = C.SEQNO(+) )) WHERE top = 1 ORDER BY SEQNO

SELECT * FROM( SELECT APNO, SEQNO, APPDATE, EVTNAME, EVTIDNNO, EVTBRDATE, EVTJOBDATE, EVTDATE, EVTELIGIBLEDATE, EVTDIEDATE, ASSIGNNAME, ASSIGNIDNNO, ASSIGNBRDATE, PAYTYP, BENNAME, BENIDNNO, BENBRDATE, BENNATIONTYP, COMMZIP, COMMADDR, CASETYP, LSUBNO, COMBAPMARK, APUBNO, IDNCHKYM, NOTIFYFORM, ISSUYM, BENEVTREL, APITEM, GRDNAME, PAYYMS, UNQUALIFIEDCAUSE, ISSUNOTIFYINGMK, BAAPPBASEID, BENNATIONCODE, BENDIEDATE, DIGAMYDATE, CLOSECAUSE, CLOSEDATE, ACCREL, EVTYP, DATACOUNT, BENSEX, ACCEPTMK, rank() over(PARTITION BY APNO,BENNAME ORDER BY SEQNO DESC) top FROM ( SELECT A.APNO, A.SEQNO, A.APPDATE, A.EVTNAME, A.EVTIDNNO, A.EVTBRDATE, A.EVTJOBDATE, A.EVTDATE, A.EVTELIGIBLEDATE, A.EVTDIEDATE, A.ASSIGNNAME, A.ASSIGNIDNNO, A.ASSIGNBRDATE, A.PAYTYP, NVL(C.ASSIGNNAME ,NVL(A.GRDNAME, A.BENNAME)) AS BENNAME, A.BENIDNNO, A.BENBRDATE, A.BENNATIONTYP, NVL((SELECT A1.COMMZIP FROM BAAPPBASE A1 WHERE A1.APNO = A.APNO AND A1.BENNAME = DECODE(NVL(C.ASSIGNNAME,' '),' ',NVL(A.GRDNAME, A.BENNAME),A.BENNAME) AND ROWNUM = 1),A.COMMZIP) COMMZIP, NVL((SELECT A1.COMMADDR FROM BAAPPBASE A1 WHERE A1.APNO = A.APNO AND A1.BENNAME = DECODE(NVL(C.ASSIGNNAME,' '),' ',NVL(A.GRDNAME, A.BENNAME),A.BENNAME) AND ROWNUM = 1),A.COMMADDR) COMMADDR, A.CASETYP, A.LSUBNO, A.COMBAPMARK, A.APUBNO, A.IDNCHKYM, A.NOTIFYFORM, A.ISSUYM, A.BENEVTREL, A.APITEM, A.GRDNAME, A.PAYYMS, A.UNQUALIFIEDCAUSE, A.ISSUNOTIFYINGMK, A.BAAPPBASEID, A.BENNATIONCODE, A.BENDIEDATE, C.DIGAMYDATE, A.CLOSECAUSE, A.CLOSEDATE, A.ACCREL, C.EVTYP, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BACHKFILE D WHERE D.APNO = A.APNO AND D.SEQNO = A.SEQNO AND D.ISSUYM = A.ISSUYM AND D.PAYYM = A.PAYYM AND D.CHKCODE = '25') DATACOUNT, A.BENSEX, (SELECT ACCEPTMK FROM BADAPR WHERE APNO = A.APNO AND SEQNO = A.SEQNO AND ISSUYM = A.ISSUYM AND PAYYM = A.PAYYM AND VERISEQ = (SELECT MAX(TO_NUMBER(VERISEQ)) FROM BADAPR WHERE APNO = A.APNO AND SEQNO = A.SEQNO AND ISSUYM = A.ISSUYM AND PAYYM = A.PAYYM) AND PAYKIND = A.PAYKIND) ACCEPTMK FROM BAAPPBASE A, BAAPPEXPAND C WHERE A.apno = #apNo:VARCHAR#
AND A.seqno <> '0000' AND A.CASEMK is null AND A.APNO = C.APNO AND A.BAAPPBASEID = C.BAAPPBASEID AND A.SEQNO = C.SEQNO AND (TRIM(A.UNQUALIFIEDCAUSE) <> '' OR TRIM(A.UNQUALIFIEDCAUSE) IS NOT NULL)
AND (TRIM(A.BENDIEDATE) = '' OR TRIM(A.BENDIEDATE) IS NULL) UNION SELECT A.APNO, A.SEQNO, A.APPDATE, A.EVTNAME, A.EVTIDNNO, A.EVTBRDATE, A.EVTJOBDATE, A.EVTDATE, A.EVTELIGIBLEDATE, A.EVTDIEDATE, A.ASSIGNNAME, A.ASSIGNIDNNO, A.ASSIGNBRDATE, A.PAYTYP, NVL(C.ASSIGNNAME ,NVL(A.GRDNAME, A.BENNAME)) AS BENNAME, A.BENIDNNO, A.BENBRDATE, A.BENNATIONTYP, NVL((SELECT A1.COMMZIP FROM BAAPPBASE A1 WHERE A1.APNO = A.APNO AND A1.BENNAME = DECODE(NVL(C.ASSIGNNAME,' '),' ',NVL(A.GRDNAME, A.BENNAME),A.BENNAME) AND ROWNUM = 1),A.COMMZIP) COMMZIP, NVL((SELECT A1.COMMADDR FROM BAAPPBASE A1 WHERE A1.APNO = A.APNO AND A1.BENNAME = DECODE(NVL(C.ASSIGNNAME,' '),' ',NVL(A.GRDNAME, A.BENNAME),A.BENNAME) AND ROWNUM = 1),A.COMMADDR) COMMADDR, A.CASETYP, A.LSUBNO, A.COMBAPMARK, A.APUBNO, A.IDNCHKYM, A.NOTIFYFORM, A.ISSUYM, A.BENEVTREL, A.APITEM, A.GRDNAME, A.PAYYMS, A.UNQUALIFIEDCAUSE, A.ISSUNOTIFYINGMK, A.BAAPPBASEID, A.BENNATIONCODE, A.BENDIEDATE, C.DIGAMYDATE, A.CLOSECAUSE, A.CLOSEDATE, A.ACCREL, C.EVTYP, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BACHKFILE D WHERE D.APNO = A.APNO AND D.SEQNO = A.SEQNO AND D.ISSUYM = A.ISSUYM AND D.PAYYM = A.PAYYM AND D.CHKCODE = '25') DATACOUNT, A.BENSEX, (SELECT ACCEPTMK FROM BADAPR WHERE APNO = A.APNO AND SEQNO = A.SEQNO AND ISSUYM = A.ISSUYM AND PAYYM = A.PAYYM AND VERISEQ = (SELECT MAX(TO_NUMBER(VERISEQ)) FROM BADAPR WHERE APNO = A.APNO AND SEQNO = A.SEQNO AND ISSUYM = A.ISSUYM AND PAYYM = A.PAYYM) AND PAYKIND = A.PAYKIND) ACCEPTMK FROM BAAPPBASE A, BAAPPEXPAND C WHERE A.apno = #apNo:VARCHAR#
AND A.seqno <> '0000'
AND A.CASEMK is null AND A.APNO = C.APNO AND A.BAAPPBASEID = C.BAAPPBASEID AND A.SEQNO = C.SEQNO AND (TRIM(A.CLOSECAUSE) = '' OR TRIM(A.CLOSECAUSE) IS NULL) AND (TRIM(A.UNQUALIFIEDCAUSE) = '' OR TRIM(A.UNQUALIFIEDCAUSE) IS NULL) and A.seqno in (Select t1.seqno from BADAPR t1 Where t1.apno = A.apno and t1.issuym = A.issuym and t1.payym = A.payym
and (t1.acceptmk <> 'N' OR trim(t1.Acceptmk) = '' OR t1.acceptmk is null)
and t1.veriseq = (Select max(TO_NUMBER(t11.veriseq) ) from BADAPR t11 Where t11.apno = t1.apno and t11.issuym = t1.issuym and t11.payym = t1.payym ) ) )) WHERE top = 1 ORDER BY SEQNO

select T.BENNAME from BAAPPBASE T where T.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
and (T.BENEVTREL <>'N' and T.BENEVTREL <>'F') and SEQNO <> '0000'
order by BENEVTREL
select T.BENNAME from BAAPPBASE T where T.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# and (T.BENEVTREL ='N' or T.BENEVTREL ='F') order by BENEVTREL

SELECT A.BAAPPBASEID, A.APNO, A.SEQNO, A.IMK, A.APITEM, A.PAYKIND, A.APPDATE, A.CASETYP, A.MAPNO, A.MAPROOTMK, A.COMBAPMARK, A.CASEMK, A.PROCSTAT, A.ACCEPTMK, A.MANCHKMK, A.CHGNOTE, A.EXESTAT, A.APUBNO, A.APUBNOCK, A.LSUBNO, A.LSUBNOCK, A.EVTIDS, A.EVTIDNNO, A.EVTNAME, A.EVTBRDATE, A.EVTSEX, A.EVTNATIONTPE, A.EVTNATIONCODE, A.EVTIDENT, A.EVTJOBDATE, A.EVTDATE, A.EVTDIEDATE, A.EVTAGE, A.BENIDS, A.BENIDNNO, A.BENNAME, A.BENBRDATE, A.BENSEX, A.BENNATIONTYP, A.BENNATIONCODE, A.BENEVTREL, A.BENDIEDATE, A.BENPAYMK, A.IDNCHKYM, A.IDNCHKNOTE, A.TEL1, A.TEL2, A.COMMTYP, A.COMMZIP, A.COMMADDR, A.PAYTYP, A.BANKNAME, A.PAYBANKID, A.BRANCHID, A.PAYEEACC, A.CHKPAYBANKID, A.CHKBRANCHID, A.CHKPAYEEACC, A.ACCIDN, A.ACCNAME, A.ACCREL, A.MITRATE, A.GRDIDNNO, A.GRDNAME, A.GRDBRDATE, A.ASSIGNIDNNO, A.ASSIGNNAME, A.ASSIGNBRDATE, A.ISSUYM, A.PAYYM, A.ISSUEAMT, A.ONCEPAYMK, A.OLDSENIAB, A.MUSTISSUEAMT, A.PAYDATE, A.PAYYMS, A.PAYYME, A.PAUSEYM, A.UNPAUSEYM, A.NOTIFYFORM, A.LOANMK, A.MEXCLVL, A.REALEXCLVL, A.CHKDATE, A.CHKMAN, A.RECHKDATE, A.RECHKMAN, A.EXEDATE, A.EXEMAN, A.ARCDATE, A.ARCPG, A.CLOSEDATE, A.CLOSECAUSE, A.PROMOTEUSER, A.DUPEIDNNOMK, A.CRTUSER, A.CRTTIME, A.UPDUSER, A.UPDTIME, A.EVTEXPIREDATE, A.EVTELIGIBLEDATE, A.EVTMISSINGDATE, A.LSINSMAMT, A.LSCHKMK, A.LSCOUNT, A.LNCHKMK, A.DABAPNO, A.DABANNUAMT, A.RESENIMK, A.OFFINSURDATE, A.LAWRETIREDATE, A.EVTAPPNAME, A.CUTAMT, A.ACCSEQNO, A.BENMARRMK, A.CHGMK, A.PAYAMTS, A.EVTAPPIDNNO, A.EVTAPPBRDATE, A.OLDAPLDPT, A.CHOICEYM, A.MOBILEPHONE, A.ANNUAMT, A.INTERVALMONTH, A.SPECIALACC, A.SPEACCDATE, A.UNQUALIFIEDCAUSE, A.ISSUNOTIFYINGMK, A.EVTJOBAGE, A.SAMTY, A.SAMTD, A.ONCETY, A.ONCEPAYM, A.ONCEISSUEAMT, A.MARGINAMT FROM BAAPPBASE A
1 = 0
A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
AND A.LNCHKMK = '1'
ORDER BY A.SEQNO

SELECT A.BAAPPBASEID, A.APNO, A.SEQNO, A.IMK, A.APITEM, A.PAYKIND, A.APPDATE, A.CASETYP, A.MAPNO, A.MAPROOTMK, A.COMBAPMARK, A.CASEMK, A.PROCSTAT, A.ACCEPTMK, A.MANCHKMK, A.CHGNOTE, A.EXESTAT, A.APUBNO, A.APUBNOCK, A.LSUBNO, A.LSUBNOCK, A.EVTIDS, A.EVTIDNNO, A.EVTNAME, A.EVTBRDATE, A.EVTSEX, A.EVTNATIONTPE, A.EVTNATIONCODE, A.EVTIDENT, A.EVTJOBDATE, A.EVTDATE, A.EVTDIEDATE, A.EVTAGE, A.BENIDS, A.BENIDNNO, A.BENNAME, A.BENBRDATE, A.BENSEX, A.BENNATIONTYP, A.BENNATIONCODE, A.BENEVTREL, A.BENDIEDATE, A.BENPAYMK, A.IDNCHKYM, A.IDNCHKNOTE, A.TEL1, A.TEL2, A.COMMTYP, A.COMMZIP, A.COMMADDR, A.PAYTYP, A.BANKNAME, A.PAYBANKID, A.BRANCHID, A.PAYEEACC, A.CHKPAYBANKID, A.CHKBRANCHID, A.CHKPAYEEACC, A.ACCIDN, A.ACCNAME, A.ACCREL, A.MITRATE, A.GRDIDNNO, A.GRDNAME, A.GRDBRDATE, A.ASSIGNIDNNO, A.ASSIGNNAME, A.ASSIGNBRDATE, A.ISSUYM, A.PAYYM, A.ISSUEAMT, A.ONCEPAYMK, A.OLDSENIAB, A.MUSTISSUEAMT, A.PAYDATE, A.PAYYMS, A.PAYYME, A.PAUSEYM, A.UNPAUSEYM, A.NOTIFYFORM, A.LOANMK, A.MEXCLVL, A.REALEXCLVL, A.CHKDATE, A.CHKMAN, A.RECHKDATE, A.RECHKMAN, A.EXEDATE, A.EXEMAN, A.ARCDATE, A.ARCPG, A.CLOSEDATE, A.CLOSECAUSE, A.PROMOTEUSER, A.DUPEIDNNOMK, A.CRTUSER, A.CRTTIME, A.UPDUSER, A.UPDTIME, A.EVTEXPIREDATE, A.EVTELIGIBLEDATE, A.EVTMISSINGDATE, A.LSINSMAMT, A.LSCHKMK, A.LSCOUNT, A.LNCHKMK, A.DABAPNO, A.DABANNUAMT, A.RESENIMK, A.OFFINSURDATE, A.LAWRETIREDATE, A.EVTAPPNAME, A.CUTAMT, A.ACCSEQNO, A.BENMARRMK, A.CHGMK, A.PAYAMTS, A.EVTAPPIDNNO, A.EVTAPPBRDATE, A.OLDAPLDPT, A.CHOICEYM, A.MOBILEPHONE, A.ANNUAMT, A.INTERVALMONTH, A.SPECIALACC, A.SPEACCDATE, A.UNQUALIFIEDCAUSE, A.ISSUNOTIFYINGMK, A.EVTJOBAGE, A.SAMTY, A.SAMTD, A.ONCETY, A.ONCEPAYM, A.ONCEISSUEAMT, A.MARGINAMT FROM BAAPPBASE A

A.BAAPPBASEID = #baappbaseId:NUMERIC#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE BAAPPBASE SET OLDSENIAB = #oldSeniab:VARCHAR#, RESENIMK = #reSeniMk:VARCHAR#, OFFINSURDATE = #offInsurDate:VARCHAR#, LAWRETIREDATE = #lawRetireDate:VARCHAR#, PROCSTAT = '01', UPDUSER = #updUser:VARCHAR#, UPDTIME = #updTime:VARCHAR#, DABAPNO = #dabApNo:VARCHAR#, CHKDATE = '', CHKMAN = '', RECHKDATE = '', RECHKMAN = '', EXEDATE = '', EXEMAN = '', MANCHKMK = '', ARCDATE = '', ARCPG = '' WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND PROCSTAT in ('01','10','11', '12','20','30')
sqlMap.select: Select BAAPPBASEID, APNO, SEQNO, IMK, APITEM, PAYKIND, APPDATE, CASETYP, MAPNO, MAPROOTMK, COMBAPMARK, CASEMK, PROCSTAT, ACCEPTMK, MANCHKMK, CHGNOTE, EXESTAT, APUBNO, APUBNOCK, LSUBNO, LSUBNOCK, EVTIDS, EVTIDNNO, EVTNAME, EVTBRDATE, EVTSEX, EVTNATIONTPE, EVTNATIONCODE, EVTIDENT, EVTJOBDATE, EVTDATE, EVTDIEDATE, EVTAGE, BENIDS, BENIDNNO, BENNAME, BENBRDATE, BENSEX, BENNATIONTYP, BENNATIONCODE, BENEVTREL, BENDIEDATE, BENPAYMK, IDNCHKYM, IDNCHKNOTE, TEL1, TEL2, COMMTYP, COMMZIP, COMMADDR, PAYTYP, BANKNAME, PAYBANKID, BRANCHID, PAYEEACC, CHKPAYBANKID, CHKBRANCHID, CHKPAYEEACC, ACCIDN, ACCNAME, ACCREL, MITRATE, GRDIDNNO, GRDNAME, GRDBRDATE, ASSIGNIDNNO, ASSIGNNAME, ASSIGNBRDATE, ISSUYM, PAYYM, ISSUEAMT, ONCEPAYMK, OLDSENIAB, MUSTISSUEAMT, PAYDATE, PAYYMS, PAYYME, PAUSEYM, UNPAUSEYM, NOTIFYFORM, LOANMK, MEXCLVL, REALEXCLVL, CHKDATE, CHKMAN, RECHKDATE, RECHKMAN, EXEDATE, EXEMAN, ARCDATE, ARCPG, CLOSEDATE, CLOSECAUSE, PROMOTEUSER, DUPEIDNNOMK, CRTUSER, CRTTIME, UPDUSER, UPDTIME, EVTEXPIREDATE, EVTELIGIBLEDATE, EVTMISSINGDATE, LSINSMAMT, LSCHKMK, LSCOUNT, LNCHKMK, DABAPNO, DABANNUAMT, RESENIMK, OFFINSURDATE, LAWRETIREDATE, EVTAPPNAME, CUTAMT, ACCSEQNO, BENMARRMK, CHGMK, PAYAMTS, EVTAPPIDNNO, EVTAPPBRDATE, OLDAPLDPT, CHOICEYM, MOBILEPHONE, ANNUAMT, INTERVALMONTH, SPECIALACC, SPEACCDATE, UNQUALIFIEDCAUSE, ISSUNOTIFYINGMK, EVTJOBAGE, SAMTY, SAMTD, ONCETY, ONCEPAYM, ONCEISSUEAMT, MARGINAMT From BAAPPBASE WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND PROCSTAT in ('01','10','11', '12','20','30')

Select BAAPPBASEID, APNO, SEQNO, IMK, APITEM, PAYKIND, APPDATE, CASETYP, MAPNO, MAPROOTMK, COMBAPMARK, CASEMK, PROCSTAT, ACCEPTMK, MANCHKMK, CHGNOTE, EXESTAT, APUBNO, APUBNOCK, LSUBNO, LSUBNOCK, EVTIDS, EVTIDNNO, EVTNAME, EVTBRDATE, EVTSEX, EVTNATIONTPE, EVTNATIONCODE, EVTIDENT, EVTJOBDATE, EVTDATE, EVTDIEDATE, EVTAGE, BENIDS, BENIDNNO, BENNAME, BENBRDATE, BENSEX, BENNATIONTYP, BENNATIONCODE, BENEVTREL, BENDIEDATE, BENPAYMK, IDNCHKYM, IDNCHKNOTE, TEL1, TEL2, COMMTYP, COMMZIP, COMMADDR, PAYTYP, BANKNAME, PAYBANKID, BRANCHID, PAYEEACC, CHKPAYBANKID, CHKBRANCHID, CHKPAYEEACC, ACCIDN, ACCNAME, ACCREL, MITRATE, GRDIDNNO, GRDNAME, GRDBRDATE, ASSIGNIDNNO, ASSIGNNAME, ASSIGNBRDATE, ISSUYM, PAYYM, ISSUEAMT, ONCEPAYMK, OLDSENIAB, MUSTISSUEAMT, PAYDATE, PAYYMS, PAYYME, PAUSEYM, UNPAUSEYM, NOTIFYFORM, LOANMK, MEXCLVL, REALEXCLVL, CHKDATE, CHKMAN, RECHKDATE, RECHKMAN, EXEDATE, EXEMAN, ARCDATE, ARCPG, CLOSEDATE, CLOSECAUSE, PROMOTEUSER, DUPEIDNNOMK, CRTUSER, CRTTIME, UPDUSER, UPDTIME, EVTEXPIREDATE, EVTELIGIBLEDATE, EVTMISSINGDATE, LSINSMAMT, LSCHKMK, LSCOUNT, LNCHKMK, DABAPNO, DABANNUAMT, RESENIMK, OFFINSURDATE, LAWRETIREDATE, EVTAPPNAME, CUTAMT, ACCSEQNO, BENMARRMK, CHGMK, PAYAMTS, EVTAPPIDNNO, EVTAPPBRDATE, OLDAPLDPT, CHOICEYM, MOBILEPHONE, ANNUAMT, INTERVALMONTH, SPECIALACC, SPEACCDATE, UNQUALIFIEDCAUSE, ISSUNOTIFYINGMK, EVTJOBAGE, SAMTY, SAMTD, ONCETY, ONCEPAYM, ONCEISSUEAMT, MARGINAMT From BAAPPBASE Where PROCSTAT = '50'

Order By CASETYP,APNO

Select BAAPPBASEID, APNO, SEQNO, IMK, APITEM, PAYKIND, APPDATE, CASETYP, MAPNO, MAPROOTMK, COMBAPMARK, CASEMK, PROCSTAT, ACCEPTMK, MANCHKMK, CHGNOTE, EXESTAT, APUBNO, APUBNOCK, LSUBNO, LSUBNOCK, EVTIDS, EVTIDNNO, EVTNAME, EVTBRDATE, EVTSEX, EVTNATIONTPE, EVTNATIONCODE, EVTIDENT, EVTJOBDATE, EVTDATE, EVTDIEDATE, EVTAGE, BENIDS, BENIDNNO, BENNAME, BENBRDATE, BENSEX, BENNATIONTYP, BENNATIONCODE, BENEVTREL, BENDIEDATE, BENPAYMK, IDNCHKYM, IDNCHKNOTE, TEL1, TEL2, COMMTYP, COMMZIP, COMMADDR, PAYTYP, BANKNAME, PAYBANKID, BRANCHID, PAYEEACC, CHKPAYBANKID, CHKBRANCHID, CHKPAYEEACC, ACCIDN, ACCNAME, ACCREL, MITRATE, GRDIDNNO, GRDNAME, GRDBRDATE, ASSIGNIDNNO, ASSIGNNAME, ASSIGNBRDATE, ISSUYM, PAYYM, ISSUEAMT, ONCEPAYMK, OLDSENIAB, MUSTISSUEAMT, PAYDATE, PAYYMS, PAYYME, PAUSEYM, UNPAUSEYM, NOTIFYFORM, LOANMK, MEXCLVL, REALEXCLVL, CHKDATE, CHKMAN, RECHKDATE, RECHKMAN, EXEDATE, EXEMAN, ARCDATE, ARCPG, CLOSEDATE, CLOSECAUSE, PROMOTEUSER, DUPEIDNNOMK, CRTUSER, CRTTIME, UPDUSER, UPDTIME, EVTEXPIREDATE, EVTELIGIBLEDATE, EVTMISSINGDATE, LSINSMAMT, LSCHKMK, LSCOUNT, LNCHKMK, DABAPNO, DABANNUAMT, RESENIMK, OFFINSURDATE, LAWRETIREDATE, EVTAPPNAME, CUTAMT, ACCSEQNO, BENMARRMK, CHGMK, PAYAMTS, EVTAPPIDNNO, EVTAPPBRDATE, OLDAPLDPT, CHOICEYM, MOBILEPHONE, ANNUAMT, INTERVALMONTH, SPECIALACC, SPEACCDATE, UNQUALIFIEDCAUSE, ISSUNOTIFYINGMK, EVTJOBAGE, SAMTY, SAMTD, ONCETY, ONCEPAYM, ONCEISSUEAMT, MARGINAMT From BAAPPBASE Where SEQNO = '0000'
1 = 0
APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
Order By APNO
sqlMap.update: UPDATE BAAPPBASE SET EVTNAME = #evtName:VARCHAR#, EVTBRDATE = #evtBrDate:VARCHAR#, EVTIDNNO = #evtIdnNo:VARCHAR#, EVTIDS = #evtIds:VARCHAR#, DUPEIDNNOMK = #dupeIdnNoMk:VARCHAR#, PROCSTAT = #procStat:VARCHAR#, UPDUSER = #updUser:VARCHAR#, UPDTIME = #updTime:VARCHAR#, CHKDATE = '', CHKMAN = '', RECHKDATE = '', RECHKMAN = '', EXEDATE = '', EXEMAN = '' WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND PROCSTAT IN ('01', '10', '11', '12', '20')

UPDATE BAAPPBASE SET BENNAME = #benName:VARCHAR#, BENBRDATE = #benBrDate:VARCHAR#, BENIDNNO = #benIdnNo:VARCHAR#, BENIDS = #benIds:VARCHAR#, PROCSTAT = #procStat:VARCHAR#, UPDUSER = #updUser:VARCHAR#, UPDTIME = #updTime:VARCHAR#, CHKDATE = '', CHKMAN = '', RECHKDATE = '', RECHKMAN = '', EXEDATE = '', EXEMAN = '' WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = '0000' AND PROCSTAT IN ('01', '10', '11', '12', '20')
sqlMap.select: Select count(*) as Q2 From BAAPPBASE Where APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# And BENPAYMK = '1' And BENEVTREL in ('2','3','4','5','6','7','C','E')

SELECT COUNT(*) as Q1 FROM (SELECT BAAPPBASEID, APNO, ISSUYM, CHKCODE FROM BACHKFILE WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND CHKCODE = '41') T1 ,(SELECT BAAPPBASEID, APNO, ISSUYM FROM BAAPPBASE A WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#) T2 WHERE T1.APNO = T2.APNO AND T1.BAAPPBASEID = T2.BAAPPBASEID AND T1.ISSUYM = T2.ISSUYM AND T1.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
Select count(*) as Q2 From BAAPPBASE Where APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# And SEQNO = '0000' And CLOSEDATE IS NULL And NVL(TRIM(CLOSECAUSE),' ') <> '1' And EVTDIEDATE IS NULL
SELECT COUNT(*) as Q3 FROM BAAPPBASE WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND BENEVTREL = 'Z'
SELECT COUNT(*) as Q4 FROM PBBMSA WHERE BMEVIDNO = #idnNo:VARCHAR# AND BMEVBRTH = #brDate:VARCHAR# AND SUBSTR(BMAPNO,5,2) = '46'

SELECT COUNT(*) AS Q4 FROM (SELECT APNO, ISSUYM, SEQNO, BENEVTREL, ACCSEQNO FROM BAAPPBASE WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND (SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR# OR ACCSEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR#) ) T1, (SELECT APNO, SEQNO, MTESTMK, APLPAYMK FROM BADAPR WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR# ) T2 WHERE T1.APNO = T2.APNO(+) AND T1.SEQNO = T2.SEQNO(+) AND ((T2.MTESTMK='F' AND (NVL(T2.APLPAYMK,' ')<>' ' AND T2.APLPAYMK IS NOT NULL) AND T1.BENEVTREL <> '1' AND T1.BENEVTREL <> 'F' AND T1.BENEVTREL <> 'N') OR (T1.SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR# AND (T1.BENEVTREL = '1' OR T1.BENEVTREL = 'F' OR T1.BENEVTREL = 'N')) OR (T1.ACCSEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR# AND T1.SEQNO <> #seqNo:VARCHAR# ))
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BAAPPBASE WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = '0000' AND EVTDIEDATE IS NULL
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BAAPPBASE WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND ACCSEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR# AND ACCREL = '3'

SELECT T.PAYTYP, T.BANKNAME, T.PAYBANKID, T.BRANCHID, T.PAYEEACC, T.CHKPAYBANKID, T.CHKBRANCHID, T.CHKPAYEEACC, T.ACCIDN, T.ACCNAME, T.MITRATE, T.INTERVALMONTH FROM BAAPPBASE T WHERE T.BAAPPBASEID = #baappbaseId:NUMERIC# AND T.SEQNO = #accSeqNo:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.delete:
DELETE FROM BAAPPBASE WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND BENPAYMK = '0'
1 = 0
SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR#
SEQNO like #seqNo:VARCHAR# || '%'

DELETE FROM BAAPPBASE
1 = 0
APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
SEQNO like #seqNo:VARCHAR#||'%'

sqlMap.update: UPDATE BAAPPBASE SET PROCSTAT = '01', UPDUSER = #updUser:VARCHAR#, UPDTIME = #updTime:VARCHAR#, CHKDATE = '', CHKMAN = '', RECHKDATE = '', RECHKMAN = '', EXEDATE = '', EXEMAN = '', MANCHKMK = '', ARCDATE = '', ARCPG = '' WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND PROCSTAT IN ('01', '10', '11', '12', '20', '30')
sqlMap.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS DATACOUNT FROM (SELECT APNO, ISSUYM FROM BAAPPBASE WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = '0000' AND CASETYP = '1' ) T1, (SELECT APNO, ISSUYM FROM BADAPR WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = '0000' AND (MTESTMK='D' OR MTESTMK='M') ) T2 WHERE T1.APNO = T2.APNO AND T1.ISSUYM = T2.ISSUYM

INSERT INTO BAAPPBASE ( BAAPPBASEID, APNO, SEQNO, IMK, APITEM, PAYKIND, APPDATE, CASETYP, PROCSTAT, APUBNO, EVTIDS, EVTIDNNO, EVTNAME, EVTAPPNAME, EVTBRDATE, EVTSEX, EVTNATIONTPE, EVTNATIONCODE, EVTIDENT, EVTJOBDATE, EVTAGE, BENIDS, BENIDNNO, BENNAME, BENBRDATE, BENSEX, BENNATIONTYP, BENNATIONCODE, BENEVTREL, BENPAYMK, TEL1, TEL2, COMMTYP, COMMZIP, COMMADDR, PAYTYP, GRDIDNNO, GRDNAME, GRDBRDATE, ACCREL, ACCSEQNO, ACCIDN, ACCNAME, BANKNAME, PAYBANKID, BRANCHID, PAYEEACC, CHKPAYBANKID, CHKBRANCHID, CHKPAYEEACC, CRTUSER, CRTTIME, PROMOTEUSER, MOBILEPHONE, APNOFM, SYSCODE ) VALUES ( #baappbaseId:NUMERIC#, #apNo:VARCHAR#, #seqNo:VARCHAR#, #imk:VARCHAR#, #apItem:VARCHAR#, #payKind:VARCHAR#, #appDate:VARCHAR#, #caseTyp:VARCHAR#, #procStat:VARCHAR#, #apUbno:VARCHAR#, #evtIds:VARCHAR#, #evtIdnNo:VARCHAR#, #evtName:VARCHAR#, #evtAppName:VARCHAR#, #evtBrDate:VARCHAR#, #evtSex:VARCHAR#, #evtNationTpe:VARCHAR#, #evtNationCode:VARCHAR#, #evtIdent:VARCHAR#, #evtJobDate:VARCHAR#, #evtAge:VARCHAR#, #benIds:VARCHAR#, #benIdnNo:VARCHAR#, #benName:VARCHAR#, #benBrDate:VARCHAR#, #benSex:VARCHAR#, #benNationTyp:VARCHAR#, #benNationCode:VARCHAR#, #benEvtRel:VARCHAR#, #benPayMk:VARCHAR#, #tel1:VARCHAR#, #tel2:VARCHAR#, #commTyp:VARCHAR#, #commZip:VARCHAR#, #commAddr:VARCHAR#, #payTyp:VARCHAR#, #grdIdnNo:VARCHAR#, #grdName:VARCHAR#, #grdBrDate:VARCHAR#, NVL(#accRel:VARCHAR#,'1'), #accSeqNo:VARCHAR#, #accIdn:VARCHAR#, #accName:VARCHAR#, #bankName:VARCHAR#, #payBankId:VARCHAR#, #branchId:VARCHAR#, #payEeacc:VARCHAR#, #chkPayBankId:VARCHAR#, #chkBranchId:VARCHAR#, #chkPayEeacc:VARCHAR#, #crtUser:VARCHAR#, #crtTime:VARCHAR#, #promoteUser:VARCHAR#, #mobilePhone:VARCHAR#, #apnoFm:VARCHAR#, #sysCode:VARCHAR# )

SELECT BAAPPBASEID.NEXTVAL AS BAAPPBASEID FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO BAAPPBASE ( BAAPPBASEID, APNO, SEQNO, IMK, APITEM, PAYKIND, APPDATE, CASETYP, MAPNO, COMBAPMARK, PROCSTAT, EVTIDS, EVTIDNNO, EVTBRDATE, EVTNAME, EVTSEX, EVTNATIONTPE, EVTNATIONCODE, EVTIDENT, EVTJOBDATE, EVTDIEDATE, BENIDS, BENIDNNO, BENNAME, BENBRDATE, BENSEX, BENEVTREL, TEL1, TEL2, COMMTYP, COMMZIP, COMMADDR, PAYTYP, PAYBANKID, BRANCHID, PAYEEACC, ACCIDN, ACCNAME, ACCREL, GRDIDNNO, GRDNAME, GRDBRDATE, CLOSEDATE, NOTIFYFORM, CRTUSER, CRTTIME ) VALUES ( #baappbaseId:NUMERIC#, #apNo:VARCHAR#, #seqNo:VARCHAR#, #imk:VARCHAR#, #apItem:VARCHAR#, #payKind:VARCHAR#, #appDate:VARCHAR#, #caseTyp:VARCHAR#, #mapNo:VARCHAR#, #combapMark:VARCHAR#, #procStat:VARCHAR#, #evtIds:VARCHAR#, #evtIdnNo:VARCHAR#, #evtBrDate:VARCHAR#, #evtName:VARCHAR#, #evtSex:VARCHAR#, #evtNationTpe:VARCHAR#, #evtNationCode:VARCHAR#, #evtIdent:VARCHAR#, #evtJobDate:VARCHAR#, #evtDieDate:VARCHAR#, #benIds:VARCHAR#, #benIdnNo:VARCHAR#, #benName:VARCHAR#, #benBrDate:VARCHAR#, #benSex:VARCHAR#, #benEvtRel:VARCHAR#, #tel1:VARCHAR#, #tel2:VARCHAR#, #commTyp:VARCHAR#, #commZip:VARCHAR#, #commAddr:VARCHAR#, #payTyp:VARCHAR#, #payBankId:VARCHAR#, #branchId:VARCHAR#, #payEeacc:VARCHAR#, #accIdn:VARCHAR#, #accName:VARCHAR#, NVL(#accRel:VARCHAR#,'1'), #grdIdnNo:VARCHAR#, #grdName:VARCHAR#, #grdBrDate:VARCHAR#, #closeDate:VARCHAR#, #notifyForm:VARCHAR#, #crtUser:VARCHAR#, #crtTime:VARCHAR# )
sqlMap.update: update BAAPPBASE set APPDATE = #appDate:VARCHAR#, APUBNO = #apUbno:VARCHAR#, EVTIDS = #evtIds:VARCHAR#, EVTIDNNO = #evtIdnNo:VARCHAR#, EVTNAME = #evtName:VARCHAR#, EVTAPPNAME = #evtAppName:VARCHAR#, EVTBRDATE = #evtBrDate:VARCHAR#, EVTSEX = #evtSex:VARCHAR#, EVTNATIONTPE = #evtNationTpe:VARCHAR#, EVTNATIONCODE = #evtNationCode:VARCHAR#, EVTJOBDATE = #evtJobDate:VARCHAR#, EVTAGE = #evtAge:VARCHAR#, BENIDS = #benIds:VARCHAR#, BENIDNNO = #benIdnNo:VARCHAR#, BENNAME = #benName:VARCHAR#, BENBRDATE = #benBrDate:VARCHAR#, BENSEX = #benSex:VARCHAR#, BENNATIONTYP = #benNationTyp:VARCHAR#, BENNATIONCODE = #benNationCode:VARCHAR#, TEL1 = #tel1:VARCHAR#, TEL2 = #tel2:VARCHAR#, COMMTYP = #commTyp:VARCHAR#, COMMZIP = #commZip:VARCHAR#, COMMADDR = #commAddr:VARCHAR#, PAYTYP = #payTyp:VARCHAR#, GRDIDNNO = #grdIdnNo:VARCHAR#, GRDNAME = #grdName:VARCHAR#, GRDBRDATE = #grdBrDate:VARCHAR#, ACCIDN = #accIdn:VARCHAR#, ACCNAME = #accName:VARCHAR#, BANKNAME = #bankName:VARCHAR#, PAYBANKID = #payBankId:VARCHAR#, BRANCHID = #branchId:VARCHAR#, PAYEEACC = #payEeacc:VARCHAR#, CHKPAYBANKID = #chkPayBankId:VARCHAR#, CHKBRANCHID = #chkBranchId:VARCHAR#, CHKPAYEEACC = #chkPayEeacc:VARCHAR#, UPDUSER = #updUser:VARCHAR#, UPDTIME = #updTime:VARCHAR#, MOBILEPHONE = #mobilePhone:VARCHAR# where BAAPPBASEID = #baappbaseId:NUMERIC# and PROCSTAT = #procStat:VARCHAR#

update BAAPPBASE set APPDATE = #appDate:VARCHAR#, BENIDNNO = #benIdnNo:VARCHAR#, BENNAME = #benName:VARCHAR#, BENBRDATE = #benBrDate:VARCHAR#, BENSEX = #benSex:VARCHAR#, BENNATIONTYP = #benNationTyp:VARCHAR#, BENNATIONCODE = #benNationCode:VARCHAR#, BENEVTREL = #benEvtRel:VARCHAR#, MONINCOMEMK = #monIncomeMk:VARCHAR#, MONINCOME = #monIncome:NUMERIC#, STUDMK = #studMk:VARCHAR#, MARRYDATE = #marryDate:VARCHAR#, RAISECHILD = #raiseChild:VARCHAR#, HANDICAP = #handIcap:VARCHAR#, INTERDICTMK = #interDictMk:VARCHAR#, UPDUSER = #updUser:VARCHAR#, UPDTIME = #updTime:VARCHAR# where BAAPPBASEID = #baappbaseId:NUMERIC#
AND 1 = 0

SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR#

SELECT A.BAAPPBASEID, A.APNO, A.SEQNO, A.IMK, A.APITEM, A.PAYKIND, A.APPDATE, A.CASETYP, A.MAPNO, A.MAPROOTMK, A.COMBAPMARK, A.CASEMK, A.PROCSTAT, A.ACCEPTMK, A.MANCHKMK, A.CHGNOTE, A.EXESTAT, A.APUBNO, A.APUBNOCK, A.LSUBNO, A.LSUBNOCK, A.EVTIDS, A.EVTIDNNO, A.EVTNAME, A.EVTBRDATE, A.EVTSEX, A.EVTNATIONTPE, A.EVTNATIONCODE, A.EVTIDENT, A.EVTJOBDATE, A.EVTDATE, A.EVTDIEDATE, A.EVTAGE, A.BENIDS, A.BENIDNNO, A.BENNAME, A.BENBRDATE, A.BENSEX, A.BENNATIONTYP, A.BENNATIONCODE, A.BENEVTREL, A.BENDIEDATE, A.BENPAYMK, A.IDNCHKYM, A.IDNCHKNOTE, A.TEL1, A.TEL2, A.COMMTYP, A.COMMZIP, A.COMMADDR, A.PAYTYP, A.BANKNAME, A.PAYBANKID, A.BRANCHID, A.PAYEEACC, A.ACCIDN, A.ACCNAME, A.ACCREL, A.MITRATE, A.GRDIDNNO, A.GRDNAME, A.GRDBRDATE, A.ASSIGNIDNNO, A.ASSIGNNAME, A.ASSIGNBRDATE, A.ISSUYM, A.PAYYM, A.ISSUEAMT, A.ONCEPAYMK, A.OLDSENIAB, A.MUSTISSUEAMT, A.PAYDATE, A.PAYYMS, A.PAYYME, A.PAUSEYM, A.UNPAUSEYM, A.NOTIFYFORM, A.LOANMK, A.MEXCLVL, A.REALEXCLVL, A.CHKDATE, A.CHKMAN, A.RECHKDATE, A.RECHKMAN, A.EXEDATE, A.EXEMAN, A.ARCDATE, A.ARCPG, A.CLOSEDATE, A.CLOSECAUSE, A.PROMOTEUSER, A.DUPEIDNNOMK, A.CRTUSER, A.CRTTIME, A.UPDUSER, A.UPDTIME, A.EVTEXPIREDATE, A.EVTELIGIBLEDATE, A.EVTMISSINGDATE, A.LSINSMAMT, A.LSCHKMK, A.LSCOUNT, A.LNCHKMK, A.DABAPNO, A.DABANNUAMT, A.RESENIMK, A.OFFINSURDATE, A.LAWRETIREDATE, A.EVTAPPNAME, A.CUTAMT, A.ACCSEQNO, A.BENMARRMK, A.CHGMK, A.MONINCOMEMK, A.MONINCOME, A.STUDMK, A.MARRYDATE, A.CRIINPART1, A.CRIINPART2, A.CRIINPART3, A.CRIMEDIUM, A.CRIINJDP1, A.CRIINJDP2, A.CRIINJDP3, A.CRIINJDP4, A.CRIINJDP5, A.CRIINJDP6, A.CRIINJDP7, A.CRIINJDP8, A.CRIINJDP9, A.CRIINJDP10, A.CRIINJNME1, A.CRIINJNME2, A.CRIINJNME3, A.CRIINJNME4, A.HOSID, A.DOCTORNAME1, A.DOCTORNAME2, A.EVCODE, A.EVTYP, A.RAISECHILD, A.HANDICAP, A.INTERDICTMK FROM BAAPPBASE A
1 = 0
A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
A.SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR#
A.SEQNO < #seqNo:VARCHAR#
A.SEQNO <= #seqNo:VARCHAR#
A.SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR#
A.SEQNO >= #seqNo:VARCHAR#
A.SEQNO > #seqNo:VARCHAR#
A.SEQNO != #seqNo:VARCHAR#
ORDER BY A.APNO, A.SEQNO

SELECT A.BAAPPBASEID, A.APNO, A.APUBNO, A.APPDATE, A.EVTNATIONTPE, A.EVTNATIONCODE, A.EVTSEX, A.EVTNAME, A.EVTIDNNO, A.EVTBRDATE, A.TEL1, A.TEL2, A.COMMTYP, A.COMMZIP, A.COMMADDR, A.GRDIDNNO, A.GRDNAME, A.GRDBRDATE, A.PAYTYP, A.PAYBANKID, A.BRANCHID, A.PAYEEACC, A.CHKPAYBANKID, A.CHKBRANCHID, A.CHKPAYEEACC, A.EVTJOBDATE, A.MOBILEPHONE, B.BAAPPEXPANDID, B.EVAPPTYP, B.EVTYP, B.EVCODE, B.CRIINPART1, B.CRIINPART2, B.CRIINPART3, B.CRIMEDIUM, B.CRIINJDP1, B.CRIINJDP2, B.CRIINJDP3, B.CRIINJDP4, B.CRIINJDP5, B.CRIINJDP6, B.CRIINJDP7, B.CRIINJDP8, B.CRIINJDP9, B.CRIINJDP10, B.HOSID, B.CRIINJNME1, B.CRIINJNME2, B.CRIINJNME3, B.CRIINJNME4, B.DOCTORNAME1, B.DOCTORNAME2, B.HANDICAPMK, B.INJDTE, B.FVISITDTE, B.LSURGERYDTE, B.LSRADIATIONDTE, B.FORINSADDR FROM BAAPPBASE A, BAAPPEXPAND B WHERE A.BAAPPBASEID = B.BAAPPBASEID AND A.BAAPPBASEID = #baappbaseId:NUMERIC#
AND 1 = 0
A.SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR#
A.PROCSTAT = #procStat:VARCHAR#
A.PROCSTAT in
A.PROCSTAT not in
#procStat[]#

SELECT BAAPPBASEID, APNO, APPDATE, EVTNAME, EVTBRDATE, EVTIDNNO, APITEM FROM BAAPPBASE
1 = 0
EVTIDNNO = #evtIdnNo:VARCHAR#
APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR#
PROCSTAT = #procStat:VARCHAR#
PROCSTAT in
PROCSTAT not in
#procStat[]#
APNO LIKE #payKind# ||'%'
ORDER BY BAAPPBASEID

SELECT A.BaappbaseId, A.APNO, A.SEQNO, A.BENNAME, A.APPDATE, A.BENIDNNO, A.BENBRDATE, A.BENDIEDATE, A.TEL1, A.TEL2, A.BENEVTREL, A.PAYTYP, A.BENMARRMK, A.PAYBANKID, A.BRANCHID, A.PAYEEACC, A.ACCNAME, A.COMMTYP, A.COMMZIP, A.COMMADDR, A.BENNATIONTYP, A.BENNATIONCODE, A.BENSEX, A.IDNCHKYM, A.CLOSEDATE, A.CLOSECAUSE, A.GRDIDNNO, A.GRDNAME, A.GRDBRDATE, A.RESENIMK, A.BANKNAME, A.SPECIALACC, A.SPEACCDATE, B.MARRYDATE, B.DIGAMYDATE, B.MONINCOMEMK, B.MONINCOME, B.STUDMK, B.HANDICAPMK, B.ADOPTDATE, B.RAISECHILDMK, B.ABANAPSYM, B.RELATCHGDATE, B.BENMISSINGSDATE, B.BENMISSINGEDATE, B.PRISONSDATE, B.PRISONEDATE, B.INTERDICTDATE, B.RAISEEVTMK, B.ABLEAPSYM, B.SAVINGMK, B.ASSIGNIDNNO, B.ASSIGNNAME, B.ASSIGNBRDATE, C.TERMCOUNT, C.STUDSDATE, C.STUDEDATE, B.INTERDICTMK, B.REPEALINTERDICTDATE, B.SCHOOLCODE FROM BAAPPBASE A, BAAPPEXPAND B, (SELECT APNO, SEQNO, COUNT(APNO) AS TERMCOUNT, MIN(STUDSDATE) AS STUDSDATE, MAX(STUDEDATE) AS STUDEDATE FROM BASTUDTERM WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR# GROUP BY APNO, SEQNO) C WHERE A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
AND A.SEQNO <> '0000'
AND A.SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR# AND A.APNO = B.APNO AND A.SEQNO = B.SEQNO AND A.APNO = C.APNO (+) ORDER BY A.APPDATE, A.SEQNO

SELECT DISTINCT A.BAAPPBASEID, A.APNO, A.SEQNO, A.BENNAME, A.APPDATE, A.BENIDNNO, A.BENBRDATE, A.TEL1, A.TEL2, A.BENEVTREL, A.PAYTYP, A.PAYBANKID, A.BRANCHID, A.PAYEEACC, A.ACCNAME, A.COMMTYP, A.COMMZIP, A.COMMADDR, A.BENNATIONTYP, A.BENSEX, A.BENNATIONCODE, A.BENMARRMK, A.GRDNAME, A.GRDBRDATE, A.GRDIDNNO, B.ASSIGNNAME, B.ASSIGNBRDATE, B.ASSIGNIDNNO, B.SAVINGMK, A.ISSUYM FROM BAAPPBASE A, BAAPPEXPAND B WHERE A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
AND A.SEQNO <> '0000' AND SUBSTR(A.SEQNO, 3, 2) <> '00'
AND A.APNO = B.APNO AND B.SEQNO = B.SEQNO ORDER BY A.APPDATE

SELECT A.SEQNO, A.BENNAME, A.BENDIEDATE FROM BAAPPBASE A WHERE A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND A.SEQNO = SUBSTR(#seqNo:VARCHAR#, 1, 2) || '00'
AND (A.SEQNO <> #seqNo:VARCHAR# AND A.SEQNO <> '0000')

SELECT T.BAAPPBASEID, T.APNO, T.SEQNO, T.PROCSTAT, T.APPDATE, T.EVTNAME, T.EVTIDNNO, T.EVTBRDATE, T.APITEM FROM BAAPPBASE T WHERE T.APNO LIKE 'S%'

T.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#

ORDER BY T.APPDATE, T.APNO

AND 1 = 0
