A.PROCSTAT in
A.PROCSTAT not in
#procStat[]#

SELECT A.BAAPPBASEID, A.APNO, A.SEQNO, A.APUBNO, A.APITEM, A.APPDATE, A.EVTNATIONTPE, A.EVTNATIONCODE, A.EVTSEX, A.EVTNAME, A.EVTIDNNO, A.EVTBRDATE, A.EVTIDS, A.EVTAPPNAME, A.EVTJOBDATE, A.EVTDIEDATE, A.EVTAGE, A.BENNATIONTYP, A.BENNATIONCODE, A.BENSEX, A.BENNAME, A.BENIDNNO, A.BENBRDATE, A.BENEVTREL, A.TEL1, A.TEL2, A.COMMTYP, A.COMMZIP, A.COMMADDR, A.GRDIDNNO, A.GRDNAME, A.GRDBRDATE, A.PAYTYP, A.PAYBANKID, A.BRANCHID, A.PAYEEACC, A.CHKPAYBANKID, A.CHKBRANCHID, A.CHKPAYEEACC, A.ACCREL, A.ACCSEQNO, A.MOBILEPHONE, B.BAAPPEXPANDID, B.EVAPPTYP, B.EVTYP, B.MARRYDATE, B.STUDMK, B.MONINCOMEMK, B.MONINCOME, B.HANDICAPMK, B.INTERDICTMK FROM BAAPPBASE A, BAAPPEXPAND B WHERE A.BAAPPBASEID = B.BAAPPBASEID AND A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
AND 1 = 0
A.SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR#
A.PROCSTAT = #procStat:VARCHAR#
A.PROCSTAT in
A.PROCSTAT not in
#procStat[]#
ORDER BY A.SEQNO

SELECT COUNT(*) AS DATACOUNT FROM (SELECT APNO, ISSUYM FROM BAAPPBASE WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = '0000' AND PROCSTAT IN ('10','11','12','20')) T1 ,(SELECT A.APNO, A.ISSUYM FROM MAADMREC A WHERE A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND A.LETTERTYPE = '21' AND A.PRODATE = (SELECT MAX(PRODATE) FROM MAADMREC WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND LETTERTYPE = '21' )) T2 WHERE T1.APNO = T2.APNO AND T1.ISSUYM = T2.ISSUYM
SELECT LPAD(NVL(MAX(SUBSTR(SEQNO,1,2)),0)+1,2,'0')||'00' FROM BAAPPBASE WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
SELECT MAX(APNO) AS MAXAPNO FROM BAAPPBASE WHERE APNO LIKE 'K2%'
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT BAAPPBASEID.NEXTVAL AS BAAPPBASEID FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO BAAPPBASE ( BAAPPBASEID, APNO, SEQNO, IMK, APITEM, PAYKIND, APPDATE, CASETYP, PROCSTAT, APUBNO, EVTIDS, EVTIDNNO, EVTNAME, EVTAPPNAME, EVTBRDATE, EVTSEX, EVTNATIONTPE, EVTNATIONCODE, EVTIDENT, EVTJOBDATE, EVTDIEDATE, EVTAGE, BENEVTREL, BENPAYMK, NOTIFYFORM, ACCSEQNO, MITRATE, CRTUSER, CRTTIME, APNOFM, SYSCODE ) values ( #baappbaseId:NUMERIC#, #apNo:VARCHAR#, #seqNo:VARCHAR#, #imk:VARCHAR#, #apItem:VARCHAR#, #payKind:VARCHAR#, #appDate:VARCHAR#, #caseTyp:VARCHAR#, #procStat:VARCHAR#, #apUbno:VARCHAR#, #evtIds:VARCHAR#, #evtIdnNo:VARCHAR#, #evtName:VARCHAR#, #evtAppName:VARCHAR#, #evtBrDate:VARCHAR#, #evtSex:VARCHAR#, #evtNationTpe:VARCHAR#, #evtNationCode:VARCHAR#, #evtIdent:VARCHAR#, #evtJobDate:VARCHAR#, #evtDieDate:VARCHAR#, #evtAge:VARCHAR#, #benEvtRel:VARCHAR#, #benPayMk:VARCHAR#, #notifyForm:VARCHAR#, #accSeqNo:VARCHAR#, #mitRate:NUMERIC#, #crtUser:VARCHAR#, #crtTime:VARCHAR#, #apnoFm:VARCHAR#, #sysCode:VARCHAR# )

SELECT BAAPPBASEID.NEXTVAL AS BAAPPBASEID FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO BAAPPBASE ( BAAPPBASEID, APNO, SEQNO, IMK, APITEM, PAYKIND, APPDATE, CASETYP, PROCSTAT, APUBNO, EVTIDS, EVTIDNNO, EVTNAME, EVTAPPNAME, EVTBRDATE, EVTSEX, EVTNATIONTPE, EVTNATIONCODE, EVTIDENT, EVTJOBDATE, EVTDIEDATE, EVTAGE, BENIDS, BENIDNNO, BENNAME, BENBRDATE, BENSEX, BENNATIONTYP, BENNATIONCODE, BENEVTREL, BENPAYMK, NOTIFYFORM, TEL1, TEL2, COMMTYP, COMMZIP, COMMADDR, PAYTYP, GRDIDNNO, GRDNAME, GRDBRDATE, ACCREL, ACCSEQNO, ACCIDN, ACCNAME, BANKNAME, PAYBANKID, BRANCHID, PAYEEACC, CHKPAYBANKID, CHKBRANCHID, CHKPAYEEACC, CRTUSER, CRTTIME, MOBILEPHONE, MITRATE, SPECIALACC, APNOFM, SYSCODE, BENMARRMK ) VALUES ( #baappbaseId:NUMERIC#, #apNo:VARCHAR#, #seqNo:VARCHAR#, #imk:VARCHAR#, #apItem:VARCHAR#, #payKind:VARCHAR#, #appDate:VARCHAR#, #caseTyp:VARCHAR#, #procStat:VARCHAR#, #apUbno:VARCHAR#, #evtIds:VARCHAR#, #evtIdnNo:VARCHAR#, #evtName:VARCHAR#, #evtAppName:VARCHAR#, #evtBrDate:VARCHAR#, #evtSex:VARCHAR#, #evtNationTpe:VARCHAR#, #evtNationCode:VARCHAR#, #evtIdent:VARCHAR#, #evtJobDate:VARCHAR#, #evtDieDate:VARCHAR#, #evtAge:VARCHAR#, #benIds:VARCHAR#, #benIdnNo:VARCHAR#, #benName:VARCHAR#, #benBrDate:VARCHAR#, #benSex:VARCHAR#, #benNationTyp:VARCHAR#, #benNationCode:VARCHAR#, #benEvtRel:VARCHAR#, #benPayMk:VARCHAR#, #notifyForm:VARCHAR#, #tel1:VARCHAR#, #tel2:VARCHAR#, #commTyp:VARCHAR#, #commZip:VARCHAR#, #commAddr:VARCHAR#, #payTyp:VARCHAR#, #grdIdnNo:VARCHAR#, #grdName:VARCHAR#, #grdBrDate:VARCHAR#, NVL(#accRel:VARCHAR#,'1'), #accSeqNo:VARCHAR#, #accIdn:VARCHAR#, #accName:VARCHAR#, #bankName:VARCHAR#, #payBankId:VARCHAR#, #branchId:VARCHAR#, #payEeacc:VARCHAR#, #chkPayBankId:VARCHAR#, #chkBranchId:VARCHAR#, #chkPayEeacc:VARCHAR#, #crtUser:VARCHAR#, #crtTime:VARCHAR#, #mobilePhone:VARCHAR#, #mitRate:NUMERIC#, #specialAcc:NUMERIC#, #apnoFm:VARCHAR#, #sysCode:VARCHAR#, #benMarrMk:VARCHAR# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE BAAPPBASE SET APPDATE = DECODE(SEQNO,'0000',#appDate:VARCHAR#,APPDATE), APITEM = #apItem:VARCHAR#, APUBNO = #apUbno:VARCHAR#, EVTIDS = #evtIds:VARCHAR#, EVTIDNNO = #evtIdnNo:VARCHAR#, EVTNAME = #evtName:VARCHAR#, EVTAPPNAME = #evtAppName:VARCHAR#, EVTBRDATE = #evtBrDate:VARCHAR#, EVTSEX = #evtSex:VARCHAR#, EVTNATIONTPE = #evtNationTpe:VARCHAR#, EVTNATIONCODE = #evtNationCode:VARCHAR#, EVTJOBDATE = #evtJobDate:VARCHAR#, EVTDIEDATE = #evtDieDate:VARCHAR#, EVTAGE = #evtAge:VARCHAR#, NOTIFYFORM = #notifyForm:VARCHAR#, UPDUSER = #updUser:VARCHAR#, UPDTIME = #updTime:VARCHAR# WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND PROCSTAT = '00'

UPDATE BAAPPBASE SET APPDATE = #appDate:VARCHAR#, BENIDS = #benIds:VARCHAR#, BENIDNNO = #benIdnNo:VARCHAR#, BENNAME = #benName:VARCHAR#, BENBRDATE = #benBrDate:VARCHAR#, BENSEX = #benSex:VARCHAR#, BENNATIONTYP = #benNationTyp:VARCHAR#, BENNATIONCODE = #benNationCode:VARCHAR#, BENEVTREL = #benEvtRel:VARCHAR#, TEL1 = #tel1:VARCHAR#, TEL2 = #tel2:VARCHAR#, COMMTYP = #commTyp:VARCHAR#, COMMZIP = #commZip:VARCHAR#, COMMADDR = #commAddr:VARCHAR#, PAYTYP = #payTyp:VARCHAR#, GRDIDNNO = #grdIdnNo:VARCHAR#, GRDNAME = #grdName:VARCHAR#, GRDBRDATE = #grdBrDate:VARCHAR#, ACCREL = NVL(#accRel:VARCHAR#,'1'), ACCSEQNO = #accSeqNo:VARCHAR#, ACCIDN = #accIdn:VARCHAR#, ACCNAME = #accName:VARCHAR#, BANKNAME = #bankName:VARCHAR#, PAYBANKID = #payBankId:VARCHAR#, BRANCHID = #branchId:VARCHAR#, PAYEEACC = #payEeacc:VARCHAR#, CHKPAYBANKID = #chkPayBankId:VARCHAR#, CHKBRANCHID = #chkBranchId:VARCHAR#, CHKPAYEEACC = #chkPayEeacc:VARCHAR#, NOTIFYFORM = #notifyForm:VARCHAR#, UPDUSER = #updUser:VARCHAR#, UPDTIME = #updTime:VARCHAR#, MOBILEPHONE = #mobilePhone:VARCHAR# WHERE BAAPPBASEID = #baappbaseId:NUMERIC# AND PROCSTAT = '00'
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM BAAPPBASE T WHERE T.BAAPPBASEID = #baappbaseId:NUMERIC# AND T.PROCSTAT = #procStat:VARCHAR#
DELETE FROM BAAPPBASE T WHERE T.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND T.PROCSTAT = '00'
sqlMap.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS DATACOUNT FROM (SELECT APNO, SEQNO FROM BAAPPBASE WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = '0000' AND (BENEVTREL = '2' OR BENEVTREL = '3' OR BENEVTREL = '4' OR BENEVTREL = '5' OR BENEVTREL = '6' OR BENEVTREL = '7' OR BENEVTREL = 'A' OR BENEVTREL = 'C' OR BENEVTREL = 'E' OR BENEVTREL = 'O' OR BENEVTREL = 'Z' ) ) T1, (SELECT APNO, SEQNO FROM BADAPR WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = '0000' AND MTESTMK = 'F' AND NVL(APLPAYMK,' ')<>' ' AND APLPAYMK IS NOT NULL ) T2 WHERE T1.APNO = T2.APNO AND T1.SEQNO = T2.SEQNO
SELECT T.BAAPPBASEID FROM BAAPPBASE T WHERE T.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND T.ACCSEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR# AND T.ACCREL = '3'

SELECT T.PAYTYP, T.BANKNAME, T.PAYBANKID, T.BRANCHID, T.PAYEEACC, T.CHKPAYBANKID, T.CHKBRANCHID, T.CHKPAYEEACC, T.ACCIDN, T.ACCNAME, T.MITRATE, T.INTERVALMONTH FROM BAAPPBASE T WHERE T.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND T.SEQNO = #accSeqNo:VARCHAR#
SELECT COUNT(*) as Q1 From BAAPPBASE Where APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# And SEQNO = '0000' And PROCSTAT LIKE '1%'
SELECT COUNT(*) as Q2 From BAAPPBASE Where APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# And SEQNO = '0000' And PROCSTAT in ('98','99')
SELECT COUNT(*) as Q3 From BAAPPBASE Where APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# And PROCSTAT in ('98','99')
SELECT T.PROCSTAT FROM BAAPPBASE T WHERE T.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND T.SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE BAAPPBASE SET CHKDATE = '' ,CHKMAN = '' ,RECHKDATE = '' ,RECHKMAN = '' ,EXEDATE = '' ,EXEMAN = '' ,PROCSTAT = '01' WHERE APNO = #apno:VARCHAR# AND PROCSTAT IN ('01', '10', '11', '12', '20')
UPDATE BAAPPBASE SET CLOSEDATE = '' WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND PROCSTAT IN ('01', '10', '11', '12', '20')
sqlMap.select: SELECT A.BAAPPBASEID, A.APNO, A.SEQNO, A.IMK, A.APITEM, A.PAYKIND, A.APPDATE, A.CASETYP, A.MAPNO, A.MAPROOTMK, A.COMBAPMARK, A.CASEMK, A.PROCSTAT, A.ACCEPTMK, A.MANCHKMK, A.CHGNOTE, A.EXESTAT, A.APUBNO, A.APUBNOCK, A.LSUBNO, A.LSUBNOCK, A.EVTIDS, A.EVTIDNNO, A.EVTNAME, A.EVTBRDATE, A.EVTSEX, A.EVTNATIONTPE, A.EVTNATIONCODE, A.EVTIDENT, A.EVTJOBDATE, A.EVTDATE, A.EVTDIEDATE, A.EVTAGE, A.BENIDS, A.BENIDNNO, A.BENNAME, A.BENBRDATE, A.BENSEX, A.BENNATIONTYP, A.BENNATIONCODE, A.BENEVTREL, A.BENDIEDATE, A.BENPAYMK, A.IDNCHKYM, A.IDNCHKNOTE, A.TEL1, A.TEL2, A.COMMTYP, A.COMMZIP, A.COMMADDR, A.PAYTYP, A.BANKNAME, A.PAYBANKID, A.BRANCHID, A.PAYEEACC, A.CHKPAYBANKID, A.CHKBRANCHID, A.CHKPAYEEACC, A.ACCIDN, A.ACCNAME, A.ACCREL, A.MITRATE, A.GRDIDNNO, A.GRDNAME, A.GRDBRDATE, A.ASSIGNIDNNO, A.ASSIGNNAME, A.ASSIGNBRDATE, A.ISSUYM, A.PAYYM, A.ISSUEAMT, A.ONCEPAYMK, A.OLDSENIAB, A.MUSTISSUEAMT, A.PAYDATE, A.PAYYMS, A.PAYYME, A.PAUSEYM, A.UNPAUSEYM, A.NOTIFYFORM, A.LOANMK, A.MEXCLVL, A.REALEXCLVL, A.CHKDATE, A.CHKMAN, A.RECHKDATE, A.RECHKMAN, A.EXEDATE, A.EXEMAN, A.ARCDATE, A.ARCPG, A.CLOSEDATE, A.CLOSECAUSE, A.PROMOTEUSER, A.DUPEIDNNOMK, A.CRTUSER, A.CRTTIME, A.UPDUSER, A.UPDTIME, A.EVTEXPIREDATE, A.EVTELIGIBLEDATE, A.EVTMISSINGDATE, A.LSINSMAMT, A.LSCHKMK, A.LSCOUNT, A.LNCHKMK, A.DABAPNO, A.DABANNUAMT, A.RESENIMK, A.OFFINSURDATE, A.LAWRETIREDATE, A.EVTAPPNAME, A.CUTAMT, A.ACCSEQNO, A.BENMARRMK, A.CHGMK, A.PAYAMTS, A.EVTAPPIDNNO, A.EVTAPPBRDATE, A.OLDAPLDPT, A.CHOICEYM, A.MOBILEPHONE, A.ANNUAMT, A.INTERVALMONTH, A.SPECIALACC, A.SPEACCDATE, A.UNQUALIFIEDCAUSE, A.ISSUNOTIFYINGMK, A.EVTJOBAGE, A.SAMTY, A.SAMTD, A.ONCETY, A.ONCEPAYM, A.ONCEISSUEAMT, A.MARGINAMT FROM BAAPPBASE A WHERE APNO = #apno:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = '0000'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS Q3 FROM BAAPPBASE WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = '0000' AND PROCSTAT IN ('10','11','12','20')

SELECT A.APNO, A.EVTNAME, A.EVTIDNNO, A.EVTBRDATE, A.EVTJOBDATE, A.ISSUYM, A.APPDATE, A.PROCSTAT, A.CASETYP, A.REGETCIPBMK, A.BAAPPBASEID, A.PAYKIND FROM BAAPPBASE A WHERE A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND A.SEQNO = '0000' AND (A.CASEMK <> 'D' OR A.CASEMK IS NULL)
SELECT A.APNO, A.SEQNO, A.BENIDNNO, A.BENNAME, A.BENEVTREL, A.BENDIEDATE FROM BAAPPBASE A WHERE A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND (A.CASEMK <> 'D' OR A.CASEMK IS NULL) ORDER BY A.SEQNO

SELECT A.APNO, A.EVTNAME, A.EVTIDNNO, A.EVTBRDATE, A.EVTJOBDATE, A.ISSUYM, A.APPDATE, A.PROCSTAT, A.CASETYP, A.REGETCIPBMK FROM BAAPPBASE A WHERE A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND A.SEQNO = '0000' AND (A.CASEMK <> 'D' OR A.CASEMK IS NULL)
SELECT A.APNO, A.SEQNO, A.BENIDNNO, A.BENNAME, A.BENEVTREL, A.BENDIEDATE, A.APPDATE FROM BAAPPBASE A WHERE A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND (A.CASEMK <> 'D' OR A.CASEMK IS NULL) ORDER BY A.SEQNO

SELECT A.BAAPPBASEID, A.APNO, A.SEQNO, A.IMK, A.APITEM, A.PAYKIND, A.APPDATE, A.CASETYP, A.MAPNO, A.MAPROOTMK, A.COMBAPMARK, A.CASEMK, A.PROCSTAT, A.ACCEPTMK, A.MANCHKMK, A.CHGNOTE, A.EXESTAT, A.APUBNO, A.APUBNOCK, A.LSUBNO, A.LSUBNOCK, A.EVTIDS, A.EVTIDNNO, A.EVTNAME, A.EVTBRDATE, A.EVTSEX, A.EVTNATIONTPE, A.EVTNATIONCODE, A.EVTIDENT, A.EVTJOBDATE, A.EVTDATE, A.EVTDIEDATE, A.EVTAGE, A.BENIDS, A.BENIDNNO, A.BENNAME, A.BENBRDATE, A.BENSEX, A.BENNATIONTYP, A.BENNATIONCODE, A.BENEVTREL, A.BENDIEDATE, A.BENPAYMK, A.IDNCHKYM, A.IDNCHKNOTE, A.TEL1, A.TEL2, A.COMMTYP, A.COMMZIP, A.COMMADDR, A.PAYTYP, A.BANKNAME, A.PAYBANKID, A.BRANCHID, A.PAYEEACC, A.CHKPAYBANKID, A.CHKBRANCHID, A.CHKPAYEEACC, A.ACCIDN, A.ACCNAME, A.ACCREL, A.MITRATE, A.GRDIDNNO, A.GRDNAME, A.GRDBRDATE, A.ASSIGNIDNNO, A.ASSIGNNAME, A.ASSIGNBRDATE, A.ISSUYM, A.PAYYM, A.ISSUEAMT, A.ONCEPAYMK, A.OLDSENIAB, A.MUSTISSUEAMT, A.PAYDATE, A.PAYYMS, A.PAYYME, A.PAUSEYM, A.UNPAUSEYM, A.NOTIFYFORM, A.LOANMK, A.MEXCLVL, A.REALEXCLVL, A.CHKDATE, A.CHKMAN, A.RECHKDATE, A.RECHKMAN, A.EXEDATE, A.EXEMAN, A.ARCDATE, A.ARCPG, A.CLOSEDATE, A.CLOSECAUSE, A.PROMOTEUSER, A.DUPEIDNNOMK, A.CRTUSER, A.CRTTIME, A.UPDUSER, A.UPDTIME, A.EVTEXPIREDATE, A.EVTELIGIBLEDATE, A.EVTMISSINGDATE, A.LSINSMAMT, A.LSCHKMK, A.LSCOUNT, A.LNCHKMK, A.DABAPNO, A.DABANNUAMT, A.RESENIMK, A.OFFINSURDATE, A.LAWRETIREDATE, A.EVTAPPNAME, A.CUTAMT, A.ACCSEQNO, A.BENMARRMK, A.CHGMK, A.PAYAMTS, A.EVTAPPIDNNO, A.EVTAPPBRDATE, A.OLDAPLDPT, A.CHOICEYM, A.MOBILEPHONE, A.ANNUAMT, A.INTERVALMONTH, A.SPECIALACC, A.SPEACCDATE, A.UNQUALIFIEDCAUSE, A.ISSUNOTIFYINGMK, A.EVTJOBAGE, A.SAMTY, A.SAMTD, A.ONCETY, A.ONCEPAYM, A.ONCEISSUEAMT, A.MARGINAMT, A.SYSCODE, A.APNOFM FROM BAAPPBASE A WHERE A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND A.SEQNO = '0000' AND A.PROCSTAT in ('01', '10', '11', '12', '20')

SELECT A.BAAPPBASEID, A.APNO, A.SEQNO, A.IMK, A.APITEM, A.PAYKIND, A.APPDATE, A.CASETYP, A.MAPNO, A.MAPROOTMK, A.COMBAPMARK, A.CASEMK, A.PROCSTAT, A.ACCEPTMK, A.MANCHKMK, A.CHGNOTE, A.EXESTAT, A.APUBNO, A.APUBNOCK, A.LSUBNO, A.LSUBNOCK, A.EVTIDS, A.EVTIDNNO, A.EVTNAME, A.EVTBRDATE, A.EVTSEX, A.EVTNATIONTPE, A.EVTNATIONCODE, A.EVTIDENT, A.EVTJOBDATE, A.EVTDATE, A.EVTDIEDATE, A.EVTAGE, A.BENIDS, A.BENIDNNO, A.BENNAME, A.BENBRDATE, A.BENSEX, A.BENNATIONTYP, A.BENNATIONCODE, A.BENEVTREL, A.BENDIEDATE, A.BENPAYMK, A.IDNCHKYM, A.IDNCHKNOTE, A.TEL1, A.TEL2, A.COMMTYP, A.COMMZIP, A.COMMADDR, A.PAYTYP, A.BANKNAME, A.PAYBANKID, A.BRANCHID, A.PAYEEACC, A.CHKPAYBANKID, A.CHKBRANCHID, A.CHKPAYEEACC, A.ACCIDN, A.ACCNAME, A.ACCREL, A.MITRATE, A.GRDIDNNO, A.GRDNAME, A.GRDBRDATE, A.ASSIGNIDNNO, A.ASSIGNNAME, A.ASSIGNBRDATE, A.ISSUYM, A.PAYYM, A.ISSUEAMT, A.ONCEPAYMK, A.OLDSENIAB, A.MUSTISSUEAMT, A.PAYDATE, A.PAYYMS, A.PAYYME, A.PAUSEYM, A.UNPAUSEYM, A.NOTIFYFORM, A.LOANMK, A.MEXCLVL, A.REALEXCLVL, A.CHKDATE, A.CHKMAN, A.RECHKDATE, A.RECHKMAN, A.EXEDATE, A.EXEMAN, A.ARCDATE, A.ARCPG, A.CLOSEDATE, A.CLOSECAUSE, A.PROMOTEUSER, A.DUPEIDNNOMK, A.CRTUSER, A.CRTTIME, A.UPDUSER, A.UPDTIME, A.EVTEXPIREDATE, A.EVTELIGIBLEDATE, A.EVTMISSINGDATE, A.LSINSMAMT, A.LSCHKMK, A.LSCOUNT, A.LNCHKMK, A.DABAPNO, A.DABANNUAMT, A.RESENIMK, A.OFFINSURDATE, A.LAWRETIREDATE, A.EVTAPPNAME, A.CUTAMT, A.ACCSEQNO, A.BENMARRMK, A.CHGMK, A.PAYAMTS, A.EVTAPPIDNNO, A.EVTAPPBRDATE, A.OLDAPLDPT, A.CHOICEYM, A.MOBILEPHONE, A.ANNUAMT, A.INTERVALMONTH, A.SPECIALACC, A.SPEACCDATE, A.UNQUALIFIEDCAUSE, A.ISSUNOTIFYINGMK, A.EVTJOBAGE, A.SAMTY, A.SAMTD, A.ONCETY, A.ONCEPAYM, A.ONCEISSUEAMT, A.MARGINAMT FROM BAAPPBASE A WHERE A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND A.SEQNO = '0000'

SELECT COUNT(*) AS DATACOUNT FROM ( SELECT APNO, ISSUYM FROM BAAPPBASE WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = '0000' AND CASETYP = '1' ) T1, ( SELECT APNO, ISSUYM FROM BADAPR WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = '0000' AND (MTESTMK='D' OR MTESTMK='M') ) T2 WHERE T1.APNO = T2.APNO AND T1.ISSUYM = T2.ISSUYM

SELECT COUNT(*) AS DATACOUNT FROM ( SELECT APNO, SEQNO FROM BAAPPBASE WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = '0000' AND (BENEVTREL = '2' OR BENEVTREL = '3' OR BENEVTREL = '4' OR BENEVTREL = '5' OR BENEVTREL = '6' OR BENEVTREL = '7' OR BENEVTREL = 'A' OR BENEVTREL = 'C' OR BENEVTREL = 'E' OR BENEVTREL = 'O' OR BENEVTREL = 'Z') ) T1, ( SELECT APNO, SEQNO FROM BADAPR WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = '0000' AND MTESTMK = 'F' AND NVL(APLPAYMK, '') <> '' AND APLPAYMK IS NOT NULL ) T2 WHERE T1.APNO = T2.APNO AND T1.SEQNO = T2.SEQNO

SELECT COUNT(*) AS DATACOUNT FROM ( SELECT APNO, ISSUYM FROM BAAPPBASE WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = '0000' AND CASETYP = '1' ) T1, ( SELECT APNO, ISSUYM FROM BADAPR WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = '0000' AND (MTESTMK='D' OR MTESTMK='M') ) T2 WHERE T1.APNO = T2.APNO AND T1.ISSUYM = T2.ISSUYM

SELECT COUNT(*) AS DATACOUNT FROM ( SELECT APNO, SEQNO FROM BAAPPBASE WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = '0000' AND (BENEVTREL = '2' OR BENEVTREL = '3' OR BENEVTREL = '4' OR BENEVTREL = '5' OR BENEVTREL = '6' OR BENEVTREL = '7' OR BENEVTREL = 'A' OR BENEVTREL = 'C' OR BENEVTREL = 'E' OR BENEVTREL = 'O' OR BENEVTREL = 'Z') ) T1, ( SELECT APNO, SEQNO FROM BADAPR WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = '0000' AND MTESTMK = 'F' AND NVL(APLPAYMK, '') <> '' AND APLPAYMK IS NOT NULL ) T2 WHERE T1.APNO = T2.APNO AND T1.SEQNO = T2.SEQNO

SELECT DISTINCT A.BAAPPBASEID, A.APNO, A.SEQNO, A.IMK, A.APITEM, A.PAYKIND, A.APPDATE, A.CASETYP, A.MAPNO, A.MAPROOTMK, A.COMBAPMARK, A.CASEMK, A.PROCSTAT, A.ACCEPTMK, A.MANCHKMK, A.CHGNOTE, A.EXESTAT, A.APUBNO, A.APUBNOCK, A.LSUBNO, A.LSUBNOCK, A.EVTIDS, A.EVTIDNNO, A.EVTNAME, A.EVTBRDATE, A.EVTSEX, A.EVTNATIONTPE, A.EVTNATIONCODE, A.EVTIDENT, A.EVTJOBDATE, A.EVTDATE, A.EVTDIEDATE, A.EVTAGE, A.BENIDS, A.BENIDNNO, A.BENNAME, A.BENBRDATE, A.BENSEX, A.BENNATIONTYP, A.BENNATIONCODE, A.BENEVTREL, A.BENDIEDATE, A.BENPAYMK, A.IDNCHKYM, A.IDNCHKNOTE, A.TEL1, A.TEL2, A.COMMTYP, A.COMMZIP, A.COMMADDR, A.PAYTYP, A.BANKNAME, A.PAYBANKID, A.BRANCHID, A.PAYEEACC, A.CHKPAYBANKID, A.CHKBRANCHID, A.CHKPAYEEACC, A.ACCIDN, A.ACCNAME, A.ACCREL, A.MITRATE, A.GRDIDNNO, A.GRDNAME, A.GRDBRDATE, A.ASSIGNIDNNO, A.ASSIGNNAME, A.ASSIGNBRDATE, A.ISSUYM, A.PAYYM, A.ISSUEAMT, A.ONCEPAYMK, A.OLDSENIAB, A.MUSTISSUEAMT, A.PAYDATE, A.PAYYMS, A.PAYYME, A.PAUSEYM, A.UNPAUSEYM, A.NOTIFYFORM, A.LOANMK, A.MEXCLVL, A.REALEXCLVL, A.CHKDATE, A.CHKMAN, A.RECHKDATE, A.RECHKMAN, A.EXEDATE, A.EXEMAN, A.ARCDATE, A.ARCPG, A.CLOSEDATE, A.CLOSECAUSE, A.PROMOTEUSER, A.DUPEIDNNOMK, A.CRTUSER, A.CRTTIME, A.UPDUSER, A.UPDTIME, A.EVTEXPIREDATE, A.EVTELIGIBLEDATE, A.EVTMISSINGDATE, A.LSINSMAMT, A.LSCHKMK, A.LSCOUNT, A.LNCHKMK, A.DABAPNO, A.DABANNUAMT, A.RESENIMK, A.OFFINSURDATE, A.LAWRETIREDATE, A.EVTAPPNAME, A.CUTAMT, A.ACCSEQNO, A.BENMARRMK, A.CHGMK, A.PAYAMTS, A.EVTAPPIDNNO, A.EVTAPPBRDATE, A.OLDAPLDPT, A.CHOICEYM, A.MOBILEPHONE, A.ANNUAMT, A.INTERVALMONTH, A.SPECIALACC, A.SPEACCDATE, A.UNQUALIFIEDCAUSE, A.ISSUNOTIFYINGMK, A.EVTJOBAGE, A.SAMTY, A.SAMTD, A.ONCETY, A.ONCEPAYM, A.ONCEISSUEAMT, A.MARGINAMT FROM BAAPPBASE A, BABCML7 B WHERE (B.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# OR B.REAPNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#) AND A.APNO = B.APNO AND A.SEQNO = '0000' AND B.PROCSTAT = '20'

SELECT MEXCLVL, (SELECT DECODE(SIGNL2, NULL, '', 'Y') As "SIGNL1" FROM BCCMF01 WHERE PRPNO = #empNo:VARCHAR# AND INSKD = '1' AND ((PAYTYP = 'K' OR (PAYTYP = '99'))) ) AS RECHK, (SELECT (CASE WHEN SIGNL2>SIGNL3 THEN SIGNL2 ELSE SIGNL3 END) FROM BCCMF01 WHERE PRPNO = #empNo:VARCHAR# AND INSKD = '1' AND ((PAYTYP = 'K' OR (PAYTYP = '99'))) ) AS EXEMK FROM BAAPPBASE A1 WHERE ((SELECT DECODE(SIGNL2, NULL, '', 'Y') As "SIGNL1" FROM BCCMF01 WHERE PRPNO = #empNo:VARCHAR# AND INSKD = '1' AND ((PAYTYP = 'K' OR (PAYTYP='99'))))='Y') AND A1.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND A1.SEQNO = '0000'

SELECT DISTINCT D.APNO FROM BAAPPBASE D
1 = 0
D.APNO >= #apNoBegin:VARCHAR#
D.APNO <= #apNoEnd:VARCHAR#
AND (D.CASEMK <> 'D' OR D.CASEMK IS NULL) AND D.BENPAYMK = '1' AND SUBSTR(D.APNO, 1, 1) = 'K' AND D.ISSUYM IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY D.APNO

SELECT A.BAAPPBASEID, A.APNO, A.SEQNO, A.IMK, A.APITEM, A.PAYKIND, A.APPDATE, A.CASETYP, A.MAPNO, A.MAPROOTMK, A.COMBAPMARK, A.CASEMK, A.PROCSTAT, A.ACCEPTMK, A.MANCHKMK, A.CHGNOTE, A.EXESTAT, A.APUBNO, A.APUBNOCK, A.LSUBNO, A.LSUBNOCK, A.EVTIDS, A.EVTIDNNO, A.EVTNAME, A.EVTBRDATE, A.EVTSEX, A.EVTNATIONTPE, A.EVTNATIONCODE, A.EVTIDENT, A.EVTJOBDATE, A.EVTDATE, A.EVTDIEDATE, A.EVTAGE, A.BENIDS, A.BENIDNNO, A.BENNAME, A.BENBRDATE, A.BENSEX, A.BENNATIONTYP, A.BENNATIONCODE, A.BENEVTREL, A.BENDIEDATE, A.BENPAYMK, A.IDNCHKYM, A.IDNCHKNOTE, A.TEL1, A.TEL2, A.COMMTYP, A.COMMZIP, A.COMMADDR, A.PAYTYP, A.BANKNAME, A.PAYBANKID, A.BRANCHID, A.PAYEEACC, A.CHKPAYBANKID, A.CHKBRANCHID, A.CHKPAYEEACC, A.ACCIDN, A.ACCNAME, A.ACCREL, A.MITRATE, A.GRDIDNNO, A.GRDNAME, A.GRDBRDATE, A.ASSIGNIDNNO, A.ASSIGNNAME, A.ASSIGNBRDATE, A.ISSUYM, A.PAYYM, A.ISSUEAMT, A.ONCEPAYMK, A.OLDSENIAB, A.MUSTISSUEAMT, A.PAYDATE, A.PAYYMS, A.PAYYME, A.PAUSEYM, A.UNPAUSEYM, A.NOTIFYFORM, A.LOANMK, A.MEXCLVL, A.REALEXCLVL, A.CHKDATE, A.CHKMAN, A.RECHKDATE, A.RECHKMAN, A.EXEDATE, A.EXEMAN, A.ARCDATE, A.ARCPG, A.CLOSEDATE, A.CLOSECAUSE, A.PROMOTEUSER, A.DUPEIDNNOMK, A.CRTUSER, A.CRTTIME, A.UPDUSER, A.UPDTIME, A.EVTEXPIREDATE, A.EVTELIGIBLEDATE, A.EVTMISSINGDATE, A.LSINSMAMT, A.LSCHKMK, A.LSCOUNT, A.LNCHKMK, A.DABAPNO, A.DABANNUAMT, A.RESENIMK, A.OFFINSURDATE, A.LAWRETIREDATE, A.EVTAPPNAME, A.CUTAMT, A.ACCSEQNO, A.BENMARRMK, A.CHGMK, A.PAYAMTS, A.EVTAPPIDNNO, A.EVTAPPBRDATE, A.OLDAPLDPT, A.CHOICEYM, A.MOBILEPHONE, A.ANNUAMT, A.INTERVALMONTH, A.SPECIALACC, A.SPEACCDATE, A.UNQUALIFIEDCAUSE, A.ISSUNOTIFYINGMK, A.EVTJOBAGE, A.SAMTY, A.SAMTD, A.ONCETY, A.ONCEPAYM, A.ONCEISSUEAMT, A.MARGINAMT, A.CHECKIN, A.SYSCODE, A.APNOFM FROM BAAPPBASE A
1 = 0
A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
A.SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR#

A.SEQNO <= #seqNo:VARCHAR#
A.SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR#
A.SEQNO >= #seqNo:VARCHAR#
A.SEQNO > #seqNo:VARCHAR#
A.SEQNO != #seqNo:VARCHAR#
AND (A.CASEMK <> 'D' OR A.CASEMK IS NULL) AND A.BENPAYMK = '1' AND SUBSTR(A.APNO, 1, 1) = 'K' AND A.ISSUYM IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY A.APPDATE, A.APNO, A.SEQNO

A.APNO <> #apNo:VARCHAR#
A.EVTIDNNO = #evtIdnNo:VARCHAR#
A.EVTBRDATE = #evtBrDate:VARCHAR#
AND A.SEQNO = '0000' AND (A.CASEMK <> 'D' OR A.CASEMK IS NULL) AND A.BENPAYMK = '1' AND SUBSTR(A.APNO, 1, 1) = 'K' ORDER BY A.APPDATE

SELECT A.BAAPPBASEID, A.APNO, A.SEQNO, A.IMK, A.APITEM, A.PAYKIND, A.APPDATE, A.CASETYP, A.MAPNO, A.MAPROOTMK, A.COMBAPMARK, A.CASEMK, A.PROCSTAT, A.ACCEPTMK, A.MANCHKMK, A.CHGNOTE, A.EXESTAT, A.APUBNO, A.APUBNOCK, A.LSUBNO, A.LSUBNOCK, A.EVTIDS, A.EVTIDNNO, A.EVTNAME, A.EVTBRDATE, A.EVTSEX, A.EVTNATIONTPE, A.EVTNATIONCODE, A.EVTIDENT, A.EVTJOBDATE, A.EVTDATE, A.EVTDIEDATE, A.EVTAGE, A.BENIDS, A.BENIDNNO, A.BENNAME, A.BENBRDATE, A.BENSEX, A.BENNATIONTYP, A.BENNATIONCODE, A.BENEVTREL, A.BENDIEDATE, A.BENPAYMK, A.IDNCHKYM, A.IDNCHKNOTE, A.TEL1, A.TEL2, A.COMMTYP, A.COMMZIP, A.COMMADDR, A.PAYTYP, A.BANKNAME, A.PAYBANKID, A.BRANCHID, A.PAYEEACC, A.CHKPAYBANKID, A.CHKBRANCHID, A.CHKPAYEEACC, A.ACCIDN, A.ACCNAME, A.ACCREL, A.MITRATE, A.GRDIDNNO, A.GRDNAME, A.GRDBRDATE, A.ASSIGNIDNNO, A.ASSIGNNAME, A.ASSIGNBRDATE, A.ISSUYM, A.PAYYM, A.ISSUEAMT, A.ONCEPAYMK, A.OLDSENIAB, A.MUSTISSUEAMT, A.PAYDATE, (A.PAYYMS || ' ' ||A.PAYYME) PAYYMS, A.PAYYME, A.PAUSEYM, A.UNPAUSEYM, A.NOTIFYFORM, A.LOANMK, A.MEXCLVL, A.REALEXCLVL, A.CHKDATE, A.CHKMAN, A.RECHKDATE, A.RECHKMAN, DECODE(A.CASETYP, '3', A.EXEDATE) AS EXEDATE, A.EXEMAN, A.ARCDATE, A.ARCPG, A.CLOSEDATE, A.CLOSECAUSE, A.PROMOTEUSER, A.DUPEIDNNOMK, A.CRTUSER, A.CRTTIME, A.UPDUSER, A.UPDTIME, A.EVTEXPIREDATE, A.EVTELIGIBLEDATE, A.EVTMISSINGDATE, A.LSINSMAMT, A.LSCHKMK, A.LSCOUNT, A.LNCHKMK, A.DABAPNO, A.DABANNUAMT, A.RESENIMK, A.OFFINSURDATE, A.LAWRETIREDATE, A.EVTAPPNAME, A.CUTAMT, A.ACCSEQNO, A.BENMARRMK, A.CHGMK, A.PAYAMTS, A.EVTAPPIDNNO, A.EVTAPPBRDATE, A.OLDAPLDPT, A.CHOICEYM, A.MOBILEPHONE, A.ANNUAMT, A.INTERVALMONTH, A.SPECIALACC, A.SPEACCDATE, A.UNQUALIFIEDCAUSE, A.ISSUNOTIFYINGMK, A.EVTJOBAGE, A.SAMTY, A.SAMTD, A.ONCETY, A.ONCEPAYM, A.ONCEISSUEAMT, A.MARGINAMT FROM BAAPPBASE A WHERE SUBSTR(A.APNO, 1, 1) = 'B' AND A.SEQNO = '0000'
A.EVTIDS = #evtIds:VARCHAR#
ORDER BY A.APPDATE

SELECT A.BAAPPBASEID, A.APNO, A.SEQNO, A.IMK, A.APITEM, A.PAYKIND, A.APPDATE, A.CASETYP, A.MAPNO, A.MAPROOTMK, A.COMBAPMARK, A.CASEMK, A.PROCSTAT, A.ACCEPTMK, A.MANCHKMK, A.CHGNOTE, A.EXESTAT, A.APUBNO, A.APUBNOCK, A.LSUBNO, A.LSUBNOCK, A.EVTIDS, A.EVTIDNNO, A.EVTNAME, A.EVTBRDATE, A.EVTSEX, A.EVTNATIONTPE, A.EVTNATIONCODE, A.EVTIDENT, A.EVTJOBDATE, A.EVTDATE, A.EVTDIEDATE, A.EVTAGE, A.BENIDS, A.BENIDNNO, A.BENNAME, A.BENBRDATE, A.BENSEX, A.BENNATIONTYP, A.BENNATIONCODE, A.BENEVTREL, A.BENDIEDATE, A.BENPAYMK, A.IDNCHKYM, A.IDNCHKNOTE, A.TEL1, A.TEL2, A.COMMTYP, A.COMMZIP, A.COMMADDR, A.PAYTYP, A.BANKNAME, A.PAYBANKID, A.BRANCHID, A.PAYEEACC, A.CHKPAYBANKID, A.CHKBRANCHID, A.CHKPAYEEACC, A.ACCIDN, A.ACCNAME, A.ACCREL, A.MITRATE, A.GRDIDNNO, A.GRDNAME, A.GRDBRDATE, A.ASSIGNIDNNO, A.ASSIGNNAME, A.ASSIGNBRDATE, A.ISSUYM, A.PAYYM, A.ISSUEAMT, A.ONCEPAYMK, A.OLDSENIAB, A.MUSTISSUEAMT, A.PAYDATE, A.PAYYMS, A.PAYYME, A.PAUSEYM, A.UNPAUSEYM, A.NOTIFYFORM, A.LOANMK, A.MEXCLVL, A.REALEXCLVL, A.CHKDATE, A.CHKMAN, A.RECHKDATE, A.RECHKMAN, DECODE(A.CASETYP, '3', A.EXEDATE) AS EXEDATE, A.EXEMAN, A.ARCDATE, A.ARCPG, A.CLOSEDATE, A.CLOSECAUSE, A.PROMOTEUSER, A.DUPEIDNNOMK, A.CRTUSER, A.CRTTIME, A.UPDUSER, A.UPDTIME, A.EVTEXPIREDATE, A.EVTELIGIBLEDATE, A.EVTMISSINGDATE, A.LSINSMAMT, A.LSCHKMK, A.LSCOUNT, A.LNCHKMK, A.DABAPNO, A.DABANNUAMT, A.RESENIMK, A.OFFINSURDATE, A.LAWRETIREDATE, A.EVTAPPNAME, A.CUTAMT, A.ACCSEQNO, A.BENMARRMK, A.CHGMK, A.PAYAMTS, A.EVTAPPIDNNO, A.EVTAPPBRDATE, A.OLDAPLDPT, A.CHOICEYM, A.MOBILEPHONE, A.ANNUAMT, A.INTERVALMONTH, A.SPECIALACC, A.SPEACCDATE, A.UNQUALIFIEDCAUSE, A.ISSUNOTIFYINGMK, A.EVTJOBAGE, A.SAMTY, A.SAMTD, A.ONCETY, A.ONCEPAYM, A.ONCEISSUEAMT, A.MARGINAMT FROM BAAPPBASE A
1 = 0
A.APNO <> #apNo:VARCHAR#
A.EVTIDNNO = #evtIdnNo:VARCHAR#
A.EVTBRDATE = #evtBrDate:VARCHAR#
AND (A.CASEMK <> 'D' OR A.CASEMK IS NULL) AND A.BENPAYMK = '1' AND SUBSTR(A.APNO, 1, 1) = 'L' ORDER BY A.APPDATE

Select DISTINCT A.APNO, A.SEQNO, A.BENNAME, A.EVTNAME, A.APPDATE, A.ISSUYM, A.PAYYMS, A.PAYYME, A.EVTJOBDATE, A.ISSUEAMT, A.CLOSEDATE, A.CLOSECAUSE From BAAPPBASE A
1 = 0
A.EVTIDNNO = #evtIdnNo:VARCHAR#
A.EVTBRDATE = #evtBrDate:VARCHAR#
AND (A.CASEMK <> 'D' OR A.CASEMK IS NULL) AND SUBSTR(A.APNO, 1, 1) = 'S' AND A.SEQNO = '0000'
UNION Select DISTINCT B.APNO, B.SEQNO, B.BENNAME, B.EVTNAME, B.APPDATE, B.ISSUYM, B.PAYYMS, B.PAYYME, B.EVTJOBDATE, B.ISSUEAMT, B.CLOSEDATE, B.CLOSECAUSE From BAAPPBASE B Where
(B.CASEMK <> 'D' OR B.CASEMK IS NULL) AND B.BENPAYMK = '1' AND SUBSTR(B.APNO, 1, 1) = 'S' AND B.SEQNO <> '0000'
B.BENIDNNO = #evtIdnNo:VARCHAR#
B.BENBRDATE = #evtBrDate:VARCHAR#

SELECT DISTINCT T.APNO FROM BAAPPBASE T
1 = 0
T.APNO >= #apNoBegin:VARCHAR#
T.APNO <= #apNoEnd:VARCHAR#
AND (T.CASEMK <> 'D' OR T.CASEMK IS NULL) AND T.BENPAYMK = '1' AND SUBSTR(T.APNO, 1, 1) = 'S' AND T.ISSUYM IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY T.APNO

SELECT A.BAAPPBASEID, A.APNO, A.SEQNO, A.IMK, A.APITEM, A.PAYKIND, A.APPDATE, A.CASETYP, A.MAPNO, A.MAPROOTMK, A.COMBAPMARK, A.CASEMK, A.PROCSTAT, A.ACCEPTMK, A.MANCHKMK, A.CHGNOTE, A.EXESTAT, A.APUBNO, A.APUBNOCK, A.LSUBNO, A.LSUBNOCK, A.EVTIDS, A.EVTIDNNO, A.EVTNAME, A.EVTBRDATE, A.EVTSEX, A.EVTNATIONTPE, A.EVTNATIONCODE, A.EVTIDENT, A.EVTJOBDATE, A.EVTDATE, A.EVTDIEDATE, A.EVTAGE, A.BENIDS, A.BENIDNNO, A.BENNAME, A.BENBRDATE, A.BENSEX, A.BENNATIONTYP, A.BENNATIONCODE, A.BENEVTREL, A.BENDIEDATE, A.BENPAYMK, A.IDNCHKYM, A.IDNCHKNOTE, A.TEL1, A.TEL2, A.COMMTYP, A.COMMZIP, A.COMMADDR, A.PAYTYP, A.BANKNAME, A.PAYBANKID, A.BRANCHID, A.PAYEEACC, A.ACCIDN, A.ACCNAME, A.ACCREL, A.MITRATE, A.GRDIDNNO, A.GRDNAME, A.GRDBRDATE, A.ASSIGNIDNNO, A.ASSIGNNAME, A.ASSIGNBRDATE, A.ISSUYM, A.PAYYM, A.ISSUEAMT, A.ONCEPAYMK, A.OLDSENIAB, A.MUSTISSUEAMT, A.PAYDATE, A.PAYYMS, A.PAYYME, A.PAUSEYM, A.UNPAUSEYM, A.NOTIFYFORM, A.LOANMK, A.MEXCLVL, A.REALEXCLVL, A.CHKDATE, A.CHKMAN, A.RECHKDATE, A.RECHKMAN, A.EXEDATE, A.EXEMAN, A.ARCDATE, A.ARCPG, A.CLOSEDATE, A.CLOSECAUSE, A.PROMOTEUSER, A.DUPEIDNNOMK, A.CRTUSER, A.CRTTIME, A.UPDUSER, A.UPDTIME, A.EVTEXPIREDATE, A.EVTELIGIBLEDATE, A.EVTMISSINGDATE, A.LSINSMAMT, A.LSCHKMK, A.LSCOUNT, A.LNCHKMK, A.DABAPNO, A.DABANNUAMT, A.RESENIMK, A.OFFINSURDATE, A.LAWRETIREDATE, A.EVTAPPNAME, A.CUTAMT, A.ACCSEQNO, A.BENMARRMK, A.CHGMK, A.PAYAMTS, A.EVTAPPIDNNO, A.EVTAPPBRDATE, A.OLDAPLDPT, A.CHOICEYM, A.MOBILEPHONE, A.ANNUAMT, A.SPECIALACC, A.SPEACCDATE, A.INTERVALMONTH, A.UNQUALIFIEDCAUSE, A.CHECKIN, A.SYSCODE, A.APNOFM FROM BAAPPBASE A
1 = 0
A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
A.SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR#
A.SEQNO < #seqNo:VARCHAR#
A.SEQNO <= #seqNo:VARCHAR#
A.SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR#
A.SEQNO >= #seqNo:VARCHAR#
A.SEQNO > #seqNo:VARCHAR#
A.SEQNO != #seqNo:VARCHAR#
AND SUBSTR(A.SEQNO, 3, 2) = '00'
AND SUBSTR(A.SEQNO, 3, 2) < '00'
AND SUBSTR(A.SEQNO, 3, 2) <= '00'
AND SUBSTR(A.SEQNO, 3, 2) = '00'
AND SUBSTR(A.SEQNO, 3, 2) >= '00'
AND SUBSTR(A.SEQNO, 3, 2) > '00'
AND SUBSTR(A.SEQNO, 3, 2) != '00'
AND (A.CASEMK <> 'D' OR A.CASEMK IS NULL) AND SUBSTR(A.APNO, 1, 1) = 'S' AND A.ISSUYM IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY A.APPDATE, A.APNO, A.SEQNO

SELECT DISTINCT A.APNO, A.SEQNO, A.BENNAME, A.EVTNAME, A.APPDATE, A.APUBNO, A.ISSUYM, A.PAYYMS, A.PAYYME, A.EVTJOBDATE, A.ISSUEAMT, A.CLOSEDATE, A.CLOSECAUSE FROM BAAPPBASE A
1 = 0
A.APNO <> #apNo:VARCHAR#
A.EVTIDNNO = #evtIdnNo:VARCHAR#
A.EVTBRDATE = #evtBrDate:VARCHAR#
AND (A.CASEMK <> 'D' OR A.CASEMK IS NULL) AND SUBSTR(A.APNO, 1, 1) = 'S' AND A.SEQNO='0000'
UNION SELECT DISTINCT B.APNO, B.SEQNO, B.BENNAME, B.EVTNAME, B.APPDATE, B.APUBNO, B.ISSUYM, B.PAYYMS, B.PAYYME, B.EVTJOBDATE, B.ISSUEAMT, B.CLOSEDATE, B.CLOSECAUSE FROM BAAPPBASE B
WHERE SUBSTR(B.APNO, 1, 1) = 'S' AND (B.CASEMK <> 'D' OR B.CASEMK IS NULL) AND B.SEQNO<>'0000'
B.APNO <> #apNo:VARCHAR#
B.BENIDNNO = #evtIdnNo:VARCHAR#
B.BENBRDATE = #evtBrDate:VARCHAR#

SELECT A.BAAPPBASEID, A.APNO, A.SEQNO, A.IMK, A.APITEM, A.PAYKIND, A.APPDATE, A.CASETYP, A.MAPNO, A.MAPROOTMK, A.COMBAPMARK, A.CASEMK, A.PROCSTAT, A.ACCEPTMK, A.MANCHKMK, A.CHGNOTE, A.EXESTAT, A.APUBNO, A.APUBNOCK, A.LSUBNO, A.LSUBNOCK, A.EVTIDS, A.EVTIDNNO, A.EVTNAME, A.EVTBRDATE, A.EVTSEX, A.EVTNATIONTPE, A.EVTNATIONCODE, A.EVTIDENT, A.EVTJOBDATE, A.EVTDATE, A.EVTDIEDATE, A.EVTAGE, A.BENIDS, A.BENIDNNO, A.BENNAME, A.BENBRDATE, A.BENSEX, A.BENNATIONTYP, A.BENNATIONCODE, A.BENEVTREL, A.BENDIEDATE, A.BENPAYMK, A.IDNCHKYM, A.IDNCHKNOTE, A.TEL1, A.TEL2, A.COMMTYP, A.COMMZIP, A.COMMADDR, A.PAYTYP, A.BANKNAME, A.PAYBANKID, A.BRANCHID, A.PAYEEACC, A.CHKPAYBANKID, A.CHKBRANCHID, A.CHKPAYEEACC, A.ACCIDN, A.ACCNAME, A.ACCREL, A.MITRATE, A.GRDIDNNO, A.GRDNAME, A.GRDBRDATE, A.ASSIGNIDNNO, A.ASSIGNNAME, A.ASSIGNBRDATE, A.ISSUYM, A.PAYYM, A.ISSUEAMT, A.ONCEPAYMK, A.OLDSENIAB, A.MUSTISSUEAMT, A.PAYDATE, A.PAYYMS, A.PAYYME, A.PAUSEYM, A.UNPAUSEYM, A.NOTIFYFORM, A.LOANMK, A.MEXCLVL, A.REALEXCLVL, A.CHKDATE, A.CHKMAN, A.RECHKDATE, A.RECHKMAN, DECODE(A.CASETYP, '3', A.EXEDATE) AS EXEDATE, A.EXEMAN, A.ARCDATE, A.ARCPG, A.CLOSEDATE, A.CLOSECAUSE, A.PROMOTEUSER, A.DUPEIDNNOMK, A.CRTUSER, A.CRTTIME, A.UPDUSER, A.UPDTIME, A.EVTEXPIREDATE, A.EVTELIGIBLEDATE, A.EVTMISSINGDATE, A.LSINSMAMT, A.LSCHKMK, A.LSCOUNT, A.LNCHKMK, A.DABAPNO, A.DABANNUAMT, A.RESENIMK, A.OFFINSURDATE, A.LAWRETIREDATE, A.EVTAPPNAME, A.CUTAMT, A.ACCSEQNO, A.BENMARRMK, A.CHGMK, A.PAYAMTS, A.EVTAPPIDNNO, A.EVTAPPBRDATE, A.OLDAPLDPT, A.CHOICEYM, A.MOBILEPHONE, A.ANNUAMT, A.INTERVALMONTH, A.SPECIALACC, A.SPEACCDATE, A.UNQUALIFIEDCAUSE, A.ISSUNOTIFYINGMK, A.EVTJOBAGE, A.SAMTY, A.SAMTD, A.ONCETY, A.ONCEPAYM, A.ONCEISSUEAMT, A.MARGINAMT FROM BAAPPBASE A
1 = 0
A.EVTIDNNO = #evtIdnNo:VARCHAR#
A.EVTBRDATE = #evtBrDate:VARCHAR#
AND (A.CASEMK <> 'D' OR A.CASEMK IS NULL) AND SUBSTR(A.APNO, 1, 1) = 'L' AND A.SEQNO = '0000' ORDER BY A.APPDATE

SELECT A.BAAPPBASEID, A.APNO, A.SEQNO, A.IMK, A.APITEM, A.PAYKIND, A.APPDATE, A.CASETYP, A.MAPNO, A.MAPROOTMK, A.COMBAPMARK, A.CASEMK, A.PROCSTAT, A.ACCEPTMK, A.MANCHKMK, A.CHGNOTE, A.EXESTAT, A.APUBNO, A.APUBNOCK, A.LSUBNO, A.LSUBNOCK, A.EVTIDS, A.EVTIDNNO, A.EVTNAME, A.EVTBRDATE, A.EVTSEX, A.EVTNATIONTPE, A.EVTNATIONCODE, A.EVTIDENT, A.EVTJOBDATE, A.EVTDATE, A.EVTDIEDATE, A.EVTAGE, A.BENIDS, A.BENIDNNO, A.BENNAME, A.BENBRDATE, A.BENSEX, A.BENNATIONTYP, A.BENNATIONCODE, A.BENEVTREL, A.BENDIEDATE, A.BENPAYMK, A.IDNCHKYM, A.IDNCHKNOTE, A.TEL1, A.TEL2, A.COMMTYP, A.COMMZIP, A.COMMADDR, A.PAYTYP, A.BANKNAME, A.PAYBANKID, A.BRANCHID, A.PAYEEACC, A.CHKPAYBANKID, A.CHKBRANCHID, A.CHKPAYEEACC, A.ACCIDN, A.ACCNAME, A.ACCREL, A.MITRATE, A.GRDIDNNO, A.GRDNAME, A.GRDBRDATE, A.ASSIGNIDNNO, A.ASSIGNNAME, A.ASSIGNBRDATE, A.ISSUYM, A.PAYYM, A.ISSUEAMT, A.ONCEPAYMK, A.OLDSENIAB, A.MUSTISSUEAMT, A.PAYDATE, A.PAYYMS, A.PAYYME, A.PAUSEYM, A.UNPAUSEYM, A.NOTIFYFORM, A.LOANMK, A.MEXCLVL, A.REALEXCLVL, A.CHKDATE, A.CHKMAN, A.RECHKDATE, A.RECHKMAN, DECODE(A.CASETYP, '3', A.EXEDATE) AS EXEDATE, A.EXEMAN, A.ARCDATE, A.ARCPG, A.CLOSEDATE, A.CLOSECAUSE, A.PROMOTEUSER, A.DUPEIDNNOMK, A.CRTUSER, A.CRTTIME, A.UPDUSER, A.UPDTIME, A.EVTEXPIREDATE, A.EVTELIGIBLEDATE, A.EVTMISSINGDATE, A.LSINSMAMT, A.LSCHKMK, A.LSCOUNT, A.LNCHKMK, A.DABAPNO, A.DABANNUAMT, A.RESENIMK, A.OFFINSURDATE, A.LAWRETIREDATE, A.EVTAPPNAME, A.CUTAMT, A.ACCSEQNO, A.BENMARRMK, A.CHGMK, A.PAYAMTS, A.EVTAPPIDNNO, A.EVTAPPBRDATE, A.OLDAPLDPT, A.CHOICEYM, A.MOBILEPHONE, A.ANNUAMT, A.INTERVALMONTH, A.SPECIALACC, A.SPEACCDATE, A.UNQUALIFIEDCAUSE, A.ISSUNOTIFYINGMK, A.EVTJOBAGE, A.SAMTY, A.SAMTD, A.ONCETY, A.ONCEPAYM, A.ONCEISSUEAMT, A.MARGINAMT FROM BAAPPBASE A
1 = 0
A.EVTIDNNO = #evtIdnNo:VARCHAR#
A.EVTBRDATE = #evtBrDate:VARCHAR#
AND (A.CASEMK <> 'D' OR A.CASEMK IS NULL) AND A.SEQNO = '0000' AND SUBSTR(A.APNO, 1, 1) = 'K' ORDER BY A.APPDATE

SELECT BAAPPBASEID FROM BAAPPBASE WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND BENIDNNO = #benIdnNo:VARCHAR# AND BENBRDATE = #benBrDate:VARCHAR#
AND 1=0
BAAPPBASEID = #baappbaseId:NUMERIC#
BAAPPBASEID < #baappbaseId:NUMERIC#
BAAPPBASEID <= #baappbaseId:NUMERIC#
BAAPPBASEID = #baappbaseId:NUMERIC#
BAAPPBASEID >= #baappbaseId:NUMERIC#
BAAPPBASEID > #baappbaseId:NUMERIC#
BAAPPBASEID != #baappbaseId:NUMERIC#

SELECT SEQNO FROM BAAPPBASE WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND BENIDNNO = #benIdnNo:VARCHAR#
AND ROWNUM <=1
sqlMap.update: UPDATE BAAPPBASE SET ACCSEQNO = #accSeqNo:VARCHAR# WHERE BAAPPBASEID = #baappbaseId:NUMERIC#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT BAAPPBASEID, SEQNO, BENBRDATE, EVTDIEDATE, EVTNAME, BENNAME, BENDIEDATE FROM BAAPPBASE WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = SUBSTR(#seqNo:VARCHAR#, 1, 2) || '00'
AND SEQNO <> #seqNo:VARCHAR#
SELECT T.BAAPPBASEID, T.APNO, T.SEQNO, T.EVTIDNNO, T.EVTNAME, T.BENIDNNO, T.BENNAME, T.BENEVTREL, T.ACCEPTMK, T.MANCHKMK, T.CASETYP FROM BAAPPBASE T WHERE T.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# ORDER BY SEQNO

SELECT A.BAAPPBASEID, A.APNO, A.SEQNO, A.BENIDNNO, A.BENNAME, A.BENBRDATE, A.BENEVTREL, A.ISSUYM, B.BADAPRID, B.PAYYM, B.ISSUEAMT, B.RECAMT, B.PAYBANANCE, B.SUPAMT, B.OFFSETAMT, B.BADDEBTAMT, B.OTHERAMT, B.PAYRATE, B.APLPAYAMT, B.ACCEPTMK, B.MANCHKMK FROM (SELECT X.BAAPPBASEID, X.APNO, X.SEQNO, X.BENIDNNO, X.BENNAME, X.BENBRDATE, X.BENEVTREL, X.ISSUYM FROM BAAPPBASE X WHERE X.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
AND X.SEQNO < #seqNo:VARCHAR#
AND X.SEQNO <= #seqNo:VARCHAR#
AND X.SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR#
AND X.SEQNO >= #seqNo:VARCHAR#
AND X.SEQNO > #seqNo:VARCHAR#
AND X.SEQNO != #seqNo:VARCHAR#
AND X.PROCSTAT IN ('10','11','12','20')) A, (SELECT Y.BADAPRID, Y.BAAPPBASEID, Y.APNO, Y.ISSUYM, Y.PAYYM, Y.SEQNO, Y.ISSUEAMT, Y.RECAMT, Y.SUPAMT, (nvl(Y.PAYBANANCE,0)+nvl(Y.REMITAMT,0)+nvl(Y.OVRCUTAMT,0)) AS PAYBANANCE, Y.BADDEBTAMT, Y.OTHERAMT, Y.OFFSETAMT, Y.PAYRATE, Y.APLPAYAMT, Y.ACCEPTMK, Y.MANCHKMK FROM BADAPR Y WHERE Y.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
AND Y.SEQNO < #seqNo:VARCHAR#
AND Y.SEQNO <= #seqNo:VARCHAR#
AND Y.SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR#
AND Y.SEQNO >= #seqNo:VARCHAR#
AND Y.SEQNO > #seqNo:VARCHAR#
AND Y.SEQNO != #seqNo:VARCHAR#
AND Y.VERISEQ = (SELECT MAX(TO_NUMBER(VERISEQ)) FROM BADAPR WHERE APNO = Y.APNO AND ISSUYM = Y.ISSUYM)) B WHERE A.BAAPPBASEID = B.BAAPPBASEID AND A.APNO = B.APNO AND A.SEQNO = B.SEQNO AND A.ISSUYM = B.ISSUYM ORDER BY SEQNO, PAYYM
SELECT SEQNO, BENNAME FROM BAAPPBASE WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND BENPAYMK = '1' ORDER BY SEQNO
sqlMap.update: UPDATE BAAPPBASE SET NOTIFYFORM = #notifyForm:VARCHAR# ,MANCHKMK = #manchkMk:VARCHAR# ,CHGNOTE = DECODE(CASETYP,'2', #chgNote:VARCHAR#, CHGNOTE) ,PROCSTAT = '20' ,CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR# ,CHKMAN = #chkMan:VARCHAR# WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR# AND PROCSTAT IN ('10','11','12','20')
sqlMap.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BAAPPBASE WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = '0000' AND PROCSTAT IN ('10','11','12','20')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BAAPPBASE WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO <> '0000' AND (NVL(TRIM(MANCHKMK),' ') = ' ' OR MANCHKMK IS NULL)

SELECT T.BAAPPBASEID, T.ACCIDN, T.ACCNAME, T.PAYBANKID, T.BANKNAME, T.BRANCHID, T.PAYEEACC, T.CHKPAYBANKID, T.CHKBRANCHID, T.CHKPAYEEACC FROM BAAPPBASE T WHERE T.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND T.PROCSTAT = '00' AND T.ACCREL = '3' AND T.SEQNO <> #seqNo:VARCHAR# AND T.ACCSEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE BAAPPBASE SET ACCIDN = #accIdn:VARCHAR#, ACCNAME = #accName:VARCHAR#, PAYBANKID = #payBankId:VARCHAR#, BANKNAME = #bankName:VARCHAR#, BRANCHID = #branchId:VARCHAR#, PAYEEACC = #payEeacc:VARCHAR#, CHKPAYBANKID = #chkPayBankId:VARCHAR#, CHKBRANCHID = #chkBranchId:VARCHAR#, CHKPAYEEACC = #chkPayEeacc:VARCHAR#, PAYTYP = #payTyp:VARCHAR# WHERE BAAPPBASEID = #baappbaseId:NUMERIC# AND PROCSTAT = '00' AND ACCREL = '3'
sqlMap.select:
SELECT B.APPDATE, B.EVTNAME, B.EVTIDNNO, B.EVTBRDATE, B.BAAPPBASEID, B.APNO, B.EVTDIEDATE, B.EVTJOBDATE, B.ISSUYM, B.CASETYP FROM BAAPPBASE B WHERE B.SEQNO = '0000'
1 = 0
B.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
AND SUBSTR(B.APNO, 1, 1) = 'K' AND B.PROCSTAT IN ('01', '10', '11', '12', '20')
SELECT B.BAAPPBASEID, B.CHKDATE, B.CHKMAN, B.RECHKDATE, B.RECHKMAN, B.EXEDATE, B.EXEMAN, B.PROCSTAT, B.CRTUSER, B.CRTTIME, B.UPDUSER, B.UPDTIME FROM BAAPPBASE B WHERE B.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE BAAPPBASE SET UPDUSER = #updUser:VARCHAR#, UPDTIME = #updTime:VARCHAR#, PROCSTAT = '01', CHKDATE = '', CHKMAN = '', RECHKDATE = '', RECHKMAN = '', EXEDATE = '', EXEMAN = '', MANCHKMK = '', ARCDATE = '', ARCPG = '' WHERE BAAPPBASEID = #baappbaseId:NUMERIC# AND PROCSTAT IN ('01', '10', '11', '12', '20')

UPDATE BAAPPBASE SET ACCREL = '', ACCSEQNO = '', ACCIDN = '', BANKNAME = '', PAYBANKID = '', PAYEEACC = '', PAYTYP = '', BRANCHID = '' WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
AND SEQNO <> #seqNo:VARCHAR#
AND ACCSEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR# AND ACCREL = '3' AND PROCSTAT IN ('10','11','12','20')
sqlMap.select: SELECT BENNAME FROM BAAPPBASE WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR#

SELECT Count(*) DataCount FROM BAAPPBASE T WHERE T.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND SUBSTR(T.SEQNO,3,2) = '00' AND ((SUBSTR(T.APNO,1,1) in ('L','K') AND T.BENEVTREL in ('1','2','3','4','5','6','7')) OR (SUBSTR(T.APNO,1,1) = 'S' AND T.BENEVTREL in ('2','3','4','5','6','7')))
AND T.PAYTYP in ('5','6')
AND T.PAYTYP not in ('5','6')
SELECT INTERVALMONTH FROM BAAPPBASE WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR#

SELECT T.CASETYP, T.APNO, T.EVTNAME, T.ISSUYM, T.CHKMAN, T.EXEMAN, CASE T.CASETYP WHEN '3' THEN (SELECT MAX(PRODATE) FROM MAADMREC T1 WHERE T1.APNO = T.APNO AND T1.LETTERTYPE = '21'
AND T1.NDOMK1 <> '02'
AND TRIM(T1.DELMK) IS NULL) WHEN '4' THEN T.CLOSECAUSE WHEN '6' THEN (SELECT MAX(PRODATE) FROM MAADMREC T3 WHERE T3.APNO = T.APNO AND T3.LETTERTYPE = '21' AND T3.NDOMK1 = '02' AND TRIM(T3.DELMK) IS NULL) END AS "NOTE", T.EXEDATE FROM BAAPPBASE T
1 = 0
T.APNO LIKE #payCode:VARCHAR# || '%' AND T.SEQNO = '0000' AND T.PROCSTAT IN ('40','50','80','90') AND T.ARCDATE IS NULL AND T.ARCPG IS NULL
AND T. EXEDATE >= #decisionSdate:VARCHAR# AND T. EXEDATE <= #decisionEdate:VARCHAR#
AND T.EXEMAN = #exeMan:VARCHAR#
ORDER BY T.CASETYP , T.APNO

SELECT CASETYP, APNO, EVTNAME, ISSUYM, CHKMAN, EXEMAN, NOTE, EXEDATE FROM (SELECT T.CASETYP, T.APNO, T.EVTNAME, T.ISSUYM, T.CHKMAN, T.EXEMAN, CASE T.CASETYP WHEN '3' THEN (SELECT MAX(PRODATE) FROM MAADMREC T1 WHERE T1.APNO = T.APNO AND T1.LETTERTYPE = '21'
AND T1.NDOMK1 <> '02'
AND TRIM(T1.DELMK) IS NULL) WHEN '4' THEN T.CLOSECAUSE WHEN '6' THEN (SELECT MAX(PRODATE) FROM MAADMREC T3 WHERE T3.APNO = T.APNO AND T3.LETTERTYPE = '21' AND T3.NDOMK1 = '02' AND TRIM(T3.DELMK) IS NULL) END AS "NOTE", T.EXEDATE FROM BAAPPBASE T
1 = 0
T.APNO LIKE #payCode:VARCHAR# || '%' AND T.SEQNO = '0000' AND T.PROCSTAT IN ('40','50','80','90') AND T.ARCDATE IS NULL AND T.ARCPG IS NULL
AND T.CASETYP <> '3' AND T.EXEDATE >= #decisionSdate:VARCHAR# AND T.EXEDATE <= #decisionEdate:VARCHAR#
AND T.EXEMAN = #exeMan:VARCHAR#
ORDER BY T.CASETYP, T.APNO) A UNION ALL SELECT CASETYP, APNO, EVTNAME, ISSUYM, CHKMAN, EXEMAN, NOTE, EXEDATE FROM (SELECT T.CASETYP, T.APNO, T.EVTNAME, T.ISSUYM, T.CHKMAN, T.EXEMAN, CASE T.CASETYP WHEN '3' THEN (SELECT MAX(PRODATE) FROM MAADMREC T1 WHERE T1.APNO = T.APNO AND T1.LETTERTYPE = '21'
AND T1.NDOMK1 <> '02'
AND TRIM(T1.DELMK) IS NULL) WHEN '4' THEN T.CLOSECAUSE WHEN '6' THEN (SELECT MAX(PRODATE) FROM MAADMREC T3 WHERE T3.APNO = T.APNO AND T3.LETTERTYPE = '21' AND T3.NDOMK1 = '02' AND TRIM(T3.DELMK) IS NULL) END AS "NOTE", T.EXEDATE FROM BAAPPBASE T
1 = 0
T.APNO LIKE #payCode:VARCHAR# || '%' AND T.SEQNO = '0000' AND T.PROCSTAT IN ('40','50','80','90') AND T.ARCDATE IS NULL AND T.ARCPG IS NULL
AND T.CASETYP = '3' AND T.EXEDATE >= #decisionSdate:VARCHAR# AND T.EXEDATE <= #decisionEdate:VARCHAR#
AND T.EXEMAN = #exeMan:VARCHAR#
ORDER BY T.CASETYP, T.APNO) B
sqlMap.update: UPDATE BAAPPBASE SET ARCDATE = #arcDate:VARCHAR#, ARCPG = #arcPg:VARCHAR# WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = '0000'
UPDATE BAAPPBASE SET REGETCIPBMK = #regetCipbMk:VARCHAR# WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = '0000'
sqlMap.select:
SELECT T.APNO, T.SEQNO, T.BENDIEDATE, T.BENNAME, T.BENIDNNO, T.BENBRDATE FROM BAAPPBASE T WHERE T.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
AND T.SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR# AND ((NVL(TRIM(T.BENDIEDATE),' ') <> ' ' AND T.BENDIEDATE IS NOT NULL) OR (T.SEQNO = '0000' AND NVL(TRIM(T.EVTDIEDATE),' ') <> ' ' AND T.EVTDIEDATE IS NOT NULL)) AND NVL(TRIM(T.CASEMK),' ') <> 'D'

SELECT ORIISSUYM, PAYYM, (SELECT MIN(D.BRCHKDATE) FROM BAPFLBAC D WHERE D.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND D.SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR# AND D.ORIISSUYM = TT.ORIISSUYM AND D.PAYYM = TT.PAYYM ) BRCHKDATE, REMITAMT, ISSUKIND, BRNOTE FROM (SELECT TT1.APNO, TT1.SEQNO, TT1.ORIISSUYM, TT1.PAYYM, TT1.REMITAMT, TT1.ISSUKIND, TT1.BRNOTE FROM BAPFLBAC TT1,BAREGIVEDTL TT2 WHERE TT1.APNO = TT2.APNO AND TT1.SEQNO = TT2.SEQNO AND TT1.ORIISSUYM = TT2.ORIISSUYM AND TT1.PAYYM = TT2.PAYYM AND TT1.AFMK = '3' AND TT2.MK = '1' AND TT1.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND TT1.SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR#
AND TT1.PAYYM <= (SELECT SUBSTR(A.BENDIEDATE,1,6)
FROM BAAPPBASE A WHERE A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND A.SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR#) UNION SELECT TT1.APNO, TT1.SEQNO, TT1.ORIISSUYM, TT1.PAYYM, TT1.REMITAMT, TT1.ISSUKIND, TT1.BRNOTE FROM BAPFLBAC TT1,BAREGIVEDTL TT2 WHERE TT1.APNO = TT2.APNO AND TT1.SEQNO = TT2.SEQNO AND TT1.ORIISSUYM = TT2.ORIISSUYM AND TT1.PAYYM = TT2.PAYYM AND TT1.AFMK = '4' AND TT2.MK = '4' AND TT1.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND TT1.SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR#
AND TT1.PAYYM <= (SELECT SUBSTR(A.BENDIEDATE,1,6)
FROM BAAPPBASE A WHERE A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND A.SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR#) AND (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BAAPPBASE B WHERE B.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
1 = 0
B.SEQNO LIKE #heirSeqNo:VARCHAR# || '%'
AND B.SEQNO <> #seqNo:VARCHAR# AND B.BENEVTREL IN ('2','3','4','5','6','7') AND NVL(TRIM(B.CASEMK),' ') <> 'D' )>0 AND TT1.APNO NOT IN (Select DISTINCT APNO FROM BAREGIVEDTL C WHERE C.APNO = TT1.APNO AND C.SEQNO <> '0000' AND C.ORIISSUYM = TT1.ORIISSUYM AND C.PAYYM = TT1.PAYYM AND C.MK = '2')
) TT ORDER BY ORIISSUYM

SELECT T.SEQNO, T.BENNAME, T.BENIDNNO, T.BENEVTREL FROM BAAPPBASE T WHERE T.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND T.BENEVTREL IN ('2','3','4','5','6','7')
AND NVL(TRIM(T.CASEMK),' ') <> 'D'
1 = 0
T.SEQNO LIKE #heirSeqNo:VARCHAR# || '%'
ORDER BY T.SEQNO

SELECT T1.SEQNO, T2.ISSUYM, T2.PAYYM, T1.BENNAME, T2.ISSUEAMT, T1.ACCREL, T1.PAYTYP, T1.PAYBANKID, T1.BRANCHID, T1.PAYEEACC, T3.ISSUKIND FROM BAAPPBASE T1,BADAPR T2,BAREGIVEDTL T3 WHERE T1.APNO = T2.APNO AND T1.SEQNO = T2.SEQNO AND T1.APNO = T3.APNO AND T1.SEQNO = T3.SEQNO AND T2.ISSUYM = T3.ORIISSUYM AND T2.PAYYM = T3.PAYYM AND T3.MK = '1' AND T2.MTESTMK = 'F' AND T1.BENEVTREL IN ('2','3','4','5','6','7') AND T2.PAYKIND = T3.ISSUKIND AND T1.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
AND NVL(TRIM(T1.CASEMK),' ') <> 'D'
1 = 0
T1.SEQNO LIKE #heirSeqNo:VARCHAR# || '%'
ORDER BY T2.ISSUYM,T2.PAYYM,T2.SEQNO

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT T1.SEQNO) AS INDEXCOUNT FROM BAAPPBASE T1,BADAPR T2,BAREGIVEDTL T3 WHERE T1.APNO = T2.APNO AND T1.SEQNO = T2.SEQNO AND T1.APNO = T3.APNO AND T1.SEQNO = T3.SEQNO AND T2.ISSUYM = T3.ORIISSUYM AND T2.PAYYM = T3.PAYYM AND T3.MK = '1' AND T1.BENEVTREL IN ('2','3','4','5','6','7') AND T1.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
1 = 0
T1.SEQNO LIKE #heirSeqNo:VARCHAR# || '%'
ORDER BY T2.ISSUYM,T2.PAYYM,T2.SEQNO

SELECT DISTINCT A.APNO, A.SEQNO, A.EVTNAME, A.EVTIDNNO, A.EVTBRDATE, A.EVTJOBDATE, A.PAYKIND, A.ISSUYM, TO_CHAR(B.BKACCOUNTDT,'YYYYMMDD') AS BKACCOUNTDT FROM BAAPPBASE A, PFPCCKY B WHERE A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND A.APNO LIKE #payCode:VARCHAR# || '%' AND A.APNO = B.TEMPHANDLENO AND B.INSKD='1' AND B.printnotecode = 'Y' AND B.available_money > 0 AND LENGTH(B.TEMPHANDLENO)=12

SELECT DISTINCT A.APNO, A.SEQNO, A.EVTNAME, A.EVTIDNNO, A.EVTBRDATE, A.EVTJOBDATE, A.PAYKIND, A.ISSUYM, TO_CHAR(B.BKACCOUNTDT,'YYYYMMDD') AS BKACCOUNTDT FROM BAAPPBASE A, PFPCCKY B WHERE A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND A.APNO LIKE #payCode:VARCHAR# || '%' AND A.APNO = B.TEMPHANDLENO AND B.INSKD='1' AND B.printnotecode = 'Y' AND B.available_money > 0 AND LENGTH(B.TEMPHANDLENO)=12

SELECT DISTINCT A.APNO, '' AS SEQNO, A.EVTNAME, A.EVTIDNNO, A.EVTBRDATE, A.EVTJOBDATE, A.PAYKIND, A.ISSUYM, TO_CHAR(B.BKACCOUNTDT,'YYYYMMDD') AS BKACCOUNTDT FROM BAAPPBASE A, PFPCCKY B WHERE A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND A.APNO LIKE #payCode:VARCHAR# || '%' AND A.APNO = B.TEMPHANDLENO AND B.INSKD='1' AND B.printnotecode = 'Y' AND B.available_money > 0 AND LENGTH(B.TEMPHANDLENO)=12

Select DISTINCT T1.APNO, T1.SEQNO, T1.EVTNAME, T1.EVTIDNNO, T1.EVTBRDATE, T1.EVTJOBDATE, T1.PAYKIND, C1.ISSUYM, T1.BKACCOUNTDT, '' AS ISSUYM, '' AS PAYYM, '' AS SEQNO From ( SELECT DISTINCT A.APNO, A.SEQNO, A.EVTNAME, A.EVTIDNNO, A.EVTBRDATE, A.EVTJOBDATE, A.PAYKIND, A.ISSUYM, TO_CHAR(B.BKACCOUNTDT,'YYYYMMDD') AS BKACCOUNTDT, B.BARCODE2, B.DIVSEQ FROM BAAPPBASE A, PFPCCKY B WHERE A.APNO LIKE #payCode:VARCHAR# || '%' AND (INSKD, BLI_ACCOUNT_CODE, BOOKEDBOOK, BKACCOUNTDT, BATCHNO, SERIALNO, CASH_AMT, INDEX_NO) IN (SELECT DISTINCT INSKD, BLI_ACCOUNT_CODE, BOOKEDBOOK, BKACCOUNTDT, BATCHNO, SERIALNO, CASH_AMT, INDEX_NO FROM PFPCCKY WHERE TEMPRVACCOUNTMARK = '6' AND TEMPPAYDTE = #chkDate:VARCHAR#) AND A.APNO = B.TEMPHANDLENO
AND A.SEQNO = '0000'
AND A.SEQNO = '0000'
AND A.SEQNO <> '0000'
AND B.INSKD='1' AND B.printnotecode = 'Y' AND B.available_money > 0 AND LENGTH(B.TEMPHANDLENO)=12) T1, BAUNACPDTL C1, BAPAYMENTDTL C2, BAPAYMENTREMOTEDTL C3 WHERE C3.BARCODE2 = T1.BARCODE2 And SUBSTR(C3.BARCODE2, 2, 13) || '00' = C2.PAYMENTNO and C3.DIVSEQ = C2.WRITEOFFSEQNO and C1.APNO = C2.APNO and C1.SEQNO = C2.SEQNO and C1.ISSUYM = C2.ISSUYM and C1.PAYYM = C2.PAYYM and C1.RECAMT = C2.RECAMT and C2.WRITEOFFSEQNO IS NOT NULL and C3.DIVSEQ = T1.DIVSEQ and T1.APNO = C1.APNO and T1.SEQNO = C1.SEQNO

SELECT DISTINCT A.APNO, A.SEQNO, A.EVTNAME, A.EVTIDNNO, A.EVTBRDATE, A.EVTJOBDATE, A.PAYKIND, A.ISSUYM FROM BAAPPBASE A, PFPCCKY B WHERE A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND A.APNO LIKE #payCode:VARCHAR# || '%' AND A.APNO = B.TEMPHANDLENO AND (A.CASETYP = '3' OR A.CASETYP = '4') AND B.INSKD='1' AND B.printnotecode = 'Y' AND LENGTH(B.TEMPHANDLENO)=12

SELECT DISTINCT A.APNO, A.SEQNO, A.EVTNAME, A.EVTIDNNO, A.EVTBRDATE, A.EVTJOBDATE, A.PAYKIND, A.ISSUYM FROM BAAPPBASE A, (SELECT TT1.APNO, TT1.SEQNO FROM BAPFLBAC TT1, BAREGIVEDTL TT2 WHERE TT1.APNO = TT2.APNO AND TT1.SEQNO = TT2.SEQNO AND TT1.ORIISSUYM = TT2.ORIISSUYM AND TT1.PAYYM = TT2.PAYYM AND TT1.AFMK = '3' AND TT2.MK = '1' AND TT1.ISSUKIND IN ('45') AND TT1.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND TT1.SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR#) B,BAUNACPDTL C WHERE A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND A.APNO LIKE #payCode:VARCHAR# || '%' AND A.SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR# AND A.APNO = B.APNO AND A.SEQNO = B.SEQNO AND A.APNO = C.APNO AND A.SEQNO = C.SEQNO AND (A.CASETYP = '3' OR A.CASETYP = '4')

SELECT DISTINCT A.APNO, A.SEQNO, A.EVTNAME, A.EVTIDNNO, A.EVTBRDATE, A.EVTJOBDATE, A.PAYKIND, A.ISSUYM FROM BAAPPBASE A, (SELECT TT1.APNO, TT1.SEQNO FROM BAPFLBAC TT1, BAREGIVEDTL TT2 WHERE TT1.APNO = TT2.APNO AND TT1.SEQNO = TT2.SEQNO AND TT1.ORIISSUYM = TT2.ORIISSUYM AND TT1.PAYYM = TT2.PAYYM AND TT1.AFMK = '3' AND TT2.MK = '1' AND TT1.ISSUKIND IN ('35') AND TT1.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND TT1.SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR#) B,BAUNACPDTL C WHERE A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND A.APNO LIKE #payCode:VARCHAR# || '%' AND A.SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR# AND A.APNO = B.APNO AND A.SEQNO = B.SEQNO AND A.APNO = C.APNO AND A.SEQNO = C.SEQNO AND (A.CASETYP = '3' OR A.CASETYP = '4')

SELECT DISTINCT A.APNO, A.SEQNO, A.EVTNAME, A.EVTIDNNO, A.EVTBRDATE, A.EVTJOBDATE, A.PAYKIND, A.ISSUYM FROM BAAPPBASE A, (SELECT TT1.APNO, TT1.SEQNO FROM BAPFLBAC TT1, BAREGIVEDTL TT2 WHERE TT1.APNO = TT2.APNO AND TT1.SEQNO = TT2.SEQNO AND TT1.ORIISSUYM = TT2.ORIISSUYM AND TT1.PAYYM = TT2.PAYYM AND TT1.AFMK = '3' AND TT2.MK = '1' AND TT1.ISSUKIND IN ('55') AND TT1.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND TT1.SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR#) B,BAUNACPDTL C WHERE A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND A.APNO LIKE #payCode:VARCHAR# || '%' AND A.SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR# AND A.APNO = B.APNO AND A.SEQNO = B.SEQNO AND A.APNO = C.APNO AND A.SEQNO = C.SEQNO AND (A.CASETYP = '3' OR A.CASETYP = '4')

SELECT DISTINCT A.APNO, A.SEQNO, A.EVTNAME, A.EVTIDNNO, A.EVTBRDATE, A.EVTJOBDATE, A.PAYKIND, A.ISSUYM FROM BAAPPBASE A, (SELECT TT1.APNO, TT1.SEQNO FROM BAPFLBAC TT1, BAREGIVEDTL TT2 WHERE TT1.APNO = TT2.APNO AND TT1.SEQNO = TT2.SEQNO AND TT1.ORIISSUYM = TT2.ORIISSUYM AND TT1.PAYYM = TT2.PAYYM AND TT1.AFMK = '4' AND TT2.MK = '4' AND TT1.ISSUKIND IN ('45') AND TT1.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND TT1.SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR#) B,BAUNACPDTL C WHERE A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND A.APNO LIKE #payCode:VARCHAR# || '%' AND A.SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR# AND A.APNO = B.APNO AND A.SEQNO = B.SEQNO AND A.APNO = C.APNO AND A.SEQNO = C.SEQNO AND (A.CASETYP = '3' OR A.CASETYP = '4')

SELECT DISTINCT A.APNO, A.SEQNO, A.EVTNAME, A.EVTIDNNO, A.EVTBRDATE, A.EVTJOBDATE, A.PAYKIND, A.ISSUYM FROM BAAPPBASE A, (SELECT TT1.APNO, TT1.SEQNO FROM BAPFLBAC TT1, BAREGIVEDTL TT2 WHERE TT1.APNO = TT2.APNO AND TT1.SEQNO = TT2.SEQNO AND TT1.ORIISSUYM = TT2.ORIISSUYM AND TT1.PAYYM = TT2.PAYYM AND TT1.AFMK = '4' AND TT2.MK = '4' AND TT1.ISSUKIND IN ('35') AND TT1.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND TT1.SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR#) B,BAUNACPDTL C WHERE A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND A.APNO LIKE #payCode:VARCHAR# || '%' AND A.SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR# AND A.APNO = B.APNO AND A.SEQNO = B.SEQNO AND A.APNO = C.APNO AND A.SEQNO = C.SEQNO AND (A.CASETYP = '3' OR A.CASETYP = '4')

SELECT DISTINCT A.APNO, A.SEQNO, A.EVTNAME, A.EVTIDNNO, A.EVTBRDATE, A.EVTJOBDATE, A.PAYKIND, A.ISSUYM FROM BAAPPBASE A, (SELECT TT1.APNO, TT1.SEQNO FROM BAPFLBAC TT1, BAREGIVEDTL TT2 WHERE TT1.APNO = TT2.APNO AND TT1.SEQNO = TT2.SEQNO AND TT1.ORIISSUYM = TT2.ORIISSUYM AND TT1.PAYYM = TT2.PAYYM AND TT1.AFMK = '4' AND TT2.MK = '4' AND TT1.ISSUKIND IN ('55') AND TT1.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND TT1.SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR#) B,BAUNACPDTL C WHERE A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND A.APNO LIKE #payCode:VARCHAR# || '%' AND A.SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR# AND A.APNO = B.APNO AND A.SEQNO = B.SEQNO AND A.APNO = C.APNO AND A.SEQNO = C.SEQNO AND (A.CASETYP = '3' OR A.CASETYP = '4')

Select NVL(B.ASSIGNNAME ,NVL(t.GRDNAME,t.BENNAME)) As "RECEIVENAME" From BAAPPBASE t, BAAPPEXPAND B Where t.apno = #apNo:VARCHAR# and t.seqno = (Select min(a.Seqno) From BAAPPBASE a Where a.apno = #apNo:VARCHAR#
and a.seqno <> '0000'
And a.casemk is null) AND t.BAAPPBASEID = B.BAAPPBASEID AND t.APNO = B.APNO AND t.SEQNO = B.SEQNO

SELECT RECEIVENAME, COMMZIP, COMMADDR FROM ( Select NVL(B.ASSIGNNAME ,NVL(A.GRDNAME, A.BENNAME)) As "RECEIVENAME", NVL((SELECT A1.COMMZIP FROM BAAPPBASE A1 WHERE A1.APNO = A.APNO AND A1.BENNAME = DECODE(NVL(B.ASSIGNNAME,' '),' ',NVL(A.GRDNAME, A.BENNAME),A.BENNAME) AND ROWNUM = 1),A.COMMZIP) COMMZIP, NVL((SELECT A1.COMMADDR FROM BAAPPBASE A1 WHERE A1.APNO = A.APNO AND A1.BENNAME = DECODE(NVL(B.ASSIGNNAME,' '),' ',NVL(A.GRDNAME, A.BENNAME),A.BENNAME) AND ROWNUM = 1),A.COMMADDR) COMMADDR, A.seqno From BAAPPBASE A, BAAPPEXPAND B Where A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
AND A.SEQNO <> '0000'
AND A.CASEMK is null AND (TRIM(A.CLOSECAUSE) = '' OR TRIM(A.CLOSECAUSE) IS NULL) AND (TRIM(A.UNQUALIFIEDCAUSE) = '' OR TRIM(A.UNQUALIFIEDCAUSE) IS NULL) AND A.SEQNO in (Select MAX(t1.SEQNO) from BADAPR t1 Where t1.APNO = A.APNO and t1.ISSUYM = A.ISSUYM and t1.PAYYM = A.PAYYM
and t1.SEQNO <> '0000' and (t1.ACCEPTMK <> 'N' OR trim(t1.Acceptmk) = '' OR t1.acceptmk is null)
and t1.VERISEQ = (Select max(TO_NUMBER(t11.VERISEQ)) from BADAPR t11 Where t11.APNO = t1.APNO and t11.ISSUYM = t1.ISSUYM and t11.PAYYM = t1.PAYYM)) AND A.BAAPPBASEID = B.BAAPPBASEID AND A.APNO = B.APNO AND A.SEQNO = B.SEQNO UNION Select NVL(B.ASSIGNNAME ,NVL(t.GRDNAME,t.BENNAME)) As "RECEIVENAME", NVL((SELECT A1.COMMZIP FROM BAAPPBASE A1 WHERE A1.APNO = t.APNO AND A1.BENNAME = DECODE(NVL(B.ASSIGNNAME,' '),' ',NVL(t.GRDNAME, t.BENNAME),t.BENNAME) AND ROWNUM = 1),T.COMMZIP) COMMZIP, NVL((SELECT A1.COMMADDR FROM BAAPPBASE A1 WHERE A1.APNO = t.APNO AND A1.BENNAME = DECODE(NVL(B.ASSIGNNAME,' '),' ',NVL(t.GRDNAME, t.BENNAME),t.BENNAME) AND ROWNUM = 1),T.COMMADDR) COMMADDR, t.seqno From BAAPPBASE t, BAAPPEXPAND B Where t.apNo = #apNo:VARCHAR# And t.casemk is null
AND (TRIM(t.UNQUALIFIEDCAUSE) <> '' OR TRIM(t.UNQUALIFIEDCAUSE) IS NOT NULL)
AND (TRIM(t.BENDIEDATE) = '' OR TRIM(t.BENDIEDATE) IS NULL) AND t.BAAPPBASEID = B.BAAPPBASEID AND t.APNO = B.APNO AND t.SEQNO = B.SEQNO ) ORDER BY SEQNO DESC

Select NVL(B.ASSIGNNAME ,NVL(t.GRDNAME,t.BENNAME)) As "RECEIVENAME" From BAAPPBASE t, BAAPPEXPAND B Where t.apNo = #apNo:VARCHAR# And t.seqNo = #seqNo:VARCHAR# And t.casemk is null AND t.BAAPPBASEID = B.BAAPPBASEID AND t.APNO = B.APNO AND t.SEQNO = B.SEQNO

Select NVL(B.ASSIGNNAME ,NVL(t.GRDNAME,t.BENNAME)) As "RECEIVENAME" From BAAPPBASE t, BAAPPEXPAND B Where t.apNo = #apNo:VARCHAR# And t.seqNo = #seqNo:VARCHAR# And t.casemk is null AND (TRIM(t.CLOSECAUSE) = '' OR TRIM(t.CLOSECAUSE) IS NULL) AND (TRIM(t.UNQUALIFIEDCAUSE) = '' OR TRIM(t.UNQUALIFIEDCAUSE) IS NULL) AND t.SEQNO in (Select t1.SEQNO from BADAPR t1 Where t1.APNO = t.APNO and t1.ISSUYM = t.ISSUYM and t1.PAYYM = t.PAYYM
and t1.SEQNO <> '0000' and t1.ACCEPTMK <> 'N'
and t1.VERISEQ = (Select max(TO_NUMBER(t11.VERISEQ)) from BADAPR t11 Where t11.APNO = t1.APNO and t11.ISSUYM = t1.ISSUYM and t11.PAYYM = t1.PAYYM)) AND t.BAAPPBASEID = B.BAAPPBASEID AND t.APNO = B.APNO AND t.SEQNO = B.SEQNO UNION Select NVL(B.ASSIGNNAME ,NVL(t.GRDNAME,t.BENNAME)) As "RECEIVENAME" From BAAPPBASE t, BAAPPEXPAND B Where t.apNo = #apNo:VARCHAR# And t.seqNo = #seqNo:VARCHAR# And t.casemk is null
AND (TRIM(t.UNQUALIFIEDCAUSE) <> '' OR TRIM(t.UNQUALIFIEDCAUSE) IS NOT NULL)
AND (TRIM(t.BENDIEDATE) = '' OR TRIM(t.BENDIEDATE) IS NULL) AND t.BAAPPBASEID = B.BAAPPBASEID AND t.APNO = B.APNO AND t.SEQNO = B.SEQNO

Select t.BENNAME, (Select Decode(A.BENNAME,NULL,'N','Y') FROM BAAPPBASE A WHERE A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
And A.SEQNO <> '0000'
And A.CASEMK is null And A.BENNAME = #grdName:VARCHAR# And A.GRDNAME is null AND A.SEQNO = (Select MIN(SEQNO) FROM BAAPPBASE A WHERE A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
And A.SEQNO <> '0000'
And A.CASEMK is null And A.BENNAME = #grdName:VARCHAR# And A.GRDNAME is null) ) As "RECEIVEMK", t.commzip, t.commaddr From BAAPPBASE t Where t.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
And t.SEQNO <> '0000'
And t.CASEMK is null And t.GRDNAME = #grdName:VARCHAR#

Select payTyp From BAAPPBASE t Where t.apno = #apNo:VARCHAR# and t.seqno = (Select min(a.Seqno) From BAAPPBASE a Where a.apno = #apNo:VARCHAR#
and a.seqno <> '0000'
And a.casemk is null)

SELECT T1.BENNAME, (SELECT DECODE(COUNT(*), 0, 'N', 'Y') FROM BAAPPBASE A1 WHERE A1.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
AND A1.SEQNO <> '0000'
AND (NVL(TRIM(A1.CASEMK), ' ') = ' ' OR TRIM(A1.CASEMK) IS NULL) AND (NVL(TRIM(A1.GRDNAME), ' ') = ' ' OR TRIM(A1.GRDNAME) IS NULL) AND A1.BENNAME = #grdName:VARCHAR#) AS "RECEIVEMK", T1.COMMZIP, T1.COMMADDR, T1.SEQNO FROM BAAPPBASE T1 WHERE T1.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
AND T1.SEQNO <> '0000'
AND (NVL(TRIM(T1.CASEMK), ' ') = ' ' OR TRIM(T1.CASEMK) IS NULL) AND (NVL(TRIM(T1.BENDIEDATE), ' ') = ' ' OR TRIM(T1.BENDIEDATE) IS NULL)
AND (T1.UNQUALIFIEDCAUSE IS NOT NULL AND NVL(TRIM(T1.UNQUALIFIEDCAUSE), ' ') <> ' ') AND T1.BENNAME <> #grdName:VARCHAR#
AND T1.GRDNAME = #grdName:VARCHAR# UNION SELECT T2.BENNAME, (SELECT DECODE(COUNT(*), 0, 'N', 'Y') FROM BAAPPBASE A2 WHERE A2.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
AND A2.SEQNO <> '0000'
AND (NVL(TRIM(A2.CASEMK), ' ') = ' ' OR TRIM(A2.CASEMK) IS NULL) AND (NVL(TRIM(A2.GRDNAME), ' ') = ' ' OR TRIM(A2.GRDNAME) IS NULL) AND A2.BENNAME = #grdName:VARCHAR#) AS "RECEIVEMK", T2.COMMZIP, T2.COMMADDR, T2.SEQNO FROM BAAPPBASE T2 WHERE T2.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
AND T2.SEQNO <> '0000'
AND (NVL(TRIM(T2.CASEMK), ' ') = ' ' OR TRIM(T2.CASEMK) IS NULL) AND (NVL(TRIM(T2.CLOSECAUSE), ' ') = ' ' OR TRIM(T2.CLOSECAUSE) IS NULL) AND (NVL(TRIM(T2.UNQUALIFIEDCAUSE), ' ') = ' ' OR TRIM(T2.UNQUALIFIEDCAUSE) IS NULL)
AND T2.BENNAME <> #grdName:VARCHAR#
AND T2.GRDNAME = #grdName:VARCHAR# AND T2.SEQNO IN (SELECT C2.SEQNO FROM BADAPR C2 WHERE C2.APNO = T2.APNO AND C2.ISSUYM = T2.ISSUYM AND C2.PAYYM = T2.PAYYM
AND C2.ACCEPTMK <> 'N'
AND C2.VERISEQ = (SELECT MAX(TO_NUMBER(D2.VERISEQ)) FROM BADAPR D2 WHERE D2.APNO = C2.APNO AND D2.ISSUYM = C2.ISSUYM AND D2.PAYYM = C2.PAYYM)) UNION SELECT T31.BENNAME, 'A' AS "RECEIVEMK", T31.COMMZIP, T31.COMMADDR, T31.SEQNO FROM BAAPPBASE T31, BAAPPEXPAND T32 WHERE T31.BAAPPBASEID = T32.BAAPPBASEID AND T31.APNO = T32.APNO AND T31.SEQNO = T32.SEQNO AND T31.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
AND T31.SEQNO <> '0000'
AND (NVL(TRIM(T31.CASEMK), ' ') = ' ' OR TRIM(T31.CASEMK) IS NULL) AND (NVL(TRIM(T31.BENDIEDATE), ' ') = ' ' OR TRIM(T31.BENDIEDATE) IS NULL)
AND (T31.UNQUALIFIEDCAUSE IS NOT NULL AND NVL(TRIM(T31.UNQUALIFIEDCAUSE), ' ') <> ' ') AND T31.BENNAME <> #grdName:VARCHAR#
AND T32.ASSIGNNAME = #grdName:VARCHAR# UNION SELECT T41.BENNAME, 'A' AS "RECEIVEMK", T41.COMMZIP, T41.COMMADDR, T41.SEQNO FROM BAAPPBASE T41, BAAPPEXPAND T42 WHERE T41.BAAPPBASEID = T42.BAAPPBASEID AND T41.APNO = T42.APNO AND T41.SEQNO = T42.SEQNO AND T41.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
AND T41.SEQNO <> '0000'
AND (NVL(TRIM(T41.CASEMK), ' ') = ' ' OR TRIM(T41.CASEMK) IS NULL) AND (NVL(TRIM(T41.CLOSECAUSE), ' ') = ' ' OR TRIM(T41.CLOSECAUSE) IS NULL) AND (NVL(TRIM(T41.UNQUALIFIEDCAUSE), ' ') = ' ' OR TRIM(T41.UNQUALIFIEDCAUSE) IS NULL)
AND T41.BENNAME <> #grdName:VARCHAR#
AND T42.ASSIGNNAME = #grdName:VARCHAR# AND T41.SEQNO IN (SELECT C4.SEQNO FROM BADAPR C4 WHERE C4.APNO = T41.APNO AND C4.ISSUYM = T41.ISSUYM AND C4.PAYYM = T41.PAYYM
AND C4.ACCEPTMK <> 'N'
AND C4.VERISEQ = (SELECT MAX(TO_NUMBER(D4.VERISEQ)) FROM BADAPR D4 WHERE D4.APNO = C4.APNO AND D4.ISSUYM = C4.ISSUYM AND D4.PAYYM = C4.PAYYM))
ORDER BY SEQNO

SELECT SUBSTR(T2.APNO,1,1) As "PAYTYPE", T2.APNO As "APNO", T2.BENNAME As "BENNAME", T2.EVTSEX As "BENSEX", T2.COMMADDR As "COMMADDR", T2.COMMZIP As "COMMZIP", T2.ISSUYM As "ISSUYM", T2.SEQNO As "SEQNO", T2.EVTIDNNO As "EVTIDNNO", T2.EVTNAME As "EVTNAME", (SELECT B1.PRPNO FROM BCCMF09 B1 WHERE NVL(TRIM(TAL20),' ') <> '0099' AND B1.INSKD = '1' AND (B1.PAYTYP||B1.GROUPMK) LIKE (SUBSTR(T2.APNO,1,2)||'%') AND ((SUBSTR(T2.APNO, 12, 1) IN (TAL11, TAL12, TAL13, TAL14, TAL15)) OR (SUBSTR(B1.TAL20, 1, 2) <= SUBSTR(T2.APNO, 11, 2) AND SUBSTR(TAL20, 3, 2) >= SUBSTR(T2.APNO, 11, 2)) OR (SUBSTR(T2.APNO, 11, 2) IN (B1.TAL21, B1.TAL22, B1.TAL23, B1.TAL24, B1.TAL25))) AND (TRIM(B1.STATUS) IS NULL OR B1.STATUS <> 'D')) As "PRPNO", T2.NOTIFYFORM FROM BAAPPBASE T2 WHERE T2.APNO LIKE 'K%' AND T2.SEQNO = '0000' AND T2.CASETYP = '2' AND T2.PAYKIND IN ('35','38') AND T2.PROCSTAT IN ('50') AND T2.CASEMK IS NULL AND T2.MANCHKMK = 'Y' AND T2.APNO IN (SELECT B2.APNO FROM BAFAMILY B2 WHERE B2.APNO = T2.APNO AND B2.FAMEVTREL = '4' AND SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(B2.FAMBRDATE,'YYYYMMDD'),20*12),'YYYYMMDD'),1,6) = T2.ISSUYM AND B2.APNO IN (SELECT B3.APNO FROM BACHKFILE B3 WHERE B3.APNO = B2.APNO AND B3.SEQNO = B2.SEQNO AND B3.ISSUYM = T2.ISSUYM AND B3.PAYYM = T2.PAYYM AND B3.CHKTYP = 'C' AND B3.CHKCODE IN ('41','71')) AND B2.SEQNO IN (SELECT B4.SEQNO FROM BAFAMQUAL B4 WHERE B4.APNO = B2.APNO AND B4.SEQNO = B2.SEQNO AND B4.ISSUYM = T2.ISSUYM AND B4.PAYYM = T2.PAYYM AND B4.QUALMK = 'Y' AND B4.VERISEQ = (SELECT MAX(TO_NUMBER(B5.VERISEQ)) FROM BAFAMQUAL B5 WHERE B5.APNO = B4.APNO AND B5.SEQNO = B4.SEQNO AND B5.ISSUYM = B4.ISSUYM AND B5.PAYYM = B4.PAYYM))) Order By PAYTYPE, PRPNO, APNO

SELECT SUBSTR(T1.APNO,1,1) As "PAYTYPE", T1.APNO As "APNO", T1.BENNAME As "BENNAME", T1.BENSEX As "BENSEX", T1.COMMADDR As "COMMADDR", T1.COMMZIP As "COMMZIP", T1.ISSUYM As "ISSUYM", T1.SEQNO As "SEQNO", T1.EVTIDNNO As "EVTIDNNO", T1.EVTNAME As "EVTNAME", (SELECT A1.PRPNO FROM BCCMF09 A1 WHERE NVL(TRIM(TAL20),' ') <> '0099' AND A1.INSKD = '1' AND (A1.PAYTYP||A1.GROUPMK) LIKE (SUBSTR(T1.APNO,1,2)||'%') AND ((SUBSTR(T1.APNO, 12, 1) IN (TAL11, TAL12, TAL13, TAL14, TAL15)) OR (SUBSTR(A1.TAL20, 1, 2) <= SUBSTR(T1.APNO, 11, 2) AND SUBSTR(TAL20, 3, 2) >= SUBSTR(T1.APNO, 11, 2)) OR (SUBSTR(T1.APNO, 11, 2) IN (A1.TAL21, A1.TAL22, A1.TAL23, A1.TAL24, A1.TAL25))) AND (TRIM(A1.STATUS) IS NULL OR A1.STATUS <> 'D')) As "PRPNO", T1.NOTIFYFORM FROM BAAPPBASE T1 WHERE T1.APNO LIKE 'S%' AND T1.SEQNO <> '0000' AND T1.CASETYP = '2' AND T1.PAYKIND IN ('55','56','59') AND T1.PROCSTAT IN ('50') AND T1.CASEMK IS NULL AND T1.BENEVTREL IN ('4','7') AND T1.CLOSEDATE IS NULL AND T1.MANCHKMK = 'Y' AND T1.ISSUYM = SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(T1.BENBRDATE,'YYYYMMDD'),20*12),'YYYYMMDD'),1,6) AND T1.APNO IN (SELECT A2.APNO FROM BACHKFILE A2 WHERE A2.APNO = T1.APNO AND A2.SEQNO = T1.SEQNO AND A2.ISSUYM = T1.ISSUYM AND A2.PAYYM = T1.PAYYM AND A2.CHKTYP = 'C' AND A2.CHKCODE IN ('41','71')) Order By PAYTYPE, PRPNO, APNO

SELECT SUBSTR(T2.APNO,1,1) As "PAYTYPE", T2.APNO As "APNO", T2.BENNAME As "BENNAME", T2.EVTSEX As "BENSEX", T2.COMMADDR As "COMMADDR", T2.COMMZIP As "COMMZIP", T2.ISSUYM As "ISSUYM", T2.SEQNO As "SEQNO", T2.EVTIDNNO As "EVTIDNNO", T2.EVTNAME As "EVTNAME",
(SELECT B1.PRPNO FROM BCCMF09 B1 WHERE NVL(TRIM(TAL20),' ') <> '0099' AND B1.INSKD = '1' AND (B1.PAYTYP||B1.GROUPMK) LIKE (SUBSTR(T2.APNO,1,2)||'%') AND ((SUBSTR(T2.APNO, 12, 1) IN (TAL11, TAL12, TAL13, TAL14, TAL15)) OR (SUBSTR(B1.TAL20, 1, 2) <= SUBSTR(T2.APNO, 11, 2) AND SUBSTR(TAL20, 3, 2) >= SUBSTR(T2.APNO, 11, 2)) OR (SUBSTR(T2.APNO, 11, 2) IN (B1.TAL21, B1.TAL22, B1.TAL23, B1.TAL24, B1.TAL25))) AND (TRIM(B1.STATUS) IS NULL OR B1.STATUS <> 'D')) As "PRPNO",
T2.NOTIFYFORM FROM BAAPPBASE T2 WHERE T2.APNO LIKE 'K%' AND T2.SEQNO = '0000' AND T2.CASETYP = '2' AND T2.PAYKIND IN ('35','38') AND T2.PROCSTAT IN ('50') AND T2.CASEMK IS NULL AND T2.MANCHKMK = 'Y' AND T2.APNO IN (SELECT B2.APNO FROM BAFAMILY B2 WHERE B2.APNO = T2.APNO AND B2.FAMEVTREL = '4' And B2.CLOSEDATE Is NuLL
AND To_Char(SYSDATE,'YYYY')|| #studeChkMonth:VARCHAR# <= SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(B2.FAMBRDATE,'YYYYMMDD'),25*12),'YYYYMMDD'),1,6)
AND (B2.SCHOOLCODE IS NULL OR TRIM(B2.SCHOOLCODE) = '') AND B2.APNO IN (SELECT B3.APNO FROM BACHKFILE B3 WHERE B3.APNO = B2.APNO AND B3.SEQNO = B2.SEQNO AND B3.ISSUYM = T2.ISSUYM AND B3.PAYYM = T2.PAYYM AND B3.CHKTYP = 'C' AND B3.CHKCODE IN ('42','72')) AND B2.SEQNO IN (SELECT B4.SEQNO FROM BAFAMQUAL B4, BAFAMILY E WHERE B4.APNO = B2.APNO AND B4.SEQNO = B2.SEQNO AND B4.ISSUYM = T2.ISSUYM AND B4.PAYYM = T2.PAYYM AND B4.QUALMK = 'Y' AND B4.APNO = E.APNO AND B4.SEQNO = E.SEQNO AND (E.SCHOOLCODE IS NULL OR TRIM(E.SCHOOLCODE) = '')
AND B4.ISSUYM >= (SELECT substr(to_char(add_months(to_date(fambrdate,'yyyymmdd'),12*20-1),'yyyymmdd'),1,6) FROM BAFAMILY WHERE APNO = B2.APNO AND SEQNO = B4.SEQNO)
AND B4.VERISEQ = (SELECT MAX(TO_NUMBER(B5.VERISEQ)) FROM BAFAMQUAL B5 WHERE B5.APNO = B4.APNO AND B5.SEQNO = B4.SEQNO AND B5.ISSUYM = B4.ISSUYM AND B5.PAYYM = B4.PAYYM )) AND B2.APNO NOT IN (SELECT B6.APNO FROM BASTUDNOTIFY B6 WHERE B6.APNO = B2.APNO AND B6.SEQNO = B2.SEQNO AND B6.PRINTTIME LIKE SUBSTR(T2.ISSUYM,1,4) || '%' AND B6.NOTIFYTYPE = '2'
AND B6.STUDEDATE = '06'
AND B6.STUDEDATE = '08'
AND (B6.STUDEDATE = '08' OR B6.STUDEDATE = '09')
) AND B2.APNO IN (SELECT A4.APNO FROM BASTUDTERM A4 WHERE A4.APNO = B2.APNO AND A4.SEQNO = B2.SEQNO AND (SELECT MAX(STUDEDATE) FROM BASTUDTERM WHERE APNO = B2.APNO AND SEQNO = B2.SEQNO) = To_Char(SYSDATE,'YYYY') || #studeDate:VARCHAR#)) Order By PAYTYPE, PRPNO, APNO

SELECT SUBSTR(T1.APNO,1,1) As "PAYTYPE", T1.APNO As "APNO", T1.BENNAME As "BENNAME", T1.BENSEX As "BENSEX", T1.COMMADDR As "COMMADDR", T1.COMMZIP As "COMMZIP", T1.ISSUYM As "ISSUYM", T1.SEQNO As "SEQNO", T1.EVTIDNNO As "EVTIDNNO", T1.EVTNAME As "EVTNAME",
(SELECT A1.PRPNO FROM BCCMF09 A1 WHERE NVL(TRIM(TAL20),' ') <> '0099' AND A1.INSKD = '1' AND (A1.PAYTYP||A1.GROUPMK) LIKE (SUBSTR(T1.APNO,1,2)||'%') AND ((SUBSTR(T1.APNO, 12, 1) IN (TAL11, TAL12, TAL13, TAL14, TAL15)) OR (SUBSTR(A1.TAL20, 1, 2) <= SUBSTR(T1.APNO, 11, 2) AND SUBSTR(TAL20, 3, 2) >= SUBSTR(T1.APNO, 11, 2)) OR (SUBSTR(T1.APNO, 11, 2) IN (A1.TAL21, A1.TAL22, A1.TAL23, A1.TAL24, A1.TAL25))) AND (TRIM(A1.STATUS) IS NULL OR A1.STATUS <> 'D')) As "PRPNO",
T1.NOTIFYFORM FROM BAAPPBASE T1, BAAPPEXPAND T2 WHERE T1.APNO LIKE 'S%'
AND T1.SEQNO <> '0000'
AND T1.CASETYP = '2' AND T1.PAYKIND IN ('55','56','59') AND T1.PROCSTAT IN ('50') AND T1.CASEMK IS NULL AND T1.BENEVTREL IN ('4','7') AND T1.CLOSEDATE IS NULL AND T1.MANCHKMK = 'Y'
AND To_Char(SYSDATE,'YYYY')|| #studeChkMonth:VARCHAR# <= SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(T1.BENBRDATE,'YYYYMMDD'),25*12),'YYYYMMDD'),1,6)
AND T1.APNO = T2.APNO AND T1.SEQNO = T2.SEQNO AND T1.BAAPPBASEID = T2.BAAPPBASEID AND (T2.SCHOOLCODE IS NULL OR TRIM(T2.SCHOOLCODE) = '') AND T1.APNO IN (SELECT A2.APNO FROM BACHKFILE A2 WHERE A2.APNO = T1.APNO AND A2.SEQNO = T1.SEQNO AND A2.ISSUYM = T1.ISSUYM AND A2.PAYYM = T1.PAYYM AND A2.CHKTYP = 'C' AND A2.CHKCODE IN ('42','72') ) AND T1.APNO NOT IN (SELECT A3.APNO FROM BASTUDNOTIFY A3 WHERE A3.APNO = T1.APNO AND A3.SEQNO = T1.SEQNO AND A3.PRINTTIME LIKE SUBSTR(T1.ISSUYM,1,4) || '%' AND A3.NOTIFYTYPE = '2'
AND A3.STUDEDATE = '06'
AND A3.STUDEDATE = '08'
AND (A3.STUDEDATE = '08' OR A3.STUDEDATE = '09')
) AND T1.APNO IN (SELECT A4.APNO FROM BASTUDTERM A4 WHERE A4.APNO = T1.APNO AND A4.SEQNO = T1.SEQNO AND (SELECT MAX(STUDEDATE) FROM BASTUDTERM WHERE APNO = T1.APNO AND SEQNO = T1.SEQNO) = To_Char(SYSDATE,'YYYY') || #studeDate:VARCHAR#) Order By PAYTYPE, PRPNO, APNO

SELECT SUBSTR(T2.APNO,1,1) As "PAYTYPE", T2.APNO As "APNO", T2.BENNAME As "BENNAME", T2.EVTSEX As "BENSEX", T2.COMMADDR As "COMMADDR", T2.COMMZIP As "COMMZIP", T2.ISSUYM As "ISSUYM", T2.SEQNO As "SEQNO", T2.EVTIDNNO As "EVTIDNNO", T2.EVTNAME As "EVTNAME", (SELECT B1.PRPNO FROM BCCMF09 B1 WHERE NVL(TRIM(TAL20),' ') <> '0099' AND B1.INSKD = '1' AND (B1.PAYTYP||B1.GROUPMK) LIKE (SUBSTR(T2.APNO,1,2)||'%') AND ((SUBSTR(T2.APNO, 12, 1) IN (TAL11, TAL12, TAL13, TAL14, TAL15)) OR (SUBSTR(B1.TAL20, 1, 2) <= SUBSTR(T2.APNO, 11, 2) AND SUBSTR(TAL20, 3, 2) >= SUBSTR(T2.APNO, 11, 2)) OR (SUBSTR(T2.APNO, 11, 2) IN (B1.TAL21, B1.TAL22, B1.TAL23, B1.TAL24, B1.TAL25))) AND (TRIM(B1.STATUS) IS NULL OR B1.STATUS <> 'D')) As "PRPNO", T2.NOTIFYFORM FROM BAAPPBASE T2 WHERE T2.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND T2.SEQNO = '0000' AND T2.CASETYP = '2' AND T2.PAYKIND IN ('35','38') AND T2.PROCSTAT IN ('50') AND T2.CASEMK IS NULL AND T2.MANCHKMK = 'Y' AND T2.APNO IN (SELECT B2.APNO FROM BAFAMILY B2 WHERE B2.APNO = T2.APNO AND B2.FAMEVTREL = '4' And B2.CLOSEDATE Is NuLL AND To_Char(SYSDATE,'YYYY')|| #studeChkMonth:VARCHAR# <= SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(B2.FAMBRDATE,'YYYYMMDD'),25*12),'YYYYMMDD'),1,6) AND (B2.SCHOOLCODE IS NULL OR TRIM(B2.SCHOOLCODE) = '') AND B2.APNO IN (SELECT B3.APNO FROM BACHKFILE B3 WHERE B3.APNO = B2.APNO AND B3.SEQNO = B2.SEQNO AND B3.ISSUYM = T2.ISSUYM AND B3.PAYYM = T2.PAYYM AND B3.CHKTYP = 'C' AND B3.CHKCODE IN ('42','72')) AND B2.SEQNO IN (SELECT B4.SEQNO FROM BAFAMQUAL B4, BAFAMILY E WHERE B4.APNO = B2.APNO AND B4.SEQNO = B2.SEQNO AND B4.ISSUYM = T2.ISSUYM AND B4.PAYYM = T2.PAYYM AND B4.QUALMK = 'Y' AND B4.APNO = E.APNO AND B4.SEQNO = E.SEQNO AND (E.SCHOOLCODE IS NULL OR TRIM(E.SCHOOLCODE) = '') AND B4.ISSUYM >= (SELECT substr(to_char(add_months(to_date(fambrdate,'yyyymmdd'),12*20-1),'yyyymmdd'),1,6) FROM BAFAMILY WHERE APNO = B2.APNO AND SEQNO = B4.SEQNO) AND B4.VERISEQ = (SELECT MAX(TO_NUMBER(B5.VERISEQ)) FROM BAFAMQUAL B5 WHERE B5.APNO = B4.APNO AND B5.SEQNO = B4.SEQNO AND B5.ISSUYM = B4.ISSUYM AND B5.PAYYM = B4.PAYYM )) AND B2.APNO NOT IN (SELECT B6.APNO FROM BASTUDNOTIFY B6 WHERE B6.APNO = B2.APNO AND B6.SEQNO = B2.SEQNO AND B6.PRINTTIME LIKE SUBSTR(T2.ISSUYM,1,4) || '%' AND B6.NOTIFYTYPE = '2') AND B2.APNO IN (SELECT A4.APNO FROM BASTUDTERM A4 WHERE A4.APNO = B2.APNO AND A4.SEQNO = B2.SEQNO AND (SELECT MAX(STUDEDATE) FROM BASTUDTERM WHERE APNO = B2.APNO AND SEQNO = B2.SEQNO) = To_Char(SYSDATE,'YYYY') || #studeDate:VARCHAR#)) Order By PAYTYPE, PRPNO, APNO

SELECT SUBSTR(T1.APNO,1,1) As "PAYTYPE", T1.APNO As "APNO", T1.BENNAME As "BENNAME", T1.BENSEX As "BENSEX", T1.COMMADDR As "COMMADDR", T1.COMMZIP As "COMMZIP", T1.ISSUYM As "ISSUYM", T1.SEQNO As "SEQNO", T1.EVTIDNNO As "EVTIDNNO", T1.EVTNAME As "EVTNAME", (SELECT A1.PRPNO FROM BCCMF09 A1 WHERE NVL(TRIM(TAL20),' ') <> '0099' AND A1.INSKD = '1' AND (A1.PAYTYP||A1.GROUPMK) LIKE (SUBSTR(T1.APNO,1,2)||'%') AND ((SUBSTR(T1.APNO, 12, 1) IN (TAL11, TAL12, TAL13, TAL14, TAL15)) OR (SUBSTR(A1.TAL20, 1, 2) <= SUBSTR(T1.APNO, 11, 2) AND SUBSTR(TAL20, 3, 2) >= SUBSTR(T1.APNO, 11, 2)) OR (SUBSTR(T1.APNO, 11, 2) IN (A1.TAL21, A1.TAL22, A1.TAL23, A1.TAL24, A1.TAL25))) AND (TRIM(A1.STATUS) IS NULL OR A1.STATUS <> 'D')) As "PRPNO", T1.NOTIFYFORM FROM BAAPPBASE T1, BAAPPEXPAND T2 WHERE T1.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND T1.SEQNO <> '0000' AND T1.CASETYP = '2' AND T1.PAYKIND IN ('55','56','59') AND T1.PROCSTAT IN ('50') AND T1.CASEMK IS NULL AND T1.BENEVTREL IN ('4','7') AND T1.CLOSEDATE IS NULL AND T1.MANCHKMK = 'Y' AND To_Char(SYSDATE,'YYYY')|| #studeChkMonth:VARCHAR# <= SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(T1.BENBRDATE,'YYYYMMDD'),25*12),'YYYYMMDD'),1,6) AND T1.APNO = T2.APNO AND T1.SEQNO = T2.SEQNO AND T1.BAAPPBASEID = T2.BAAPPBASEID AND (T2.SCHOOLCODE IS NULL OR TRIM(T2.SCHOOLCODE) = '') AND T1.APNO IN (SELECT A2.APNO FROM BACHKFILE A2 WHERE A2.APNO = T1.APNO AND A2.SEQNO = T1.SEQNO AND A2.ISSUYM = T1.ISSUYM AND A2.PAYYM = T1.PAYYM AND A2.CHKTYP = 'C' AND A2.CHKCODE IN ('42','72') ) AND T1.APNO NOT IN (SELECT A3.APNO FROM BASTUDNOTIFY A3 WHERE A3.APNO = T1.APNO AND A3.SEQNO = T1.SEQNO AND A3.PRINTTIME LIKE SUBSTR(T1.ISSUYM,1,4) || '%' AND A3.NOTIFYTYPE = '2') AND T1.APNO IN (SELECT A4.APNO FROM BASTUDTERM A4 WHERE A4.APNO = T1.APNO AND A4.SEQNO = T1.SEQNO AND (SELECT MAX(STUDEDATE) FROM BASTUDTERM WHERE APNO = T1.APNO AND SEQNO = T1.SEQNO) = To_Char(SYSDATE,'YYYY') || #studeDate:VARCHAR#) Order By PAYTYPE, PRPNO, APNO

SELECT SUBSTR(T2.APNO,1,1) As "PAYTYPE", T2.APNO As "APNO", T3.SEQNO As "SEQNO", T2.ISSUYM As "ISSUYM", T2.PAYYM As "PAYYM", T2.EVTNAME AS "EVTNAME", T3.FAMNAME AS "BENNAME", T2.ARCDATE AS "ARCDATE", T2.ARCPG AS "ARCPG", T2.PROCSTAT AS "PROCSTAT", (SELECT B1.PRPNO FROM BCCMF09 B1 WHERE NVL(TRIM(TAL20),' ') <> '0099' AND B1.INSKD = '1' AND (B1.PAYTYP||B1.GROUPMK) LIKE (SUBSTR(T2.APNO,1,2)||'%') AND ((SUBSTR(T2.APNO, 12, 1) IN (TAL11, TAL12, TAL13, TAL14, TAL15)) OR (SUBSTR(B1.TAL20, 1, 2) <= SUBSTR(T2.APNO, 11, 2) AND SUBSTR(TAL20, 3, 2) >= SUBSTR(T2.APNO, 11, 2)) OR (SUBSTR(T2.APNO, 11, 2) IN (B1.TAL21, B1.TAL22, B1.TAL23, B1.TAL24, B1.TAL25))) AND (TRIM(B1.STATUS) IS NULL OR B1.STATUS <> 'D') ) As "PRPNO", T2.COMMZIP AS "COMMZIP", T2.COMMADDR AS "COMMADDR", (SELECT MAX(STUDEDATE) FROM BASTUDTERM WHERE APNO = T2.APNO AND SEQNO = T2.SEQNO) AS "STUDEDATE" FROM BAAPPBASE T2, (Select C1.* From BAFAMILY C1 Where C1.APNO In (Select C2.APNO From BAAPPBASE C2 WHERE C2.APNO LIKE 'K%' AND C2.SEQNO = '0000' AND C2.CASETYP = '2' AND C2.PAYKIND IN ('35','38') AND C2.CASEMK IS NULL AND C2.MANCHKMK = 'Y' ) And C1.SEQNO in (Select A.SEQNO From BAFAMQUAL A, BAFAMILY E Where A.APNO = C1.APNO And A.ISSUYM = (Select Max(B.ISSUYM) From BAFAMQUAL B Where B.APNO = C1.APNO ) And A.PAYYM = (Select Max(C.PAYYM) From BAFAMQUAL C Where C.APNO = C1.APNO And C.ISSUYM = A.ISSUYM ) And A.VERISEQ = (Select Max(To_Number(D.VERISEQ)) From BAFAMQUAL D Where D.APNO = C1.APNO And D.ISSUYM = A.ISSUYM And D.PAYYM = A.PAYYM ) And A.QUALMK = 'Y' AND A.QUALLIST NOT LIKE '%42%' AND A.APNO = E.APNO AND A.SEQNO = E.SEQNO AND A.ISSUYM >= (SELECT substr(to_char(add_months(to_date(fambrdate,'yyyymmdd'),12*20),'yyyymmdd'),1,6) FROM BAFAMILY WHERE APNO = C1.APNO AND SEQNO = A.SEQNO)) AND C1.FAMEVTREL = '4' And C1.CLOSEDATE Is NuLL ) T3 WHERE T2.APNO LIKE 'K%' AND T2.SEQNO = '0000' AND T2.CASETYP = '2' AND T2.PAYKIND IN ('35','38') AND T2.PROCSTAT IN ('50') AND T2.CASEMK IS NULL AND T2.MANCHKMK = 'Y' AND T2.APNO IN (SELECT B2.APNO FROM BAFAMILY B2 WHERE B2.APNO = T2.APNO AND B2.FAMEVTREL = '4' AND SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(B2.FAMBRDATE,'YYYYMMDD'),20*12),'YYYYMMDD'),1,6) = T2.ISSUYM AND B2.APNO IN (SELECT B3.APNO FROM BACHKFILE B3 WHERE B3.APNO = B2.APNO AND B3.SEQNO = B2.SEQNO AND B3.ISSUYM = T2.ISSUYM AND B3.PAYYM = T2.PAYYM AND B3.CHKTYP = 'C' AND B3.CHKCODE IN ('41','71')) AND B2.SEQNO IN (SELECT B4.SEQNO FROM BAFAMQUAL B4 WHERE B4.APNO = B2.APNO AND B4.SEQNO = B2.SEQNO AND B4.ISSUYM = T2.ISSUYM AND B4.PAYYM = T2.PAYYM AND B4.QUALMK = 'Y' AND B4.VERISEQ = (SELECT MAX(TO_NUMBER(B5.VERISEQ)) FROM BAFAMQUAL B5 WHERE B5.APNO = B4.APNO AND B5.SEQNO = B4.SEQNO AND B5.ISSUYM = B4.ISSUYM AND B5.PAYYM = B4.PAYYM ))) AND T2.APNO = T3.APNO Order By PAYTYPE, PRPNO, APNO

SELECT SUBSTR(T1.APNO,1,1) As "PAYTYPE", T1.APNO As "APNO", T1.SEQNO As "SEQNO", T1.ISSUYM As "ISSUYM", T1.PAYYM As "PAYYM", T1.EVTNAME AS "EVTNAME", T1.BENNAME AS "BENNAME", T1.ARCDATE AS "ARCDATE", T1.ARCPG AS "ARCPG", T1.PROCSTAT AS "PROCSTAT", (SELECT A1.PRPNO FROM BCCMF09 A1 WHERE NVL(TRIM(TAL20),' ') <> '0099' AND A1.INSKD = '1' AND (A1.PAYTYP||A1.GROUPMK) LIKE (SUBSTR(T1.APNO,1,2)||'%') AND ((SUBSTR(T1.APNO, 12, 1) IN (TAL11, TAL12, TAL13, TAL14, TAL15)) OR (SUBSTR(A1.TAL20, 1, 2) <= SUBSTR(T1.APNO, 11, 2) AND SUBSTR(TAL20, 3, 2) >= SUBSTR(T1.APNO, 11, 2)) OR (SUBSTR(T1.APNO, 11, 2) IN (A1.TAL21, A1.TAL22, A1.TAL23, A1.TAL24, A1.TAL25))) AND (TRIM(A1.STATUS) IS NULL OR A1.STATUS <> 'D') ) As "PRPNO", T1.COMMZIP AS "COMMZIP", T1.COMMADDR AS "COMMADDR", (SELECT MAX(STUDEDATE) FROM BASTUDTERM WHERE APNO = T1.APNO AND SEQNO = T1.SEQNO) AS "STUDEDATE" FROM BAAPPBASE T1 WHERE T1.APNO LIKE 'S%' AND T1.SEQNO <> '0000' AND T1.CASETYP = '2' AND T1.PAYKIND IN ('55','56','59') AND T1.PROCSTAT IN ('50') AND T1.CASEMK IS NULL AND T1.BENEVTREL IN ('4','7') AND T1.CLOSEDATE IS NULL AND T1.MANCHKMK = 'Y' AND T1.ISSUYM = SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(T1.BENBRDATE,'YYYYMMDD'),20*12),'YYYYMMDD'),1,6) AND T1.APNO IN (SELECT A2.APNO FROM BACHKFILE A2 WHERE A2.APNO = T1.APNO AND A2.SEQNO = T1.SEQNO AND A2.ISSUYM = T1.ISSUYM AND A2.PAYYM = T1.PAYYM AND A2.CHKTYP = 'C' AND A2.CHKCODE IN ('41','71') ) Order By PAYTYPE, PRPNO, APNO

SELECT SUBSTR(T2.APNO,1,1) As "PAYTYPE", T2.APNO As "APNO", T3.SEQNO As "SEQNO", T2.ISSUYM As "ISSUYM", T2.PAYYM As "PAYYM", T2.EVTNAME AS "EVTNAME", T3.FAMNAME AS "BENNAME", T2.ARCDATE AS "ARCDATE", T2.ARCPG AS "ARCPG", T2.PROCSTAT AS "PROCSTAT",
(SELECT B1.PRPNO FROM BCCMF09 B1 WHERE NVL(TRIM(TAL20),' ') <> '0099' AND B1.INSKD = '1' AND (B1.PAYTYP||B1.GROUPMK) LIKE (SUBSTR(T2.APNO,1,2)||'%') AND ((SUBSTR(T2.APNO, 12, 1) IN (TAL11, TAL12, TAL13, TAL14, TAL15)) OR (SUBSTR(B1.TAL20, 1, 2) <= SUBSTR(T2.APNO, 11, 2) AND SUBSTR(TAL20, 3, 2) >= SUBSTR(T2.APNO, 11, 2)) OR (SUBSTR(T2.APNO, 11, 2) IN (B1.TAL21, B1.TAL22, B1.TAL23, B1.TAL24, B1.TAL25))) AND (TRIM(B1.STATUS) IS NULL OR B1.STATUS <> 'D')) As "PRPNO",
T2.COMMZIP AS "COMMZIP", T2.COMMADDR AS "COMMADDR", (SELECT MAX(STUDEDATE) FROM BASTUDTERM WHERE APNO = T2.APNO AND SEQNO = T2.SEQNO) AS "STUDEDATE" FROM BAAPPBASE T2, (Select C1.* From BAFAMILY C1 Where C1.APNO In (Select C2.APNO From BAAPPBASE C2 WHERE C2.APNO LIKE 'K%' AND C2.SEQNO = '0000' AND C2.CASETYP = '2' AND C2.PAYKIND IN ('35','38') AND C2.CASEMK IS NULL AND C2.MANCHKMK = 'Y') AND (C1.APNO, C1.SEQNO) IN (SELECT B3.APNO, B3.SEQNO FROM BACHKFILE B3 WHERE B3.APNO = C1.APNO AND (B3.ISSUYM,B3.PAYYM) IN (SELECT ISSUYM, PAYYM FROM BAAPPBASE WHERE APNO = C1.APNO) AND B3.CHKTYP = 'C' AND B3.CHKCODE IN ('42','72')) And C1.SEQNO in (Select A.SEQNO From BAFAMQUAL A, BAFAMILY E Where A.APNO = C1.APNO AND A.ISSUYM = (Select Max(B.ISSUYM) From BAFAMQUAL B Where B.APNO = C1.APNO ) AND A.PAYYM = (Select Max(C.PAYYM) From BAFAMQUAL C Where C.APNO = C1.APNO AND C.ISSUYM = A.ISSUYM ) AND A.VERISEQ = (Select Max(To_Number(D.VERISEQ)) From BAFAMQUAL D Where D.APNO = C1.APNO AND D.ISSUYM = A.ISSUYM AND D.PAYYM = A.PAYYM ) AND A.QUALMK = 'Y' AND A.APNO = E.APNO AND A.SEQNO = E.SEQNO
AND A.ISSUYM >= (SELECT substr(to_char(add_months(to_date(fambrdate,'yyyymmdd'),12*20),'yyyymmdd'),1,6)
FROM BAFAMILY WHERE APNO = C1.APNO AND SEQNO = A.SEQNO)) AND C1.FAMEVTREL = '4' And C1.CLOSEDATE Is NuLL ) T3, BAFAMILY T4 WHERE T2.APNO LIKE 'K%' AND T2.SEQNO = '0000' AND T2.CASETYP = '2' AND T2.PAYKIND IN ('35','38') AND T2.PROCSTAT IN ('50') AND T2.CASEMK IS NULL AND T2.MANCHKMK = 'Y' AND T2.APNO IN (SELECT B2.APNO FROM BAFAMILY B2 WHERE B2.APNO = T2.APNO AND B2.FAMEVTREL = '4'
AND To_Char(SYSDATE,'YYYY')|| #studeChkMonth:VARCHAR# <= SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(B2.FAMBRDATE,'YYYYMMDD'),25*12),'YYYYMMDD'),1,6)
AND B2.APNO IN (SELECT B3.APNO FROM BACHKFILE B3 WHERE B3.APNO = B2.APNO AND B3.SEQNO = B2.SEQNO AND B3.ISSUYM = T2.ISSUYM AND B3.PAYYM = T2.PAYYM AND B3.CHKTYP = 'C' AND B3.CHKCODE IN ('42','72')) AND B2.SEQNO IN (SELECT B4.SEQNO FROM BAFAMQUAL B4 WHERE B4.APNO = B2.APNO AND B4.SEQNO = B2.SEQNO AND B4.ISSUYM = T2.ISSUYM AND B4.PAYYM = T2.PAYYM AND B4.QUALMK = 'Y' AND B4.VERISEQ = (SELECT MAX(TO_NUMBER(B5.VERISEQ)) FROM BAFAMQUAL B5 WHERE B5.APNO = B4.APNO AND B5.SEQNO = B4.SEQNO AND B5.ISSUYM = B4.ISSUYM AND B5.PAYYM = B4.PAYYM )) AND B2.APNO NOT IN (SELECT B6.APNO FROM BASTUDNOTIFY B6 WHERE B6.APNO = B2.APNO AND B6.SEQNO = B2.SEQNO AND B6.PRINTTIME LIKE SUBSTR(T2.ISSUYM,1,4) || '%' AND B6.NOTIFYTYPE = '4'
AND B6.STUDEDATE = '06'
AND B6.STUDEDATE = '08'
AND (B6.STUDEDATE = '08' OR B6.STUDEDATE = '09')
) AND B2.APNO IN (SELECT A4.APNO FROM BASTUDTERM A4 WHERE A4.APNO = B2.APNO AND A4.SEQNO = B2.SEQNO AND (SELECT MAX(STUDEDATE) FROM BASTUDTERM WHERE APNO = B2.APNO AND SEQNO = B2.SEQNO) = To_Char(SYSDATE,'YYYY') || #studeDate:VARCHAR#)) AND T2.APNO = T3.APNO AND T2.APNO = T4.APNO AND T3.SEQNO = T4.SEQNO AND T2.BAAPPBASEID = T4.BAAPPBASEID AND (T4.SCHOOLCODE IS NULL OR TRIM(T4.SCHOOLCODE) = '') Order By PAYTYPE, PRPNO, APNO

SELECT SUBSTR(T1.APNO,1,1) As "PAYTYPE", T1.APNO As "APNO", T1.SEQNO As "SEQNO", T1.ISSUYM As "ISSUYM", T1.PAYYM As "PAYYM", T1.EVTNAME AS "EVTNAME", T1.BENNAME AS "BENNAME", T1.ARCDATE AS "ARCDATE", T1.ARCPG AS "ARCPG", T1.PROCSTAT AS "PROCSTAT",
(SELECT A1.PRPNO FROM BCCMF09 A1 WHERE NVL(TRIM(TAL20),' ') <> '0099' AND A1.INSKD = '1' AND (A1.PAYTYP||A1.GROUPMK) LIKE (SUBSTR(T1.APNO,1,2)||'%') AND ((SUBSTR(T1.APNO, 12, 1) IN (TAL11, TAL12, TAL13, TAL14, TAL15)) OR (SUBSTR(A1.TAL20, 1, 2) <= SUBSTR(T1.APNO, 11, 2) AND SUBSTR(TAL20, 3, 2) >= SUBSTR(T1.APNO, 11, 2)) OR (SUBSTR(T1.APNO, 11, 2) IN (A1.TAL21, A1.TAL22, A1.TAL23, A1.TAL24, A1.TAL25))) AND (TRIM(A1.STATUS) IS NULL OR A1.STATUS <> 'D')) As "PRPNO",
T1.COMMZIP AS "COMMZIP", T1.COMMADDR AS "COMMADDR", (SELECT MAX(STUDEDATE) FROM BASTUDTERM WHERE APNO = T1.APNO AND SEQNO = T1.SEQNO) AS "STUDEDATE" FROM BAAPPBASE T1, BAAPPEXPAND T2 WHERE T1.APNO LIKE 'S%'
AND T1.SEQNO <> '0000'
AND T1.CASETYP = '2' AND T1.PAYKIND IN ('55','56','59') AND T1.PROCSTAT IN ('50') AND T1.CASEMK IS NULL AND T1.BENEVTREL IN ('4','7') AND T1.CLOSEDATE IS NULL AND T1.MANCHKMK = 'Y'
AND To_Char(SYSDATE,'YYYY')|| #studeChkMonth:VARCHAR# <= SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(T1.BENBRDATE,'YYYYMMDD'),25*12),'YYYYMMDD'),1,6)
AND T1.APNO = T2.APNO AND T1.SEQNO = T2.SEQNO AND T1.BAAPPBASEID = T2.BAAPPBASEID AND (T2.SCHOOLCODE IS NULL OR TRIM(T2.SCHOOLCODE) = '') AND T1.APNO IN (SELECT A2.APNO FROM BACHKFILE A2 WHERE A2.APNO = T1.APNO AND A2.SEQNO = T1.SEQNO AND A2.ISSUYM = T1.ISSUYM AND A2.PAYYM = T1.PAYYM AND A2.CHKTYP = 'C' AND A2.CHKCODE IN ('42','72')) AND T1.APNO NOT IN (SELECT A3.APNO FROM BASTUDNOTIFY A3 WHERE A3.APNO = T1.APNO AND A3.SEQNO = T1.SEQNO AND A3.PRINTTIME LIKE SUBSTR(T1.ISSUYM,1,4) || '%' AND A3.NOTIFYTYPE = '4'
AND A3.STUDEDATE = '06'
AND A3.STUDEDATE = '08'
AND (A3.STUDEDATE = '08' OR A3.STUDEDATE = '09')
) AND T1.APNO IN (SELECT A4.APNO FROM BASTUDTERM A4 WHERE A4.APNO = T1.APNO AND A4.SEQNO = T1.SEQNO AND (SELECT MAX(STUDEDATE) FROM BASTUDTERM WHERE APNO = T1.APNO AND SEQNO = T1.SEQNO) = To_Char(SYSDATE,'YYYY') || #studeDate:VARCHAR#) Order By PAYTYPE, PRPNO, APNO
