SELECT SUBSTR(T2.APNO,1,1) As "PAYTYPE", T2.APNO As "APNO", T3.SEQNO As "SEQNO", T2.ISSUYM As "ISSUYM", T2.PAYYM As "PAYYM", T2.EVTNAME AS "EVTNAME", T3.FAMNAME AS "BENNAME", T2.ARCDATE AS "ARCDATE", T2.ARCPG AS "ARCPG", T2.PROCSTAT AS "PROCSTAT", (SELECT B1.PRPNO FROM BCCMF09 B1 WHERE NVL(TRIM(TAL20),' ') <> '0099' AND B1.INSKD = '1' AND (B1.PAYTYP||B1.GROUPMK) LIKE (SUBSTR(T2.APNO,1,2)||'%') AND ((SUBSTR(T2.APNO, 12, 1) IN (TAL11, TAL12, TAL13, TAL14, TAL15)) OR (SUBSTR(B1.TAL20, 1, 2) <= SUBSTR(T2.APNO, 11, 2) AND SUBSTR(TAL20, 3, 2) >= SUBSTR(T2.APNO, 11, 2)) OR (SUBSTR(T2.APNO, 11, 2) IN (B1.TAL21, B1.TAL22, B1.TAL23, B1.TAL24, B1.TAL25))) AND (TRIM(B1.STATUS) IS NULL OR B1.STATUS <> 'D')) As "PRPNO", T2.COMMZIP AS "COMMZIP", T2.COMMADDR AS "COMMADDR", (SELECT MAX(STUDEDATE) FROM BASTUDTERM WHERE APNO = T2.APNO AND SEQNO = T2.SEQNO) AS "STUDEDATE" FROM BAAPPBASE T2, (Select C1.* From BAFAMILY C1 Where C1.APNO In (Select C2.APNO From BAAPPBASE C2 WHERE C2.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND C2.SEQNO = '0000' AND C2.CASETYP = '2' AND C2.PAYKIND IN ('35','38') AND C2.CASEMK IS NULL AND C2.MANCHKMK = 'Y') AND (C1.APNO, C1.SEQNO) IN (SELECT B3.APNO, B3.SEQNO FROM BACHKFILE B3 WHERE B3.APNO = C1.APNO AND (B3.ISSUYM,B3.PAYYM) IN (SELECT ISSUYM, PAYYM FROM BAAPPBASE WHERE APNO = C1.APNO) AND B3.CHKTYP = 'C' AND B3.CHKCODE IN ('42','72')) And C1.SEQNO in (Select A.SEQNO From BAFAMQUAL A, BAFAMILY E Where A.APNO = C1.APNO AND A.ISSUYM = (Select Max(B.ISSUYM) From BAFAMQUAL B Where B.APNO = C1.APNO ) AND A.PAYYM = (Select Max(C.PAYYM) From BAFAMQUAL C Where C.APNO = C1.APNO AND C.ISSUYM = A.ISSUYM ) AND A.VERISEQ = (Select Max(To_Number(D.VERISEQ)) From BAFAMQUAL D Where D.APNO = C1.APNO AND D.ISSUYM = A.ISSUYM AND D.PAYYM = A.PAYYM ) AND A.QUALMK = 'Y' AND A.APNO = E.APNO AND A.SEQNO = E.SEQNO AND A.ISSUYM >= (SELECT substr(to_char(add_months(to_date(fambrdate,'yyyymmdd'),12*20),'yyyymmdd'),1,6) FROM BAFAMILY WHERE APNO = C1.APNO AND SEQNO = A.SEQNO)) AND C1.FAMEVTREL = '4' And C1.CLOSEDATE Is NuLL ) T3, BAFAMILY T4 WHERE T2.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND T2.SEQNO = '0000' AND T2.CASETYP = '2' AND T2.PAYKIND IN ('35','38') AND T2.PROCSTAT IN ('50') AND T2.CASEMK IS NULL AND T2.MANCHKMK = 'Y' AND T2.APNO IN (SELECT B2.APNO FROM BAFAMILY B2 WHERE B2.APNO = T2.APNO AND B2.FAMEVTREL = '4' AND To_Char(SYSDATE,'YYYY')|| #studeChkMonth:VARCHAR# <= SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(B2.FAMBRDATE,'YYYYMMDD'),25*12)-1,'YYYYMMDD'),1,6) AND B2.APNO IN (SELECT B3.APNO FROM BACHKFILE B3 WHERE B3.APNO = B2.APNO AND B3.SEQNO = B2.SEQNO AND B3.ISSUYM = T2.ISSUYM AND B3.PAYYM = T2.PAYYM AND B3.CHKTYP = 'C' AND B3.CHKCODE IN ('42','72')) AND B2.SEQNO IN (SELECT B4.SEQNO FROM BAFAMQUAL B4 WHERE B4.APNO = B2.APNO AND B4.SEQNO = B2.SEQNO AND B4.ISSUYM = T2.ISSUYM AND B4.PAYYM = T2.PAYYM AND B4.QUALMK = 'Y' AND B4.VERISEQ = (SELECT MAX(TO_NUMBER(B5.VERISEQ)) FROM BAFAMQUAL B5 WHERE B5.APNO = B4.APNO AND B5.SEQNO = B4.SEQNO AND B5.ISSUYM = B4.ISSUYM AND B5.PAYYM = B4.PAYYM )) AND B2.APNO NOT IN (SELECT B6.APNO FROM BASTUDNOTIFY B6 WHERE B6.APNO = B2.APNO AND B6.SEQNO = B2.SEQNO AND B6.PRINTTIME LIKE SUBSTR(T2.ISSUYM,1,4) || '%' AND B6.NOTIFYTYPE = '4') AND B2.APNO IN (SELECT A4.APNO FROM BASTUDTERM A4 WHERE A4.APNO = B2.APNO AND A4.SEQNO = B2.SEQNO AND (SELECT MAX(STUDEDATE) FROM BASTUDTERM WHERE APNO = B2.APNO AND SEQNO = B2.SEQNO) = To_Char(SYSDATE,'YYYY') || #studeDate:VARCHAR#)) AND T2.APNO = T3.APNO AND T2.APNO = T4.APNO AND T3.SEQNO = T4.SEQNO AND T2.BAAPPBASEID = T4.BAAPPBASEID AND (T4.SCHOOLCODE IS NULL OR TRIM(T4.SCHOOLCODE) = '') Order By PAYTYPE, PRPNO, APNO

SELECT SUBSTR(T1.APNO,1,1) As "PAYTYPE", T1.APNO As "APNO", T1.SEQNO As "SEQNO", T1.ISSUYM As "ISSUYM", T1.PAYYM As "PAYYM", T1.EVTNAME AS "EVTNAME", T1.BENNAME AS "BENNAME", T1.ARCDATE AS "ARCDATE", T1.ARCPG AS "ARCPG", T1.PROCSTAT AS "PROCSTAT", (SELECT A1.PRPNO FROM BCCMF09 A1 WHERE NVL(TRIM(TAL20),' ') <> '0099' AND A1.INSKD = '1' AND (A1.PAYTYP||A1.GROUPMK) LIKE (SUBSTR(T1.APNO,1,2)||'%') AND ((SUBSTR(T1.APNO, 12, 1) IN (TAL11, TAL12, TAL13, TAL14, TAL15)) OR (SUBSTR(A1.TAL20, 1, 2) <= SUBSTR(T1.APNO, 11, 2) AND SUBSTR(TAL20, 3, 2) >= SUBSTR(T1.APNO, 11, 2)) OR (SUBSTR(T1.APNO, 11, 2) IN (A1.TAL21, A1.TAL22, A1.TAL23, A1.TAL24, A1.TAL25))) AND (TRIM(A1.STATUS) IS NULL OR A1.STATUS <> 'D')) As "PRPNO", T1.COMMZIP AS "COMMZIP", T1.COMMADDR AS "COMMADDR", (SELECT MAX(STUDEDATE) FROM BASTUDTERM WHERE APNO = T1.APNO AND SEQNO = T1.SEQNO) AS "STUDEDATE" FROM BAAPPBASE T1, BAAPPEXPAND T2 WHERE T1.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND T1.SEQNO <> '0000' AND T1.CASETYP = '2' AND T1.PAYKIND IN ('55','56','59') AND T1.PROCSTAT IN ('50') AND T1.CASEMK IS NULL AND T1.BENEVTREL IN ('4','7') AND T1.CLOSEDATE IS NULL AND T1.MANCHKMK = 'Y' AND To_Char(SYSDATE,'YYYY')|| #studeChkMonth:VARCHAR# <= SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(T1.BENBRDATE,'YYYYMMDD'),25*12),'YYYYMMDD'),1,6) AND T1.APNO = T2.APNO AND T1.SEQNO = T2.SEQNO AND T1.BAAPPBASEID = T2.BAAPPBASEID AND (T2.SCHOOLCODE IS NULL OR TRIM(T2.SCHOOLCODE) = '') AND T1.APNO IN (SELECT A2.APNO FROM BACHKFILE A2 WHERE A2.APNO = T1.APNO AND A2.SEQNO = T1.SEQNO AND A2.ISSUYM = T1.ISSUYM AND A2.PAYYM = T1.PAYYM AND A2.CHKTYP = 'C' AND A2.CHKCODE IN ('42','72')) AND T1.APNO NOT IN (SELECT A3.APNO FROM BASTUDNOTIFY A3 WHERE A3.APNO = T1.APNO AND A3.SEQNO = T1.SEQNO AND A3.PRINTTIME LIKE SUBSTR(T1.ISSUYM,1,4) || '%' AND A3.NOTIFYTYPE = '4') AND T1.APNO IN (SELECT A4.APNO FROM BASTUDTERM A4 WHERE A4.APNO = T1.APNO AND A4.SEQNO = T1.SEQNO AND (SELECT MAX(STUDEDATE) FROM BASTUDTERM WHERE APNO = T1.APNO AND SEQNO = T1.SEQNO) = To_Char(SYSDATE,'YYYY') || #studeDate:VARCHAR#) Order By PAYTYPE, PRPNO, APNO

Select NOTIFYFORM, APNO, EVTNAME, GRDNAME, GRDIDNNO, COMMZIP, COMMADDR, REHCYM, CRIINJDP, COMRECHKYM, PAYTYPE, BENNAME, BENSEX, ISSUYM, SEQNO, EVTIDNNO, EVTBRDATE, PRPNO from ( Select DECODE(t.GRDNAME,NULL,'C01','C02') As "NOTIFYFORM", t.APNO, t.EVTNAME, t.GRDNAME, t.GRDIDNNO, t.COMMZIP, t.COMMADDR, (Select A.REHCYM From BAAPPEXPAND A Where A.APNO = t.APNO And A.SEQNO = '0000') As "REHCYM", (Select NVL2(B.CRIINJDP1,B.CRIINJDP1||',','')|| NVL2(B.CRIINJDP2,B.CRIINJDP2||',','')|| NVL2(B.CRIINJDP3,B.CRIINJDP3||',','')|| NVL2(B.CRIINJDP4,B.CRIINJDP4||',','')|| NVL2(B.CRIINJDP5,B.CRIINJDP5||',','')|| NVL2(B.CRIINJDP6,B.CRIINJDP6||',','')|| NVL2(B.CRIINJDP7,B.CRIINJDP7||',','')|| NVL2(B.CRIINJDP8,B.CRIINJDP8||',','')|| NVL2(B.CRIINJDP9,B.CRIINJDP9||',','')|| B.CRIINJDP10 From BAAPPEXPAND B Where B.APNO = t.APNO AND B.SEQNO = '0000') As "CRIINJDP", '' As "COMRECHKYM", SUBSTR(t.APNO,1,1) As "PAYTYPE", t.BENNAME As "BENNAME", t.EVTSEX As "BENSEX", t.ISSUYM As "ISSUYM", t.SEQNO As "SEQNO", t.EVTIDNNO As "EVTIDNNO", t.EVTBRDATE,
(SELECT PRPNO FROM (SELECT B1.PRPNO, B1.SEQNO FROM BCCMF09 B1 WHERE NVL(TRIM(TAL20),' ') <> '0099' AND B1.INSKD = '1' AND (B1.PAYTYP||B1.GROUPMK) LIKE (SUBSTR(t.APNO,1,2)||'%') AND ((SUBSTR(t.APNO, 12, 1) IN (TAL11, TAL12, TAL13, TAL14, TAL15)) OR (SUBSTR(B1.TAL20, 1, 2) <= SUBSTR(t.APNO, 11, 2) AND SUBSTR(TAL20, 3, 2) >= SUBSTR(t.APNO, 11, 2)) OR (SUBSTR(t.APNO, 11, 2) IN (B1.TAL21, B1.TAL22, B1.TAL23, B1.TAL24, B1.TAL25))) AND (TRIM(B1.STATUS) IS NULL OR B1.STATUS <> 'D') ORDER BY B1.SEQNO) WHERE ROWNUM <= 1) As "PRPNO"
From BAAPPBASE t Where t.APNO like 'K%' And t.SEQNO = '0000' And t.Paykind in ('35','38') And t.APNO IN (Select t1.APNO From BADAPR t1 Where t1.APNO like 'K%' And t1.SEQNO = '0000' And t1.MCHKTYP = '2' And t1.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# And t1.MTESTMK = 'F' And t1.APLPAYMK = '3' And t1.APLPAYDATE is not null) And t.APNO = (Select t2.APNO From BARECHECK t2 Where t2.APNO = t.APNO Group by t2.APNO Having Count(t2.APNO) = 1) And t.APNO = (Select t3.APNO From BARECHECK t3 Where t3.APNO = t.APNO And SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(t3.RECHKYM || '01','YYYYMMDD'), -3),'YYYYMMDD'),1,6) = #issuYm:VARCHAR#) UNION Select DECODE(t.GRDNAME,NULL,'C03','C04') As "NOTIFYFORM", t.APNO, t.EVTNAME, t.GRDNAME, t.GRDIDNNO, t.COMMZIP, t.COMMADDR, (Select A.REHCYM From BAAPPEXPAND A Where A.APNO = t.APNO And A.SEQNO = '0000') As "REHCYM", (Select NVL2(B.CRIINJDP1,B.CRIINJDP1||',','')|| NVL2(B.CRIINJDP2,B.CRIINJDP2||',','')|| NVL2(B.CRIINJDP3,B.CRIINJDP3||',','')|| NVL2(B.CRIINJDP4,B.CRIINJDP4||',','')|| NVL2(B.CRIINJDP5,B.CRIINJDP5||',','')|| NVL2(B.CRIINJDP6,B.CRIINJDP6||',','')|| NVL2(B.CRIINJDP7,B.CRIINJDP7||',','')|| NVL2(B.CRIINJDP8,B.CRIINJDP8||',','')|| NVL2(B.CRIINJDP9,B.CRIINJDP9||',','')|| B.CRIINJDP10 From BAAPPEXPAND B Where B.APNO = t.APNO And B.SEQNO = '0000') As "CRIINJDP", '' As "COMRECHKYM", SUBSTR(t.APNO,1,1) As "PAYTYPE", t.BENNAME As "BENNAME", t.EVTSEX As "BENSEX", t.ISSUYM As "ISSUYM", t.SEQNO As "SEQNO", t.EVTIDNNO As "EVTIDNNO", t.EVTBRDATE,
(SELECT PRPNO FROM (SELECT B1.PRPNO, B1.SEQNO FROM BCCMF09 B1 WHERE NVL(TRIM(TAL20),' ') <> '0099' AND B1.INSKD = '1' AND (B1.PAYTYP||B1.GROUPMK) LIKE (SUBSTR(t.APNO,1,2)||'%') AND ((SUBSTR(t.APNO, 12, 1) IN (TAL11, TAL12, TAL13, TAL14, TAL15)) OR (SUBSTR(B1.TAL20, 1, 2) <= SUBSTR(t.APNO, 11, 2) AND SUBSTR(TAL20, 3, 2) >= SUBSTR(t.APNO, 11, 2)) OR (SUBSTR(t.APNO, 11, 2) IN (B1.TAL21, B1.TAL22, B1.TAL23, B1.TAL24, B1.TAL25))) AND (TRIM(B1.STATUS) IS NULL OR B1.STATUS <> 'D') ORDER BY B1.SEQNO) WHERE ROWNUM <= 1) As "PRPNO"
From BAAPPBASE t Where t.APNO like 'K%' And t.SEQNO = '0000' And t.Paykind in ('35','38') And t.APNO IN (Select t1.APNO From BADAPR t1 Where t1.APNO like 'K%' And t1.SEQNO = '0000' And t1.MCHKTYP = '2' And t1.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# And t1.MTESTMK = 'F' And t1.APLPAYMK = '3' And t1.APLPAYDATE is not null)
And t.APNO = (Select t2.APNO From BARECHECK t2 Where t2.APNO = t.APNO Group by t2.APNO Having Count(t2.APNO) > 1)
And t.APNO = (Select t3.APNO From BARECHECK t3 Where t3.APNO = t.APNO AND t3.RECHKYM = (SELECT MAX(T31.RECHKYM) FROM BARECHECK t31 WHERE t31.APNO = t3.APNO) And SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(t3.RECHKYM || '01','YYYYMMDD'), -3),'YYYYMMDD'),1,6) = #issuYm:VARCHAR#) And t.APNO = (Select t4.APNO From BARECHECK t4 Where t4.APNO = t.APNO AND t4.RECHKYM = (SELECT MIN(T41.RECHKYM) FROM BARECHECK t41 WHERE t41.APNO = t4.APNO) And t4.RECHKSTATUS = '2') ) Order By PAYTYPE, PRPNO, APNO

Select DECODE(t.GRDNAME,NULL,'C05','C06') As "NOTIFYFORM", t.APNO, t.EVTNAME, t.GRDNAME, t.GRDIDNNO, t.COMMZIP, t.COMMADDR, (Select A.COMRECHKYM From BARECHECK A Where A.APNO = t.APNO And A.COMRECHKYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# And A.RECHKSTATUS = '2') As "COMRECHKYM", '' As "REHCYM", '' As "CRIINJDP", SUBSTR(t.APNO,1,1) As "PAYTYPE", t.BENNAME As "BENNAME", t.EVTSEX As "BENSEX", t.ISSUYM As "ISSUYM", t.SEQNO As "SEQNO", t.EVTIDNNO As "EVTIDNNO", t.EVTBRDATE,
(SELECT B1.PRPNO FROM BCCMF09 B1 WHERE NVL(TRIM(TAL20),' ') <> '0099' AND B1.INSKD = '1' AND (B1.PAYTYP||B1.GROUPMK) LIKE (SUBSTR(t.APNO,1,2)||'%') AND ((SUBSTR(t.APNO, 12, 1) IN (TAL11, TAL12, TAL13, TAL14, TAL15)) OR (SUBSTR(B1.TAL20, 1, 2) <= SUBSTR(t.APNO, 11, 2) AND SUBSTR(TAL20, 3, 2) >= SUBSTR(t.APNO, 11, 2)) OR (SUBSTR(t.APNO, 11, 2) IN (B1.TAL21, B1.TAL22, B1.TAL23, B1.TAL24, B1.TAL25))) AND (TRIM(B1.STATUS) IS NULL OR B1.STATUS <> 'D')) As "PRPNO"
From BAAPPBASE t Where t.APNO like 'K%' And t.SEQNO = '0000' And t.Paykind in ('35','38') And t.APNO IN (Select t1.APNO From BADAPR t1 Where t1.APNO like 'K%' And t1.SEQNO = '0000' And t1.MCHKTYP = '2' And t1.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# And t1.MTESTMK = 'F' And t1.APLPAYMK = '3' And t1.APLPAYDATE is not null) And t.APNO = (Select t2.APNO From BARECHECK t2 Where t2.APNO = t.APNO AND t2.COMRECHKYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# And t2.RECHKSTATUS = '2' And (t2.RECHKRESULT = 'F1' Or t2.RECHKRESULT = 'F2')) Order By PAYTYPE, PRPNO, APNO

Select NOTIFYFORM, APNO, EVTNAME, GRDNAME, GRDIDNNO, COMMZIP, COMMADDR, REHCYM, CRIINJDP, COMRECHKYM, PAYTYPE, BENNAME, BENSEX, ISSUYM, SEQNO, EVTIDNNO, EVTBRDATE, PRPNO from ( Select DECODE(t.GRDNAME,NULL,'C01','C02') As "NOTIFYFORM", t.APNO, t.EVTNAME, t.GRDNAME, t.GRDIDNNO, t.COMMZIP, t.COMMADDR, (Select A.REHCYM From BAAPPEXPAND A Where A.APNO = t.APNO And A.SEQNO = '0000') As "REHCYM", (Select NVL2(B.CRIINJDP1,B.CRIINJDP1||',','')|| NVL2(B.CRIINJDP2,B.CRIINJDP2||',','')|| NVL2(B.CRIINJDP3,B.CRIINJDP3||',','')|| NVL2(B.CRIINJDP4,B.CRIINJDP4||',','')|| NVL2(B.CRIINJDP5,B.CRIINJDP5||',','')|| NVL2(B.CRIINJDP6,B.CRIINJDP6||',','')|| NVL2(B.CRIINJDP7,B.CRIINJDP7||',','')|| NVL2(B.CRIINJDP8,B.CRIINJDP8||',','')|| NVL2(B.CRIINJDP9,B.CRIINJDP9||',','')|| B.CRIINJDP10 From BAAPPEXPAND B Where B.APNO = t.APNO AND B.SEQNO = '0000') As "CRIINJDP", '' As "COMRECHKYM", SUBSTR(t.APNO,1,1) As "PAYTYPE", t.BENNAME As "BENNAME", t.EVTSEX As "BENSEX", t.ISSUYM As "ISSUYM", t.SEQNO As "SEQNO", t.EVTIDNNO As "EVTIDNNO", t.EVTBRDATE,
(SELECT PRPNO FROM (SELECT B1.PRPNO, B1.SEQNO FROM BCCMF09 B1 WHERE NVL(TRIM(TAL20),' ') <> '0099' AND B1.INSKD = '1' AND (B1.PAYTYP||B1.GROUPMK) LIKE (SUBSTR(t.APNO,1,2)||'%') AND ((SUBSTR(t.APNO, 12, 1) IN (TAL11, TAL12, TAL13, TAL14, TAL15)) OR (SUBSTR(B1.TAL20, 1, 2) <= SUBSTR(t.APNO, 11, 2) AND SUBSTR(TAL20, 3, 2) >= SUBSTR(t.APNO, 11, 2)) OR (SUBSTR(t.APNO, 11, 2) IN (B1.TAL21, B1.TAL22, B1.TAL23, B1.TAL24, B1.TAL25))) AND (TRIM(B1.STATUS) IS NULL OR B1.STATUS <> 'D') ORDER BY B1.SEQNO) WHERE ROWNUM <= 1) As "PRPNO"
From BAAPPBASE t Where t.APNO like 'K%' And t.SEQNO = '0000' And t.Paykind in ('35','38') And t.APNO IN (Select t1.APNO From BADAPR t1 Where t1.APNO like 'K%' And t1.SEQNO = '0000' And t1.MCHKTYP = '2' And t1.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# And t1.MTESTMK = 'F' And t1.APLPAYMK = '3' And t1.APLPAYDATE is not null) And t.APNO = (Select t2.APNO From BARECHECK t2 Where t2.APNO = t.APNO Group by t2.APNO Having Count(t2.APNO) = 1) And t.APNO = (Select t3.APNO From BARECHECK t3 Where t3.APNO = t.APNO And SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(t3.RECHKYM || '01','YYYYMMDD'), -3),'YYYYMMDD'),1,6) = #issuYm:VARCHAR#) UNION Select DECODE(t.GRDNAME,NULL,'C03','C04') As "NOTIFYFORM", t.APNO, t.EVTNAME, t.GRDNAME, t.GRDIDNNO, t.COMMZIP, t.COMMADDR, (Select A.REHCYM From BAAPPEXPAND A Where A.APNO = t.APNO And A.SEQNO = '0000') As "REHCYM", (Select NVL2(B.CRIINJDP1,B.CRIINJDP1||',','')|| NVL2(B.CRIINJDP2,B.CRIINJDP2||',','')|| NVL2(B.CRIINJDP3,B.CRIINJDP3||',','')|| NVL2(B.CRIINJDP4,B.CRIINJDP4||',','')|| NVL2(B.CRIINJDP5,B.CRIINJDP5||',','')|| NVL2(B.CRIINJDP6,B.CRIINJDP6||',','')|| NVL2(B.CRIINJDP7,B.CRIINJDP7||',','')|| NVL2(B.CRIINJDP8,B.CRIINJDP8||',','')|| NVL2(B.CRIINJDP9,B.CRIINJDP9||',','')|| B.CRIINJDP10 From BAAPPEXPAND B Where B.APNO = t.APNO And B.SEQNO = '0000') As "CRIINJDP", '' As "COMRECHKYM", SUBSTR(t.APNO,1,1) As "PAYTYPE", t.BENNAME As "BENNAME", t.EVTSEX As "BENSEX", t.ISSUYM As "ISSUYM", t.SEQNO As "SEQNO", t.EVTIDNNO As "EVTIDNNO", t.EVTBRDATE,
(SELECT PRPNO FROM (SELECT B1.PRPNO, B1.SEQNO FROM BCCMF09 B1 WHERE NVL(TRIM(TAL20),' ') <> '0099' AND B1.INSKD = '1' AND (B1.PAYTYP||B1.GROUPMK) LIKE (SUBSTR(t.APNO,1,2)||'%') AND ((SUBSTR(t.APNO, 12, 1) IN (TAL11, TAL12, TAL13, TAL14, TAL15)) OR (SUBSTR(B1.TAL20, 1, 2) <= SUBSTR(t.APNO, 11, 2) AND SUBSTR(TAL20, 3, 2) >= SUBSTR(t.APNO, 11, 2)) OR (SUBSTR(t.APNO, 11, 2) IN (B1.TAL21, B1.TAL22, B1.TAL23, B1.TAL24, B1.TAL25))) AND (TRIM(B1.STATUS) IS NULL OR B1.STATUS <> 'D') ORDER BY B1.SEQNO) WHERE ROWNUM <= 1) As "PRPNO"
From BAAPPBASE t Where t.APNO like 'K%' And t.SEQNO = '0000' And t.Paykind in ('35','38') And t.APNO IN (Select t1.APNO From BADAPR t1 Where t1.APNO like 'K%' And t1.SEQNO = '0000' And t1.MCHKTYP = '2' And t1.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# And t1.MTESTMK = 'F' And t1.APLPAYMK = '3' And t1.APLPAYDATE is not null)
And t.APNO = (Select t2.APNO From BARECHECK t2 Where t2.APNO = t.APNO Group by t2.APNO Having Count(t2.APNO) > 1)
And t.APNO = (Select t3.APNO From BARECHECK t3 Where t3.APNO = t.APNO AND t3.RECHKYM = (SELECT MAX(T31.RECHKYM) FROM BARECHECK t31 WHERE t31.APNO = t3.APNO) And SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(t3.RECHKYM || '01','YYYYMMDD'), -3),'YYYYMMDD'),1,6) = #issuYm:VARCHAR#) And t.APNO = (Select t4.APNO From BARECHECK t4 Where t4.APNO = t.APNO AND t4.RECHKYM = (SELECT MIN(T41.RECHKYM) FROM BARECHECK t41 WHERE t41.APNO = t4.APNO) And t4.RECHKSTATUS = '2') ) Order By PAYTYPE, PRPNO, APNO

Select DECODE(t.GRDNAME,NULL,'C05','C06') As "NOTIFYFORM", t.APNO, t.EVTNAME, t.GRDNAME, t.GRDIDNNO, t.COMMZIP, t.COMMADDR, (Select A.COMRECHKYM From BARECHECK A Where A.APNO = t.APNO And A.COMRECHKYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# And A.RECHKSTATUS = '2') As "COMRECHKYM", '' As "REHCYM", '' As "CRIINJDP", SUBSTR(t.APNO,1,1) As "PAYTYPE", t.BENNAME As "BENNAME", t.EVTSEX As "BENSEX", t.ISSUYM As "ISSUYM", t.SEQNO As "SEQNO", t.EVTIDNNO As "EVTIDNNO", t.EVTBRDATE,
(SELECT B1.PRPNO FROM BCCMF09 B1 WHERE NVL(TRIM(TAL20),' ') <> '0099' AND B1.INSKD = '1' AND (B1.PAYTYP||B1.GROUPMK) LIKE (SUBSTR(t.APNO,1,2)||'%') AND ((SUBSTR(t.APNO, 12, 1) IN (TAL11, TAL12, TAL13, TAL14, TAL15)) OR (SUBSTR(B1.TAL20, 1, 2) <= SUBSTR(t.APNO, 11, 2) AND SUBSTR(TAL20, 3, 2) >= SUBSTR(t.APNO, 11, 2)) OR (SUBSTR(t.APNO, 11, 2) IN (B1.TAL21, B1.TAL22, B1.TAL23, B1.TAL24, B1.TAL25))) AND (TRIM(B1.STATUS) IS NULL OR B1.STATUS <> 'D')) As "PRPNO"
From BAAPPBASE t Where t.APNO like 'K%' And t.SEQNO = '0000' And t.Paykind in ('35','38') And t.APNO IN (Select t1.APNO From BADAPR t1 Where t1.APNO like 'K%' And t1.SEQNO = '0000' And t1.MCHKTYP = '2' And t1.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# And t1.MTESTMK = 'F' And t1.APLPAYMK = '3' And t1.APLPAYDATE is not null) And t.APNO = (Select t2.APNO From BARECHECK t2 Where t2.APNO = t.APNO AND t2.COMRECHKYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# And t2.RECHKSTATUS = '2' And (t2.RECHKRESULT = 'F1' Or t2.RECHKRESULT = 'F2')) Order By PAYTYPE, PRPNO, APNO

SELECT t.APNO, t.COMMZIP, t.COMMADDR, t.EVTNAME, t.EVTIDNNO, t.EVTBRDATE, t.EVTDIEDATE, t.APPDATE, t.PAYYMS, t.EVTJOBDATE, t.MARGINAMT, t.ONCEPAYM, t.ONCEISSUEAMT, t.ANNUAMT, (SELECT SUM(T2.BEFISSUEAMT) AS BEFISSUEAMT FROM BADAPR T2 WHERE T2.APNO = T.APNO AND T2.SEQNO = '0000' AND T2.ISSUYM = T.ISSUYM
AND T2.VERISEQ = ( SELECT MAX(TO_NUMBER(A.VERISEQ)) FROM BADAPR A WHERE A.APNO = T.APNO AND A.SEQNO = T.SEQNO AND A.ISSUYM = T.ISSUYM ) AND T2.ISSUEAMT > 0) AS BEFISSUEAMT,
t1.NOLDTY, t1.NOLDTM, t.DUPEIDNNOMK, t.ISSUYM, '001' As "NOTIFYFORM", SUBSTR(t.APNO,1,1) As "PAYTYPE", t.GRDNAME, t.BENNAME As "BENNAME", t.EVTSEX As "BENSEX", t.SEQNO As "SEQNO",
(SELECT B1.PRPNO FROM BCCMF09 B1 WHERE NVL(TRIM(TAL20),' ') <> '0099' AND B1.INSKD = '1' AND (B1.PAYTYP||B1.GROUPMK) LIKE (SUBSTR(t.APNO,1,2)||'%') AND ((SUBSTR(t.APNO, 12, 1) IN (TAL11, TAL12, TAL13, TAL14, TAL15)) OR (SUBSTR(B1.TAL20, 1, 2) <= SUBSTR(t.APNO, 11, 2) AND SUBSTR(TAL20, 3, 2) >= SUBSTR(t.APNO, 11, 2)) OR (SUBSTR(t.APNO, 11, 2) IN (B1.TAL21, B1.TAL22, B1.TAL23, B1.TAL24, B1.TAL25))) AND (TRIM(B1.STATUS) IS NULL OR B1.STATUS <> 'D')) As "PRPNO"
FROM BAAPPBASE t, BADAPR t1 WHERE t.APNO LIKE #payCode:VARCHAR# || '%' AND t.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND t.SEQNO = '0000' AND t.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND (t.MARGINAMT = 0 OR t.MARGINAMT IS NULL)
AND (t.EVTDIEDATE IS NOT NULL OR TRIM(t.EVTDIEDATE) <> '')
AND t1.APNO = t.APNO And t1.SEQNO = '0000' And t1.ISSUYM = t.ISSUYM AND t1.PAYYM = t.PAYYM AND t1.MTESTMK = 'M' AND t1.PAYKIND = t.PAYKIND AND t1.VERISEQ = (Select MAX(TO_NUMBER(t2.VERISEQ) ) from BADAPR t2 Where t2.APNO = t.APNO and t2.ISSUYM = t.ISSUYM and t2.SEQNO = t.SEQNO and t2.PAYYM = t.PAYYM AND t2.MTESTMK = 'M' AND t2.PAYKIND = t.PAYKIND )
AND t.CASETYP NOT IN ('1','3','6') AND SUBSTR(t.EVTDIEDATE,0,6) > (SELECT MAX(A.PAYYM) FROM BADAPR A WHERE A.APNO = t.apno AND A.SEQNO = t.seqno AND A.ISSUYM = (SELECT MAX(B.ISSUYM) FROM BADAPR B WHERE B.APNO = t.apno AND B.SEQNO = t.seqno AND B.APLPAYMK = '3' AND (B.APLPAYDATE IS NOT NULL OR TRIM(B.APLPAYDATE) <> '') AND B.MTESTMK = 'F' AND B.BEFISSUEAMT > 0 AND B.PAYKIND = t.PAYKIND) AND A.APLPAYMK = '3' AND (A.APLPAYDATE IS NOT NULL OR TRIM(A.APLPAYDATE) <> '') AND A.MTESTMK = 'F' AND A.BEFISSUEAMT > 0 AND A.PAYKIND = t.PAYKIND)
AND (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BACHKFILE D WHERE D.APNO = t.APNO AND D.SEQNO = '0000' AND D.ISSUYM = t.ISSUYM AND D.PAYYM = t.PAYYM AND D.CHKCODE IN ('GL','XL','D5','C5')) = 0 AND (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BAMARGINAMTNOTIFY D WHERE D.APNO = t.APNO) = 0

SELECT t.APNO, t.COMMZIP, t.COMMADDR, t.EVTNAME, t.EVTIDNNO, t.EVTBRDATE, t.EVTDIEDATE, t.APPDATE, t.PAYYMS, t.EVTJOBDATE, t.MARGINAMT, t.ONCEPAYM, t.ONCEISSUEAMT, t.ANNUAMT, (SELECT SUM(T2.BEFISSUEAMT) AS BEFISSUEAMT FROM BADAPR T2 WHERE T2.APNO = T.APNO AND T2.SEQNO = '0000' AND T2.ISSUYM = T.ISSUYM
AND T2.VERISEQ = ( SELECT MAX(TO_NUMBER(A.VERISEQ)) FROM BADAPR A WHERE A.APNO = T.APNO AND A.SEQNO = T.SEQNO AND A.ISSUYM = T.ISSUYM ) AND T2.ISSUEAMT > 0) AS BEFISSUEAMT,
t1.NOLDTY, t1.NOLDTM, t.DUPEIDNNOMK, t.ISSUYM, '002' As "NOTIFYFORM", SUBSTR(t.APNO,1,1) As "PAYTYPE", t.GRDNAME, t.BENNAME As "BENNAME", t.EVTSEX As "BENSEX", t.SEQNO As "SEQNO",
(SELECT B1.PRPNO FROM BCCMF09 B1 WHERE NVL(TRIM(TAL20),' ') <> '0099' AND B1.INSKD = '1' AND (B1.PAYTYP||B1.GROUPMK) LIKE (SUBSTR(t.APNO,1,2)||'%') AND ((SUBSTR(t.APNO, 12, 1) IN (TAL11, TAL12, TAL13, TAL14, TAL15)) OR (SUBSTR(B1.TAL20, 1, 2) <= SUBSTR(t.APNO, 11, 2) AND SUBSTR(TAL20, 3, 2) >= SUBSTR(t.APNO, 11, 2)) OR (SUBSTR(t.APNO, 11, 2) IN (B1.TAL21, B1.TAL22, B1.TAL23, B1.TAL24, B1.TAL25))) AND (TRIM(B1.STATUS) IS NULL OR B1.STATUS <> 'D')) As "PRPNO"
FROM BAAPPBASE t, BADAPR t1 WHERE t.APNO LIKE #payCode:VARCHAR# || '%' AND t.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND t.SEQNO = '0000' AND t.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR#
AND t.MARGINAMT > 0 AND (t.EVTDIEDATE IS NOT NULL OR TRIM(t.EVTDIEDATE) <> '')
AND t1.APNO = t.APNO And t1.SEQNO = '0000' And t1.ISSUYM = t.ISSUYM AND t1.PAYYM = t.PAYYM AND t1.MTESTMK = 'M' AND t1.PAYKIND = t.PAYKIND AND t1.VERISEQ = (Select MAX(TO_NUMBER(t2.VERISEQ) ) from BADAPR t2 Where t2.APNO = t.APNO and t2.SEQNO = t.SEQNO and t2.ISSUYM = t.ISSUYM and t2.PAYYM = t.PAYYM AND t2.MTESTMK = 'M' AND t2.PAYKIND = t.PAYKIND )
AND t.CASETYP NOT IN ('1','3','6') AND SUBSTR(t.EVTDIEDATE,0,6) > (SELECT MAX(A.PAYYM) FROM BADAPR A WHERE A.APNO = t.apno AND A.SEQNO = t.seqno AND A.ISSUYM = (SELECT MAX(B.ISSUYM) FROM BADAPR B WHERE B.APNO = t.apno AND B.SEQNO = t.seqno AND B.APLPAYMK = '3' AND (B.APLPAYDATE IS NOT NULL OR TRIM(B.APLPAYDATE) <> '') AND B.MTESTMK = 'F' AND B.BEFISSUEAMT > 0 AND B.PAYKIND = t.PAYKIND) AND A.APLPAYMK = '3' AND (A.APLPAYDATE IS NOT NULL OR TRIM(A.APLPAYDATE) <> '') AND A.MTESTMK = 'F' AND A.BEFISSUEAMT > 0 AND B.PAYKIND = t.PAYKIND)
AND (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BACHKFILE D WHERE D.APNO = t.APNO AND D.SEQNO = '0000' AND D.ISSUYM = t.ISSUYM AND D.PAYYM = t.PAYYM AND D.CHKCODE IN ('GL','XL','D5','C5')) = 0 AND (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BAMARGINAMTNOTIFY D WHERE D.APNO = t.APNO) = 0

SELECT t.APNO, t.COMMZIP, t.COMMADDR, t.EVTNAME, t.EVTIDNNO, t.EVTBRDATE, t.EVTDIEDATE, t.APPDATE, t.PAYYMS, t.EVTJOBDATE, t.MARGINAMT, t.ONCEPAYM, t.ONCEISSUEAMT, t.ANNUAMT, (SELECT SUM(T2.BEFISSUEAMT) AS BEFISSUEAMT FROM BADAPR T2 WHERE T2.APNO = T.APNO AND T2.SEQNO = '0000' AND T2.ISSUYM = T.ISSUYM
AND T2.VERISEQ = ( SELECT MAX(TO_NUMBER(A.VERISEQ)) FROM BADAPR A WHERE A.APNO = T.APNO AND A.SEQNO = T.SEQNO AND A.ISSUYM = T.ISSUYM ) AND T2.ISSUEAMT > 0) AS BEFISSUEAMT,
t1.NOLDTY, t1.NOLDTM, t.DUPEIDNNOMK, t.ISSUYM, '003' As "NOTIFYFORM", SUBSTR(t.APNO,1,1) As "PAYTYPE", t.GRDNAME, t.BENNAME As "BENNAME", t.EVTSEX As "BENSEX", t.SEQNO As "SEQNO",

AND t.CASETYP NOT IN ('1','3','6') AND SUBSTR(t.EVTDIEDATE,0,6) > (SELECT MAX(A.PAYYM) FROM BADAPR A WHERE A.APNO = t.apno AND A.SEQNO = t.seqno AND A.ISSUYM = (SELECT MAX(B.ISSUYM) FROM BADAPR B WHERE B.APNO = t.apno AND B.SEQNO = t.seqno AND B.APLPAYMK = '3' AND (B.APLPAYDATE IS NOT NULL OR TRIM(B.APLPAYDATE) <> '') AND B.MTESTMK = 'F' AND B.BEFISSUEAMT > 0 AND B.PAYKIND = t.PAYKIND) AND A.APLPAYMK = '3' AND (A.APLPAYDATE IS NOT NULL OR TRIM(A.APLPAYDATE) <> '') AND A.MTESTMK = 'F' AND A.BEFISSUEAMT > 0 AND A.PAYKIND = t.PAYKIND)

SELECT t.APNO, '001P' As "NOTIFYFORM" FROM BAAPPBASE t, BAMARGINAMTNOTIFY B, BADAPR t1 WHERE t.APNO LIKE #payCode:VARCHAR# || '%' AND t.SEQNO = '0000' AND t.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND (t.EVTDIEDATE IS NOT NULL OR TRIM(t.EVTDIEDATE) <> '') AND t1.APNO = t.APNO And t1.SEQNO = '0000' And t1.ISSUYM = t.ISSUYM AND t1.PAYYM = t.PAYYM AND t1.MTESTMK = 'M' AND t1.VERISEQ = (Select MAX(TO_NUMBER(t2.VERISEQ) ) from BADAPR t2 Where t2.APNO = t.APNO and t2.SEQNO = t.SEQNO and t2.ISSUYM = t.ISSUYM and t2.PAYYM = t.PAYYM AND t2.MTESTMK = 'M' ) AND t.CASETYP NOT IN ('1','3','6') AND (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BACHKFILE D WHERE D.APNO = t.APNO AND D.SEQNO = '0000' AND D.ISSUYM = t.ISSUYM AND D.PAYYM = t.PAYYM AND D.CHKCODE IN ('GL','XL','D5','C5')) = 0 AND (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BAMARGINAMTNOTIFY D WHERE D.APNO = t.APNO AND D.NOTIFYFORM = '001' AND D.ISSUEDATE2 IS NOT NULL AND TRUNC(SYSDATE - TO_DATE(D.ISSUEDATE2, 'YYYYMMDD')) > 30 AND D.ISSUEDATE3 IS NULL) > 0 AND t.APNO = B.APNO AND (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MAADMREC WHERE MAADMRECID = B.MAADMRECID2 AND CLOSDATE IS NOT NULL) = 0
UNION
SELECT t.APNO, '002P' As "NOTIFYFORM" FROM BAAPPBASE t, BAMARGINAMTNOTIFY B, BADAPR t1 WHERE t.APNO LIKE #payCode:VARCHAR# || '%' AND t.SEQNO = '0000' AND t.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND (t.EVTDIEDATE IS NOT NULL OR TRIM(t.EVTDIEDATE) <> '') AND t1.APNO = t.APNO And t1.SEQNO = '0000' And t1.ISSUYM = t.ISSUYM AND t1.PAYYM = t.PAYYM AND t1.MTESTMK = 'M' AND t1.VERISEQ = (Select MAX(TO_NUMBER(t2.VERISEQ) ) from BADAPR t2 Where t2.APNO = t.APNO and t2.SEQNO = t.SEQNO and t2.ISSUYM = t.ISSUYM and t2.PAYYM = t.PAYYM AND t2.MTESTMK = 'M' ) AND t.CASETYP NOT IN ('1','3','6') AND (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BACHKFILE D WHERE D.APNO = t.APNO AND D.SEQNO = '0000' AND D.ISSUYM = t.ISSUYM AND D.PAYYM = t.PAYYM AND D.CHKCODE IN ('GL','XL','D5','C5')) = 0 AND (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BAMARGINAMTNOTIFY D WHERE D.APNO = t.APNO AND D.NOTIFYFORM = '002' AND D.ISSUEDATE2 IS NOT NULL AND TRUNC(SYSDATE - TO_DATE(D.ISSUEDATE2, 'YYYYMMDD')) > 30 AND D.ISSUEDATE3 IS NULL) > 0 AND t.APNO = B.APNO AND (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MAADMREC WHERE MAADMRECID = B.MAADMRECID2 AND CLOSDATE IS NOT NULL) = 0
UNION
SELECT t.APNO, '003P' As "NOTIFYFORM" FROM BAAPPBASE t, BAMARGINAMTNOTIFY B, BADAPR t1 WHERE t.APNO LIKE #payCode:VARCHAR# || '%' AND t.SEQNO = '0000' AND t.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND (t.EVTDIEDATE IS NOT NULL OR TRIM(t.EVTDIEDATE) <> '') AND t1.APNO = t.APNO And t1.SEQNO = '0000' And t1.ISSUYM = t.ISSUYM AND t1.PAYYM = t.PAYYM AND t1.MTESTMK = 'M' AND t1.VERISEQ = (Select MAX(TO_NUMBER(t2.VERISEQ) ) from BADAPR t2 Where t2.APNO = t.APNO and t2.SEQNO = t.SEQNO and t2.ISSUYM = t.ISSUYM and t2.PAYYM = t.PAYYM AND t2.MTESTMK = 'M' ) AND t.CASETYP NOT IN ('1','3','6') AND (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BACHKFILE D WHERE D.APNO = t.APNO AND D.SEQNO = '0000' AND D.ISSUYM = t.ISSUYM AND D.PAYYM = t.PAYYM AND D.CHKCODE IN ('GL','XL','D5','C5')) = 0 AND (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BAMARGINAMTNOTIFY D WHERE D.APNO = t.APNO AND D.NOTIFYFORM = '003' AND D.ISSUEDATE2 IS NOT NULL AND TRUNC(SYSDATE - TO_DATE(D.ISSUEDATE2, 'YYYYMMDD')) > 30 AND D.ISSUEDATE3 IS NULL) > 0 AND t.APNO = B.APNO AND (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MAADMREC WHERE MAADMRECID = B.MAADMRECID2 AND CLOSDATE IS NOT NULL) = 0
ORDER BY NOTIFYFORM, APNO

SELECT to_char(add_months(to_date(A.ISSUYM, 'YYYYMM'), -1), 'YYYYMM') ENDYM, A.APPDATE, SUBSTR(A.CRTTIME, 1, 8) AS CRTTIME, A.APNO, A.EVTNAME, A.PROCSTAT, decode(substr(A.PROCSTAT, 1, 1), '0',SUBSTR(A.CRTTIME, 1, 8), '1',SUBSTR(A.CRTTIME, 1, 8), '2',A.CHKDATE, '3',A.RECHKDATE, '4',A.EXEDATE) as LASTDATE, decode(substr(A.PROCSTAT, 1, 1), '0',A.CRTUSER, '1',A.CRTUSER, '2',A.CHKMAN, '3',A.RECHKMAN, '4',A.EXEMAN) as LASTUSER,
(SELECT LETTERTYPE FROM MAADMREC WHERE APNO = A.APNO AND ISSUYM = A.Issuym AND nvl(trim(DELMK), ' ') <> 'D' AND PRODATE = (SELECT MAX(PRODATE) FROM MAADMREC WHERE APNO = A.APNO AND ISSUYM = A.Issuym AND nvl(trim(DELMK), ' ') <> 'D') AND CRTTIME = (SELECT MAX(CRTTIME) FROM MAADMREC WHERE APNO = A.APNO AND ISSUYM = A.Issuym AND nvl(trim(DELMK), ' ') <> 'D')) LETERTYPE, (SELECT NDOMK1 FROM MAADMREC WHERE APNO = A.APNO AND ISSUYM = A.Issuym AND nvl(trim(DELMK), ' ') <> 'D' AND PRODATE = (SELECT MAX(PRODATE) FROM MAADMREC WHERE APNO = A.APNO AND ISSUYM = A.Issuym AND nvl(trim(DELMK), ' ') <> 'D') AND CRTTIME = (SELECT MAX(CRTTIME) FROM MAADMREC WHERE APNO = A.APNO AND ISSUYM = A.Issuym AND nvl(trim(DELMK), ' ') <> 'D')) NDOMK1, A.CASETYP, B.PRPNO as CHKMAN, A.APITEM, A.EVTIDNNO, A.ISSUYM FROM BAAPPBASE A, BCCMF09 B WHERE A.CASETYP IN ('1', '2', '3', '4', '6') AND B.INSKD = '1' AND A.SEQNO = '0000' AND A.PROCSTAT < '40' AND A.APNO LIKE #payCode:VARCHAR# || '%' AND SUBSTR(A.APPDATE, 1, 6) = #endYm:VARCHAR#
AND NVL(TRIM(TAL20),' ') <> '0099' AND (B.PAYTYP||B.GROUPMK) LIKE (SUBSTR(A.APNO,1,2)||'%') AND ((SUBSTR(A.APNO, 12, 1) IN (TAL11, TAL12, TAL13, TAL14, TAL15)) OR (SUBSTR(B.TAL20, 1, 2) <= SUBSTR(A.APNO, 11, 2) AND SUBSTR(TAL20, 3, 2) >= SUBSTR(A.APNO, 11, 2)) OR (SUBSTR(A.APNO, 11, 2) IN (B.TAL21, B.TAL22, B.TAL23, B.TAL24, B.TAL25))) AND (TRIM(B.STATUS) IS NULL OR B.STATUS <> 'D')
ORDER BY CHKMAN, A.APNO

SELECT to_char(add_months(to_date(A.ISSUYM, 'YYYYMM'), -1), 'YYYYMM') ENDYM, A.APPDATE, SUBSTR(A.CRTTIME, 1, 8) AS CRTTIME, A.APNO, A.EVTNAME, A.PROCSTAT, decode(substr(A.PROCSTAT, 1, 1), '0',SUBSTR(A.CRTTIME, 1, 8), '1',SUBSTR(A.CRTTIME, 1, 8), '2',A.CHKDATE, '3',A.RECHKDATE, '4',A.EXEDATE) as LASTDATE, decode(substr(A.PROCSTAT, 1, 1), '0',A.CRTUSER, '1',A.CRTUSER, '2',A.CHKMAN, '3',A.RECHKMAN, '4',A.EXEMAN) as LASTUSER,
(SELECT B.LETTERTYPE FROM MAADMREC B WHERE B.APNO = A.APNO AND B.ISSUYM = A.Issuym AND nvl(trim(B.DELMK), ' ') <> 'D' AND B.PRODATE = (SELECT MAX(PRODATE) FROM MAADMREC WHERE APNO = A.APNO AND ISSUYM = A.Issuym AND nvl(trim(DELMK), ' ') <> 'D') AND B.CRTTIME = (SELECT MAX(CRTTIME) FROM MAADMREC WHERE APNO = A.APNO AND ISSUYM = A.Issuym AND nvl(trim(DELMK), ' ') <> 'D')) LETERTYPE, (SELECT B.NDOMK1 FROM MAADMREC B WHERE B.APNO = A.APNO AND B.ISSUYM = A.Issuym AND nvl(trim(B.DELMK), ' ') <> 'D' AND B.PRODATE = (SELECT MAX(PRODATE) FROM MAADMREC WHERE APNO = A.APNO AND ISSUYM = A.ISSUYM AND nvl(trim(DELMK), ' ') <> 'D') AND B.CRTTIME = (SELECT MAX(CRTTIME) FROM MAADMREC WHERE APNO = A.APNO AND ISSUYM = A.Issuym AND nvl(trim(DELMK), ' ') <> 'D')) NDOMK1, A.CASETYP, B.PRPNO as CHKMAN, A.APITEM, A.EVTIDNNO, A.ISSUYM FROM BAAPPBASE A, BCCMF09 B WHERE A.CASETYP IN ('1', '2', '3', '4', '6') AND B.INSKD = '1' AND A.SEQNO = '0000' AND A.PROCSTAT < '40' AND A.APNO LIKE #payCode:VARCHAR# || '%' AND SUBSTR(A.APPDATE, 1, 6) <= #endYm:VARCHAR#
AND NVL(TRIM(TAL20),' ') <> '0099' AND (B.PAYTYP||B.GROUPMK) LIKE (SUBSTR(A.APNO,1,2)||'%') AND ((SUBSTR(A.APNO, 12, 1) IN (TAL11, TAL12, TAL13, TAL14, TAL15)) OR (SUBSTR(B.TAL20, 1, 2) <= SUBSTR(A.APNO, 11, 2) AND SUBSTR(TAL20, 3, 2) >= SUBSTR(A.APNO, 11, 2)) OR (SUBSTR(A.APNO, 11, 2) IN (B.TAL21, B.TAL22, B.TAL23, B.TAL24, B.TAL25))) AND (TRIM(B.STATUS) IS NULL OR B.STATUS <> 'D')
ORDER BY A.APNO

SELECT APNO FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT T.APNO,
(SELECT B1.PRPNO FROM BCCMF09 B1 WHERE NVL(TRIM(TAL20),' ') <> '0099' AND B1.INSKD = '1' AND (B1.PAYTYP||B1.GROUPMK) LIKE (SUBSTR(T.APNO,1,2)||'%') AND ((SUBSTR(T.APNO, 12, 1) IN (TAL11, TAL12, TAL13, TAL14, TAL15)) OR (SUBSTR(B1.TAL20, 1, 2) <= SUBSTR(T.APNO, 11, 2) AND SUBSTR(TAL20, 3, 2) >= SUBSTR(T.APNO, 11, 2)) OR (SUBSTR(T.APNO, 11, 2) IN (B1.TAL21, B1.TAL22, B1.TAL23, B1.TAL24, B1.TAL25))) AND (TRIM(B1.STATUS) IS NULL OR B1.STATUS <> 'D')) As "PRPNO"
FROM BAAPPBASE T WHERE T.SEQNO = '0000'
AND TRIM(T.NOTIFYFORM) IS NOT NULL AND T.NOTIFYFORM <> '999'
AND T.APNO IN (SELECT DISTINCT T1.APNO FROM BADAPR T1 WHERE T1.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND T1.APNO LIKE #payCode:VARCHAR# || '%' AND T1.MTESTMK = 'F' AND T1.MCHKTYP = '1' AND T1.MANCHKMK = 'Y' AND T1.APLPAYMK = '3' AND TRIM(T1.APLPAYDATE) IS NOT NULL UNION SELECT DISTINCT T2.APNO FROM BADAPR T2 WHERE T2.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND T2.APNO LIKE #payCode:VARCHAR# || '%' AND T2.MTESTMK = 'F' AND T2.MANCHKMK = 'Y' AND T2.APLPAYMK = '3' AND TRIM(T2.APLPAYDATE) IS NOT NULL AND T2.APNO IN (SELECT DISTINCT A.APNO FROM BADAPR A WHERE A.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND A.MTESTMK IN ('F','M') AND A.CHGLIST IS NOT NULL ) UNION SELECT DISTINCT T31.APNO FROM BAAPPBASE T31, BADAPR T32 WHERE T31.APNO = T32.APNO AND T31.SEQNO = T32.SEQNO AND T31.ISSUYM = T32.ISSUYM AND T31.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND T31.APNO LIKE #payCode:VARCHAR# || '%' AND T31.PROCSTAT = '90' AND T32.MTESTMK IN ('F', 'M') AND T32.MCHKTYP = '4' AND T32.MANCHKMK = 'Y' AND T32.APLPAYMK = '3'
AND (T31.EVTDIEDATE IS NOT NULL AND NVL(TRIM(T31.EVTDIEDATE), ' ') <> ' ') AND (T32.APLPAYDATE IS NOT NULL AND NVL(TRIM(T32.APLPAYDATE), ' ') <> ' ')
AND T32.BEFISSUEAMT > 0 AND T31.NOTIFYFORM IN ('D01','D02','D03','D04','D05','D06','D07'))
AND SUBSTR(T.NOTIFYFORM, 1, 1) = '0'
AND SUBSTR(T.NOTIFYFORM, 1, 1) = 'B'
AND SUBSTR(T.NOTIFYFORM, 1, 1) = 'D'
AND SUBSTR(T.NOTIFYFORM, 1, 1) = 'L'
ORDER BY T.APNO )

SELECT DISTINCT T.APNO FROM BAAPPBASE T WHERE T.SEQNO = '0000' AND T.APNO IN (SELECT DISTINCT T1.APNO FROM BADAPR T1, BAAPPBASE T2 WHERE T1.BAAPPBASEID = T2.BAAPPBASEID AND T1.APNO = T2.APNO AND T1.SEQNO = T2.SEQNO AND T1.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND T1.APNO LIKE #payCode:VARCHAR# || '%' AND T1.MTESTMK = 'F' AND T1.MANCHKMK = 'Y' AND T1.APLPAYMK = '3' AND TRIM(T1.APLPAYDATE) IS NOT NULL
AND ((T1.MCHKTYP = '1' AND T2.NOTIFYFORM <> '999') OR (T1.MCHKTYP = '2' AND T2.ISSUNOTIFYINGMK = 'Y'))) AND (T.NOTIFYFORM <> '999' AND TRIM(T.NOTIFYFORM) IS NOT NULL)
ORDER BY T.APNO

SELECT DISTINCT T.APNO FROM BAAPPBASE T WHERE T.SEQNO = '0000' AND T.APNO IN (SELECT DISTINCT T1.APNO FROM BADAPR T1 WHERE T1.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND T1.APNO LIKE #payCode:VARCHAR# || '%' AND T1.MTESTMK = 'F' AND T1.MCHKTYP = '1' AND T1.MANCHKMK = 'Y' AND T1.APLPAYMK = '3' AND TRIM(T1.APLPAYDATE) IS NOT NULL)
AND (T.NOTIFYFORM <> '999' AND TRIM(T.NOTIFYFORM) IS NOT NULL)
ORDER BY T.APNO

Select t.APNO, t.EVTNAME, t.EVTIDNNO, t.ISSUYM, t.CASETYP, t.PROCSTAT, t.MANCHKMK From BAAPPBASE t Where t.APNO Like #payCode:VARCHAR# || '%' And t.SEQNO = '0000'
And t.PROCSTAT <> '99'
And Trim(t.CASEMK) Is Null And (t.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# Or t.APNO = #apNoA:VARCHAR# Or t.APNO = #apNoB:VARCHAR# Or t.APNO = #apNoC:VARCHAR# Or t.APNO = #apNoD:VARCHAR# Or t.APNO = #apNoE:VARCHAR# Or t.APNO = #apNoF:VARCHAR# Or t.APNO = #apNoG:VARCHAR# Or t.APNO = #apNoH:VARCHAR# Or t.APNO = #apNoI:VARCHAR# ) Order by APNO

Select t.APNO, t.PROCSTAT from baappbase t Where t.SEQNO = '0000' And (t.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# Or t.APNO = #apNoA:VARCHAR# Or t.APNO = #apNoB:VARCHAR# Or t.APNO = #apNoC:VARCHAR# Or t.APNO = #apNoD:VARCHAR# Or t.APNO = #apNoE:VARCHAR# Or t.APNO = #apNoF:VARCHAR# Or t.APNO = #apNoG:VARCHAR# Or t.APNO = #apNoH:VARCHAR# Or t.APNO = #apNoI:VARCHAR# ) And t.PROCSTAT = '99'

SELECT DISTINCT A.IDNNO FROM (SELECT EVTIDNNO AS IDNNO FROM BAAPPBASE WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = '0000' AND BENEVTREL IN ('1', '2', '3', '4', '5', '6', '7') UNION SELECT BENIDNNO AS IDNNO FROM BAAPPBASE WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND BENEVTREL IN ('1', '2', '3', '4', '5', '6', '7') UNION SELECT FAMIDNNO AS IDNNO FROM BAFAMILY WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND FAMEVTREL IN ('1', '2', '3', '4', '5', '6', '7')) A
SELECT PAYYM from BAAPPBASE WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR#
SELECT PAYYM from BAAPPBASE WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR#
SELECT COUNT(SEQNO) AS PAYEECOUNT from BAAPPBASE WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND BENEVTREL IN ('2', '3', '4', '5', '6', '7')

SELECT T.APNO, T.SEQNO, T.BENDIEDATE, T.BENNAME, T.BENIDNNO, T.BENBRDATE, T.BENNATIONTYP, T.BENNATIONCODE FROM BAAPPBASE T WHERE T.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
AND T.SEQNO <> '0000' AND T.BENEVTREL IN ('2','3','4','5','6','7') AND T.SEQNO = (SELECT MIN(SEQNO) FROM BAAPPBASE WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO <> '0000' AND BENEVTREL IN ('2','3','4','5','6','7'))

select t.BENNAME, t.SEQNO From BAAPPBASE t Where t.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
And t.SEQNO <> '0000'
And t.CLOSECAUSE is null and t.UNQUALIFIEDCAUSE is null and t.SEQNO in (Select t1.SEQNO from BADAPR t1 Where t1.APNO = t.apno and t1.ISSUYM = t.issuym and t1.PAYYM = t.payym
and t1.acceptmk <> 'N'
and t1.veriseq = (Select max(TO_NUMBER(t11.veriseq)) from BADAPR t11 Where t11.apno = t1.apno and t11.issuym = t1.issuym and t11.payym = t1.payym ) )
SELECT count(t1.EVTIDNNO) FROM BAAPPBASE t1 WHERE t1.BENIDNNO = #idn:VARCHAR#

SELECT DISTINCT APNO FROM ( SELECT t1.APNO FROM BAAPPBASE t1 WHERE t1.BENIDNNO = #idn:VARCHAR# UNION SELECT t2.APNO FROM BADAPR t2 WHERE t2.BENIDN = #idn:VARCHAR# UNION SELECT t3.APNO FROM BCHEIR t3 WHERE t3.HEIRIDNO = #idn:VARCHAR# ) ORDER BY APNO
SELECT t1.COMMZIP, t1.COMMADDR FROM BAAPPBASE t1 WHERE t1.APNO = #apno:VARCHAR# AND t1.SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR#
SELECT distinct t1.EVTNAME FROM BAAPPBASE t1 WHERE t1.BENIDNNO = #idn:VARCHAR#

SELECT e.BENIDNNO, e.BENNAME FROM BAPAYMENT t, BAAPPBASE e, BAPAYMENTDTL l WHERE t.PAYMENTNO = #paymentNo:VARCHAR# AND e.APNO = l.APNO AND e.SEQNO = l.SEQNO AND l.PAYMENTNO = t.PAYMENTNO AND l.MAPNOMK = '1'
SELECT DISTINCT SEQNO FROM BAAPPBASE WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND ACCSEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR# AND ACCREL = '3' ORDER BY SEQNO
SELECT COUNT(APNO) FROM BAAPPBASE t1 WHERE t1.ACCREL = '1' AND t1.ACCSEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR# AND t1.SEQNO = #seqNo:VARCHAR# AND t1.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE BAAPPBASE SET ISSUNOTIFYINGMK = '', NOTIFYFORM = '999' WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
UPDATE BAAPPBASE SET UNQUALIFIEDCAUSE = '' WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT A.APNO, A.SEQNO, A.APPDATE, A.EVTNAME, A.EVTIDNNO, A.EVTBRDATE, A.EVTJOBDATE, A.EVTDATE, A.EVTELIGIBLEDATE, A.EVTDIEDATE, A.ASSIGNNAME, A.ASSIGNIDNNO, A.ASSIGNBRDATE, A.PAYTYP, A.BENNAME, A.BENIDNNO, A.BENBRDATE, A.BENNATIONTYP, A.COMMZIP, A.COMMADDR, A.CASETYP, A.LSUBNO, A.COMBAPMARK, A.APUBNO, A.IDNCHKYM, A.NOTIFYFORM, A.ISSUYM, A.BENEVTREL, A.APITEM, A.GRDNAME, A.PAYYMS, A.UNQUALIFIEDCAUSE, A.ISSUNOTIFYINGMK, A.BAAPPBASEID, A.BENNATIONCODE, A.BENDIEDATE, C.DIGAMYDATE, A.CLOSECAUSE, A.CLOSEDATE, A.ACCREL, C.EVTYP, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BACHKFILE D WHERE D.APNO = A.APNO AND D.SEQNO = A.SEQNO AND D.ISSUYM = A.ISSUYM AND D.PAYYM = (SELECT MAX(B.PAYYM) FROM BACHKFILE B WHERE B.SEQNO = '0000' AND B.APNO = A.APNO AND B.ISSUYM = A.ISSUYM) AND D.CHKCODE = '25') DATACOUNT, A.BENSEX, (SELECT ACCEPTMK FROM BADAPR WHERE APNO = A.APNO AND SEQNO = A.SEQNO AND ISSUYM = A.ISSUYM AND PAYYM = A.PAYYM AND VERISEQ = (SELECT MAX(TO_NUMBER(VERISEQ)) FROM BADAPR WHERE APNO = A.APNO AND SEQNO = A.SEQNO AND ISSUYM = A.ISSUYM AND PAYYM = A.PAYYM) AND PAYKIND = A.PAYKIND) ACCEPTMK FROM BAAPPBASE A, BAAPPEXPAND C WHERE A.apno = #apNo :VARCHAR#
AND A.seqno <> '0000'
AND A.CASEMK is null AND A.APNO = C.APNO(+) AND A.BAAPPBASEID = C.BAAPPBASEID(+) AND A.SEQNO = C.SEQNO(+) ORDER BY SEQNO

SELECT A.APNO, A.SEQNO, A.APPDATE, A.EVTNAME, A.EVTIDNNO, A.EVTBRDATE, A.EVTJOBDATE, A.EVTDATE, A.EVTELIGIBLEDATE, A.EVTDIEDATE, A.ASSIGNNAME, A.ASSIGNIDNNO, A.ASSIGNBRDATE, A.PAYTYP, A.BENNAME, A.BENIDNNO, A.BENBRDATE, A.BENNATIONTYP, A.COMMZIP, A.COMMADDR, A.CASETYP, A.LSUBNO, A.COMBAPMARK, A.APUBNO, A.IDNCHKYM, A.NOTIFYFORM, A.ISSUYM, A.BENEVTREL, A.APITEM, A.GRDNAME, A.PAYYMS, A.UNQUALIFIEDCAUSE, A.ISSUNOTIFYINGMK, A.BAAPPBASEID, A.BENNATIONCODE, A.BENDIEDATE, C.DIGAMYDATE, A.CLOSECAUSE, A.CLOSEDATE, A.ACCREL, C.EVTYP, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BACHKFILE D WHERE D.APNO = A.APNO AND D.SEQNO = A.SEQNO AND D.ISSUYM = A.ISSUYM AND D.PAYYM = A.PAYYM AND D.CHKCODE = '25') DATACOUNT, A.BENSEX, (SELECT ACCEPTMK FROM BADAPR WHERE APNO = A.APNO AND SEQNO = A.SEQNO AND ISSUYM = A.ISSUYM AND PAYYM = A.PAYYM AND VERISEQ = (SELECT MAX(TO_NUMBER(VERISEQ)) FROM BADAPR WHERE APNO = A.APNO AND SEQNO = A.SEQNO AND ISSUYM = A.ISSUYM AND PAYYM = A.PAYYM) AND PAYKIND = A.PAYKIND) ACCEPTMK FROM BAAPPBASE A, BAAPPEXPAND C WHERE A.apno = #apNo:VARCHAR#
AND A.seqno <> '0000' AND A.CASEMK is null AND A.APNO = C.APNO AND A.BAAPPBASEID = C.BAAPPBASEID AND A.SEQNO = C.SEQNO AND (TRIM(A.UNQUALIFIEDCAUSE) <> '' OR TRIM(A.UNQUALIFIEDCAUSE) IS NOT NULL)
AND (TRIM(A.BENDIEDATE) = '' OR TRIM(A.BENDIEDATE) IS NULL) UNION SELECT A.APNO, A.SEQNO, A.APPDATE, A.EVTNAME, A.EVTIDNNO, A.EVTBRDATE, A.EVTJOBDATE, A.EVTDATE, A.EVTELIGIBLEDATE, A.EVTDIEDATE, A.ASSIGNNAME, A.ASSIGNIDNNO, A.ASSIGNBRDATE, A.PAYTYP, A.BENNAME, A.BENIDNNO, A.BENBRDATE, A.BENNATIONTYP, A.COMMZIP, A.COMMADDR, A.CASETYP, A.LSUBNO, A.COMBAPMARK, A.APUBNO, A.IDNCHKYM, A.NOTIFYFORM, A.ISSUYM, A.BENEVTREL, A.APITEM, A.GRDNAME, A.PAYYMS, A.UNQUALIFIEDCAUSE, A.ISSUNOTIFYINGMK, A.BAAPPBASEID, A.BENNATIONCODE, A.BENDIEDATE, C.DIGAMYDATE, A.CLOSECAUSE, A.CLOSEDATE, A.ACCREL, C.EVTYP, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BACHKFILE D WHERE D.APNO = A.APNO AND D.SEQNO = A.SEQNO AND D.ISSUYM = A.ISSUYM AND D.PAYYM = A.PAYYM AND D.CHKCODE = '25') DATACOUNT, A.BENSEX, (SELECT ACCEPTMK FROM BADAPR WHERE APNO = A.APNO AND SEQNO = A.SEQNO AND ISSUYM = A.ISSUYM AND PAYYM = A.PAYYM AND VERISEQ = (SELECT MAX(TO_NUMBER(VERISEQ)) FROM BADAPR WHERE APNO = A.APNO AND SEQNO = A.SEQNO AND ISSUYM = A.ISSUYM AND PAYYM = A.PAYYM) AND PAYKIND = A.PAYKIND) ACCEPTMK FROM BAAPPBASE A, BAAPPEXPAND C WHERE A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
AND A.SEQNO <> '0000'
AND A.CASEMK is null AND A.APNO = C.APNO AND A.BAAPPBASEID = C.BAAPPBASEID AND A.SEQNO = C.SEQNO AND (TRIM(A.CLOSECAUSE) = '' OR TRIM(A.CLOSECAUSE) IS NULL) AND (TRIM(A.UNQUALIFIEDCAUSE) = '' OR TRIM(A.UNQUALIFIEDCAUSE) IS NULL) AND A.SEQNO IN (SELECT t1.SEQNO FROM BADAPR t1 WHERE t1.APNO = A.APNO AND t1.ISSUYM = A.ISSUYM AND t1.PAYYM = A.PAYYM
AND (t1.ACCEPTMK <> 'N' OR trim(t1.Acceptmk) = '' OR t1.acceptmk is null)

AND (TRIM(A.BENDIEDATE) = '' OR TRIM(A.BENDIEDATE) IS NULL) UNION SELECT A.APNO, A.SEQNO, A.APPDATE, A.EVTNAME, A.EVTIDNNO, A.EVTBRDATE, A.EVTJOBDATE, A.EVTDATE, A.EVTELIGIBLEDATE, A.EVTDIEDATE, A.ASSIGNNAME, A.ASSIGNIDNNO, A.ASSIGNBRDATE, A.PAYTYP, A.BENNAME, A.BENIDNNO, A.BENBRDATE, A.BENNATIONTYP, A.COMMZIP, A.COMMADDR, A.CASETYP, A.LSUBNO, A.COMBAPMARK, A.APUBNO, A.IDNCHKYM, A.NOTIFYFORM, A.ISSUYM, A.BENEVTREL, A.APITEM, A.GRDNAME, A.PAYYMS, A.UNQUALIFIEDCAUSE, A.ISSUNOTIFYINGMK, A.BAAPPBASEID, A.BENNATIONCODE, A.BENDIEDATE, C.DIGAMYDATE, A.CLOSECAUSE, A.CLOSEDATE, A.ACCREL, C.EVTYP, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BACHKFILE D WHERE D.APNO = A.APNO AND D.SEQNO = A.SEQNO AND D.ISSUYM = A.ISSUYM AND D.PAYYM = A.PAYYM AND D.CHKCODE = '25') DATACOUNT, A.BENSEX, (SELECT ACCEPTMK FROM BADAPR WHERE APNO = A.APNO AND SEQNO = A.SEQNO AND ISSUYM = A.ISSUYM AND PAYYM = A.PAYYM AND VERISEQ = (SELECT MAX(TO_NUMBER(VERISEQ)) FROM BADAPR WHERE APNO = A.APNO AND SEQNO = A.SEQNO AND ISSUYM = A.ISSUYM AND PAYYM = A.PAYYM) AND PAYKIND = A.PAYKIND) ACCEPTMK FROM BAAPPBASE A, BAAPPEXPAND C WHERE A.apno = #apNo:VARCHAR#

SELECT A.APNO, A.SEQNO, A.APPDATE, A.EVTNAME, A.EVTIDNNO, A.EVTBRDATE, A.EVTJOBDATE, A.EVTDATE, A.EVTELIGIBLEDATE, A.EVTDIEDATE, A.ASSIGNNAME, A.ASSIGNIDNNO, A.ASSIGNBRDATE, A.PAYTYP, A.BENNAME, A.BENIDNNO, A.BENBRDATE, A.BENNATIONTYP, A.COMMZIP, A.COMMADDR, A.CASETYP, A.LSUBNO, A.COMBAPMARK, A.APUBNO, A.IDNCHKYM, A.NOTIFYFORM, A.ISSUYM, A.BENEVTREL, A.APITEM, A.GRDNAME, A.PAYYMS, A.UNQUALIFIEDCAUSE, A.ISSUNOTIFYINGMK, A.BAAPPBASEID, A.BENNATIONCODE, A.BENDIEDATE, C.DIGAMYDATE, A.CLOSECAUSE, A.CLOSEDATE, A.ACCREL, C.EVTYP, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BACHKFILE D WHERE D.APNO = A.APNO AND D.SEQNO = A.SEQNO AND D.ISSUYM = A.ISSUYM AND D.PAYYM = A.PAYYM AND D.CHKCODE = '25') DATACOUNT, A.BENSEX, (SELECT ACCEPTMK FROM BADAPR WHERE APNO = A.APNO AND SEQNO = A.SEQNO AND ISSUYM = A.ISSUYM AND PAYYM = A.PAYYM AND VERISEQ = (SELECT MAX(TO_NUMBER(VERISEQ)) FROM BADAPR WHERE APNO = A.APNO AND SEQNO = A.SEQNO AND ISSUYM = A.ISSUYM AND PAYYM = A.PAYYM) AND PAYKIND = A.PAYKIND) ACCEPTMK FROM BAAPPBASE A, BAAPPEXPAND C WHERE A.apno = #apNo:VARCHAR#
AND A.seqno <> '0000' AND A.CASEMK is null AND A.APNO = C.APNO AND A.BAAPPBASEID = C.BAAPPBASEID AND A.SEQNO = C.SEQNO AND (TRIM(A.UNQUALIFIEDCAUSE) <> '' OR TRIM(A.UNQUALIFIEDCAUSE) IS NOT NULL)
UNION SELECT A.APNO, A.SEQNO, A.APPDATE, A.EVTNAME, A.EVTIDNNO, A.EVTBRDATE, A.EVTJOBDATE, A.EVTDATE, A.EVTELIGIBLEDATE, A.EVTDIEDATE, A.ASSIGNNAME, A.ASSIGNIDNNO, A.ASSIGNBRDATE, A.PAYTYP, A.BENNAME, A.BENIDNNO, A.BENBRDATE, A.BENNATIONTYP, A.COMMZIP, A.COMMADDR, A.CASETYP, A.LSUBNO, A.COMBAPMARK, A.APUBNO, A.IDNCHKYM, A.NOTIFYFORM, A.ISSUYM, A.BENEVTREL, A.APITEM, A.GRDNAME, A.PAYYMS, A.UNQUALIFIEDCAUSE, A.ISSUNOTIFYINGMK, A.BAAPPBASEID, A.BENNATIONCODE, A.BENDIEDATE, C.DIGAMYDATE, A.CLOSECAUSE, A.CLOSEDATE, A.ACCREL, C.EVTYP, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BACHKFILE D WHERE D.APNO = A.APNO AND D.SEQNO = A.SEQNO AND D.ISSUYM = A.ISSUYM AND D.PAYYM = A.PAYYM AND D.CHKCODE = '25') DATACOUNT, A.BENSEX, (SELECT ACCEPTMK FROM BADAPR WHERE APNO = A.APNO AND SEQNO = A.SEQNO AND ISSUYM = A.ISSUYM AND PAYYM = A.PAYYM AND VERISEQ = (SELECT MAX(TO_NUMBER(VERISEQ)) FROM BADAPR WHERE APNO = A.APNO AND SEQNO = A.SEQNO AND ISSUYM = A.ISSUYM AND PAYYM = A.PAYYM) AND PAYKIND = A.PAYKIND) ACCEPTMK FROM BAAPPBASE A, BAAPPEXPAND C WHERE A.apno = #apNo:VARCHAR#
AND A.seqno <> '0000'

and (t1.acceptmk <> 'N' OR trim(t1.Acceptmk) = '' OR t1.acceptmk is null)
and t1.veriseq = (Select max(TO_NUMBER(t11.veriseq) ) from BADAPR t11 Where t11.apno = t1.apno and t11.issuym = t1.issuym and t11.payym = t1.payym ) )

SELECT A.APNO, A.SEQNO, A.APPDATE, A.EVTNAME, A.EVTIDNNO, A.EVTBRDATE, A.EVTJOBDATE, A.EVTDATE, A.EVTELIGIBLEDATE, A.EVTDIEDATE, A.ASSIGNNAME, A.ASSIGNIDNNO, A.ASSIGNBRDATE, A.PAYTYP, A.BENNAME, A.BENIDNNO, A.BENBRDATE, A.BENNATIONTYP, A.COMMZIP, A.COMMADDR, A.CASETYP, A.LSUBNO, A.COMBAPMARK, A.APUBNO, A.IDNCHKYM, A.NOTIFYFORM, A.ISSUYM, A.BENEVTREL, A.APITEM, A.GRDNAME, A.PAYYMS, A.UNQUALIFIEDCAUSE, A.ISSUNOTIFYINGMK, A.BAAPPBASEID, A.BENNATIONCODE, A.BENDIEDATE, C.DIGAMYDATE, A.CLOSECAUSE, A.CLOSEDATE, A.ACCREL, C.EVTYP, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BACHKFILE D WHERE D.APNO = A.APNO AND D.SEQNO = A.SEQNO AND D.ISSUYM = A.ISSUYM AND D.PAYYM = (SELECT MAX(B.PAYYM) FROM BACHKFILE B WHERE B.SEQNO = '0000' AND B.APNO = A.APNO AND B.ISSUYM = A.ISSUYM) AND D.CHKCODE = '25') DATACOUNT, A.BENSEX, (SELECT ACCEPTMK FROM BADAPR WHERE APNO = A.APNO AND SEQNO = A.SEQNO AND ISSUYM = A.ISSUYM AND PAYYM = A.PAYYM AND VERISEQ = (SELECT MAX(TO_NUMBER(VERISEQ)) FROM BADAPR WHERE APNO = A.APNO AND SEQNO = A.SEQNO AND ISSUYM = A.ISSUYM AND PAYYM = A.PAYYM) AND PAYKIND = A.PAYKIND) ACCEPTMK FROM BAAPPBASE A, BAAPPEXPAND C WHERE A.apno = #apNo:VARCHAR#
AND A.seqno <> '0000'
AND A.CASEMK is null AND A.APNO = C.APNO(+) AND A.BAAPPBASEID = C.BAAPPBASEID(+) AND A.SEQNO = C.SEQNO(+)

SELECT MAX(t.SEQNO) AS SEQNO, t.BENNAME, t.APNO, t.PAYKIND, t.BENSEX, t.COMMADDR, t.COMMZIP FROM BAAPPBASE t WHERE NVL(TRIM(t.CASEMK),' ') <> 'D' AND t.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND t.BENIDNNO = #idnNo:VARCHAR# GROUP BY t.APNO, t.BENNAME, t.PAYKIND, t.BENSEX, t.COMMADDR, t.COMMZIP
SELECT DISTINCT t.BENNAME FROM BAAPPBASE t WHERE NVL(TRIM(t.CASEMK),' ') <> 'D' AND t.BENIDNNO = #idn:VARCHAR# AND ROWNUM = 1

SELECT IDNNO FROM (SELECT IDNNO, NAME, rank() over(PARTITION BY NAME ORDER BY IDNNO DESC) RANKING FROM (SELECT A.BENIDNNO AS IDNNO, A.BENNAME AS NAME FROM BAAPPBASE A WHERE A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
And A.SEQNO <> '0000'
And A.CASEMK is null UNION SELECT A.GRDIDNNO AS IDNNO, A.GRDNAME AS NAME FROM BAAPPBASE A WHERE A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
And A.SEQNO <> '0000'
And A.CASEMK is null UNION SELECT B.ASSIGNIDNNO AS IDNNO, B.ASSIGNNAME AS NAME FROM BAAPPBASE A, BAAPPEXPAND B WHERE A.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND A.BAAPPBASEID = B.BAAPPBASEID AND A.APNO = B.APNO AND A.SEQNO = B.SEQNO
AND (B.ASSIGNNAME IS NOT NULL OR TRIM(B.ASSIGNNAME) <> '') And A.SEQNO <> '0000'
And A.CASEMK is null)) WHERE RANKING = 1 AND NAME = #name:VARCHAR#

SELECT T.BAAPPBASEID, T.APNO, T.SEQNO, T.EVTNAME, T.EVTIDNNO, T.EVTDIEDATE, T.BENIDNNO, T.BENNAME, T.BENEVTREL, T.CASETYP, T.PROCSTAT, T.CLOSEDATE, T.CLOSECAUSE, (CASE WHEN TRIM(T.CLOSEDATE) IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y'
WHEN NVL(TRIM(CLOSEDATE), ' ') <> ' ' THEN 'Y'
ELSE 'N' END) AS IDFORCONFIRM FROM BAAPPBASE T WHERE T.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND T.SEQNO = '0000' ORDER BY T.SEQNO

Select T.BAAPPBASEID, T.APNO, T.SEQNO, T.EVTNAME, T.EVTIDNNO, T.EVTDIEDATE, T.BENIDNNO, T.BENNAME, T.BENEVTREL, T.CASETYP, T.PROCSTAT, T.CLOSEDATE, T.CLOSECAUSE, (CASE WHEN TRIM(T.CLOSEDATE) IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y'
WHEN NVL(TRIM(CLOSEDATE), ' ') <> ' ' THEN 'Y'
ELSE 'N' END) AS IDFORCONFIRM FROM BAAPPBASE T WHERE T.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
AND T.SEQNO = '0000'
AND T.SEQNO <> '0000'
ORDER BY T.SEQNO

SELECT Count(*) as PAYEEDATA FROM BAAPPBASE WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
AND NVL(TRIM(CLOSEDATE), ' ') <> ' ' AND TRIM(CLOSEDATE) IS NOT NULL

SELECT COUNT(*) AS PAYEEDATA FROM BAAPPBASE WHERE APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO = '0000' AND CASETYP IN ('3','4') AND PROCSTAT = '90'
AND NVL(TRIM(CLOSEDATE), ' ') <> ' ' AND TRIM(CLOSEDATE) IS NOT NULL
sqlMap.update: UPDATE BAAPPBASE T SET T.PROCSTAT = '12', T.CLOSEDATE = '', T.CLOSECAUSE = '', T.UPDUSER = #updUser:VARCHAR#, T.UPDTIME = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHH24MMSS') WHERE T.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#

UPDATE BAAPPBASE T SET T.PROCSTAT = '12', T.CLOSEDATE = DECODE(T.SEQNO,'0000','',#seqNo:VARCHAR#,'',T.CLOSEDATE), T.CLOSECAUSE = DECODE(T.SEQNO,'0000','',#seqNo:VARCHAR#,'',T.CLOSECAUSE), T.UPDUSER = #updUser:VARCHAR#, T.UPDTIME = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHH24MMSS') WHERE T.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#

UPDATE BAAPPBASE M SET M.CASETYP = (SELECT DECODE(COUNT(*),0,'1','2') FROM BADAPR T WHERE T.APNO = M.APNO AND T.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND T.APLPAYMK = '3'
AND NVL(TRIM(T.APLPAYDATE), ' ') <> ' ' AND TRIM(T.APLPAYDATE) IS NOT NULL
AND T.MANCHKMK = 'Y'), M.UPDUSER = #updUser:VARCHAR#, M.UPDTIME = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHH24MMSS') WHERE M.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT T1.APNO, T1.SEQNO, T1.APITEM, T1.CASETYP, T1.PROCSTAT, T1.EVTIDNNO, T1.EVTNAME, T1.EVTBRDATE, T1.CPIBASEYM, T1.INSAVGAMTAPPYEAR, T2.APLPAYSENIY, T2.APLPAYSENIM, T2.INSAVGAMT FROM (SELECT X.APNO, X.SEQNO, X.APITEM, X.PAYKIND, X.APPDATE, X.CASETYP, X.PROCSTAT, X.EVTIDNNO, X.EVTNAME, X.EVTBRDATE, X.ISSUYM, X.PAYYM, Z.CPIBASEYM, Z.INSAVGAMTAPPYEAR FROM BAAPPBASE X, BAAPPEXPAND Z WHERE X.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND X.SEQNO = '0000'
AND X.PROCSTAT < '40'
AND X.BAAPPBASEID = Z.BAAPPBASEID AND X.APNO = Z.APNO AND X.SEQNO = Z.SEQNO ) T1, (SELECT DISTINCT Y.APNO, Y.ISSUYM, Y.PAYYM, Y.APLPAYSENIY, Y.APLPAYSENIM, Y.INSAVGAMT FROM BADAPR Y WHERE Y.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND Y.SEQNO = '0000' ) T2 WHERE T1.APNO = T2.APNO(+) AND T1.ISSUYM = T2.ISSUYM(+) AND T1.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND T1.SEQNO = '0000' AND T1.PAYYM = T2.PAYYM(+)
AND T1.PROCSTAT < '40'

Select APNO, SEQNO, APPDATE, EVTNAME, EVTIDNNO, EVTBRDATE, EVTJOBDATE, EVTDATE, EVTELIGIBLEDATE, EVTDIEDATE, ASSIGNNAME, ASSIGNIDNNO, ASSIGNBRDATE, PAYTYP, PAYYM, BENNAME, BENIDNNO, BENBRDATE, BENNATIONTYP, COMMZIP, COMMADDR, CASETYP, LSUBNO, COMBAPMARK, APUBNO, IDNCHKYM, NOTIFYFORM, ISSUYM, BENEVTREL, APITEM, GRDNAME, UNQUALIFIEDCAUSE, ISSUNOTIFYINGMK, BENNATIONCODE, CLOSECAUSE From BAAPPBASE Where APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# Order By SEQNO

SELECT MAX(STATUSDATE) AS STATUSDATE FROM (SELECT STATUSDATE_S AS STATUSDATE FROM NBSCHOOL T WHERE TRIM(KEY) = #key:VARCHAR# AND STATUSDATE_S = (SELECT MAX(TO_NUMBER(STATUSDATE_S)) FROM NBSCHOOL WHERE TRIM(KEY) = #key:VARCHAR# AND STATUS_S IS NOT NULL AND DELFLG IS NULL) AND DELFLG IS NULL UNION SELECT STATUSDATE_E AS STATUSDATE FROM NBSCHOOL T WHERE TRIM(KEY) = #key:VARCHAR# AND STATUSDATE_E = (SELECT MAX(TO_NUMBER(STATUSDATE_E)) FROM NBSCHOOL WHERE TRIM(KEY) = #key:VARCHAR# AND STATUS_E IS NOT NULL AND DELFLG IS NULL) AND DELFLG IS NULL ) ORDER BY STATUSDATE DESC

SELECT STATUS ,STATUSDATE FROM (SELECT DISTINCT DECODE(TRIM(STATUSDATE_E),NULL,STATUS_S,'',STATUS_S,STATUS_E) STATUS ,DECODE(TRIM(STATUSDATE_E),NULL,STATUSDATE_S,'',STATUSDATE_S,STATUSDATE_E) STATUSDATE ,DECODE(TRIM(STATUSDATE_E),NULL,'999999','','999999',STATUSDATE_E) STATUSDATESORT ,DECODE(TRIM(STATUSDATE_E),NULL,CRTDT_S,'',CRTDT_S,CRTDT_E) CRTDTSORT FROM NBSCHOOL T WHERE TRIM(KEY) = #key:VARCHAR# AND STATUSDATE_S = (SELECT MAX(TO_NUMBER(STATUSDATE_S)) FROM NBSCHOOL WHERE TRIM(KEY) = #key:VARCHAR# AND STATUS_S IS NOT NULL AND DELFLG IS NULL) AND STATUS_S IS NOT NULL AND STATUSDATE_S = #statusDate_S:VARCHAR# AND DELFLG IS NULL UNION SELECT DISTINCT DECODE(TRIM(STATUSDATE_E),NULL,STATUS_S,'',STATUS_S,STATUS_E) STATUS ,DECODE(TRIM(STATUSDATE_E),NULL,STATUSDATE_S,'',STATUSDATE_S,STATUSDATE_E) STATUSDATE ,DECODE(TRIM(STATUSDATE_S),NULL,'000000','','000000',STATUSDATE_S) STATUSDATESORT ,CRTDT_E CRTDTSORT FROM NBSCHOOL T WHERE TRIM(KEY) = #key:VARCHAR# AND STATUSDATE_E = (SELECT MAX(TO_NUMBER(STATUSDATE_E)) FROM NBSCHOOL WHERE TRIM(KEY) = #key:VARCHAR# AND STATUS_E IS NOT NULL AND DELFLG IS NULL) AND STATUS_E IS NOT NULL AND STATUSDATE_E = #statusDate_S:VARCHAR# AND DELFLG IS NULL ORDER BY STATUSDATESORT DESC,CRTDTSORT DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT t.APNO, t.COMMZIP, t.COMMADDR, t.EVTNAME, t.EVTIDNNO, t.EVTBRDATE, t.EVTDIEDATE, t.APPDATE, t.PAYYMS, t.EVTJOBDATE, t.MARGINAMT, t.ONCEPAYM, t.ONCEISSUEAMT, t.ANNUAMT, (SELECT SUM(T2.BEFISSUEAMT) AS BEFISSUEAMT FROM BADAPR T2 WHERE T2.APNO = T.APNO AND T2.SEQNO = '0000' AND T2.ISSUYM = T.ISSUYM AND T2.VERISEQ = (SELECT MAX(TO_NUMBER(A.VERISEQ)) FROM BADAPR A WHERE A.APNO = T.APNO AND A.ISSUYM = T.ISSUYM) AND T2.ISSUEAMT > 0) AS BEFISSUEAMT, t1.NOLDTY, t1.NOLDTM, t.DUPEIDNNOMK, t.ISSUYM, '001' AS "NOTIFYFORM", SUBSTR(t.APNO, 1, 1) AS "PAYTYPE", t.GRDNAME, t.BENNAME AS "BENNAME", t.EVTSEX AS "BENSEX", t.SEQNO AS "SEQNO", (SELECT B1.PRPNO FROM BCCMF09 B1
WHERE NVL(TRIM(TAL20), ' ') <> '0099'
AND B1.INSKD = '1' AND (B1.PAYTYP || B1.GROUPMK) LIKE (SUBSTR(t.APNO, 1, 2) || '%') AND ((SUBSTR(t.APNO, 12, 1) IN (TAL11, TAL12, TAL13, TAL14, TAL15))
OR (SUBSTR(B1.TAL20, 1, 2) <= SUBSTR(t.APNO, 11, 2) AND
SUBSTR(TAL20, 3, 2) >= SUBSTR(t.APNO, 11, 2)) OR (SUBSTR(t.APNO, 11, 2) IN (B1.TAL21, B1.TAL22, B1.TAL23, B1.TAL24, B1.TAL25)))
AND (TRIM(B1.STATUS) IS NULL OR B1.STATUS <> 'D')) AS "PRPNO"
FROM BAAPPBASE t, BADAPR t1 WHERE t.APNO LIKE #payCode:VARCHAR# || '%' AND t.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND t.SEQNO = '0000' AND (t.MARGINAMT = 0 OR t.MARGINAMT IS NULL)
AND (t.EVTDIEDATE IS NOT NULL OR TRIM(t.EVTDIEDATE) <> '')
AND t1.APNO = t.APNO AND t1.SEQNO = '0000' AND t1.ISSUYM = t.ISSUYM AND t1.PAYYM = t.PAYYM AND t1.PAYKIND = t.PAYKIND AND t1.VERISEQ = (SELECT MAX(TO_NUMBER(t2.VERISEQ)) FROM BADAPR t2 WHERE t2.APNO = t.APNO AND t2.ISSUYM = t.ISSUYM AND t2.PAYYM = t.PAYYM AND t2.PAYKIND = t.PAYKIND)

SELECT t.APNO, t.COMMZIP, t.COMMADDR, t.EVTNAME, t.EVTIDNNO, t.EVTBRDATE, t.EVTDIEDATE, t.APPDATE, t.PAYYMS, t.EVTJOBDATE, t.MARGINAMT, t.ONCEPAYM, t.ONCEISSUEAMT, t.ANNUAMT, (SELECT SUM(T2.BEFISSUEAMT) AS BEFISSUEAMT FROM BADAPR T2 WHERE T2.APNO = T.APNO AND T2.SEQNO = '0000' AND T2.ISSUYM = T.ISSUYM AND T2.VERISEQ = (SELECT MAX(TO_NUMBER(A.VERISEQ)) FROM BADAPR A WHERE A.APNO = T.APNO AND A.ISSUYM = T.ISSUYM) AND T2.ISSUEAMT > 0) AS BEFISSUEAMT, t1.NOLDTY, t1.NOLDTM, t.DUPEIDNNOMK, t.ISSUYM, '002' AS "NOTIFYFORM", SUBSTR(t.APNO, 1, 1) AS "PAYTYPE", t.GRDNAME, t.BENNAME AS "BENNAME", t.EVTSEX AS "BENSEX", t.SEQNO AS "SEQNO", (SELECT B1.PRPNO FROM BCCMF09 B1
WHERE NVL(TRIM(TAL20), ' ') <> '0099'
AND B1.INSKD = '1' AND (B1.PAYTYP || B1.GROUPMK) LIKE (SUBSTR(t.APNO, 1, 2) || '%') AND ((SUBSTR(t.APNO, 12, 1) IN (TAL11, TAL12, TAL13, TAL14, TAL15))
OR (SUBSTR(B1.TAL20, 1, 2) <= SUBSTR(t.APNO, 11, 2) AND
SUBSTR(TAL20, 3, 2) >= SUBSTR(t.APNO, 11, 2)) OR (SUBSTR(t.APNO, 11, 2) IN (B1.TAL21, B1.TAL22, B1.TAL23, B1.TAL24, B1.TAL25)))
AND (TRIM(B1.STATUS) IS NULL OR B1.STATUS <> 'D')) AS "PRPNO"
FROM BAAPPBASE t, BADAPR t1 WHERE t.APNO LIKE #payCode:VARCHAR# || '%' AND t.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND t.SEQNO = '0000' AND t.MARGINAMT > 0
AND (t.EVTDIEDATE IS NOT NULL OR TRIM(t.EVTDIEDATE) <> '')
AND t1.APNO = t.APNO AND t1.SEQNO = '0000' AND t1.ISSUYM = t.ISSUYM AND t1.PAYYM = t.PAYYM AND t1.PAYKIND = t.PAYKIND AND t1.VERISEQ = (SELECT MAX(TO_NUMBER(t2.VERISEQ)) FROM BADAPR t2 WHERE t2.APNO = t.APNO AND t2.ISSUYM = t.ISSUYM AND t2.PAYYM = t.PAYYM AND t2.PAYKIND = t.PAYKIND)

SELECT T1.APNO ,T1.EVTIDNNO ,T1.EVTNAME ,T1.EVTBRDATE ,T1.APPDATE ,T1.EVTJOBDATE ,T2.ISSUYM ,T2.PAYYM ,T2.CHKDATE ,T2.APLPAYDATE ,T2.REMITDATE ,T2.SEQNO ,T1.BENNAME ,T1.BENIDNNO ,T1.BENEVTREL ,T2.ISSUEAMT ,T2.APLPAYAMT ,T2.MTESTMK ,T2.BAAPPBASEID FROM BAAPPBASE T1, BADAPR T2 WHERE T1.APNO = T2.APNO AND T1.SEQNO = T2.SEQNO AND T1.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND T2.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND (TRIM(T2.APLPAYMK) IS NULL OR NVL(T2.APLPAYMK,' ') = ' ') AND (TRIM(T2.APLPAYDATE) IS NULL OR NVL(T2.APLPAYDATE,' ') = ' ') AND (TRIM(T2.REMITMK) IS NULL OR NVL(T2.REMITMK,' ') = ' ') AND (TRIM(T2.REMITDATE) IS NULL OR NVL(T2.REMITDATE,' ') = ' ') AND (TRIM(T2.GENMEDDATE) IS NULL OR NVL(T2.GENMEDDATE,' ') = ' ') AND T2.VERISEQ = (SELECT MAX(TO_NUMBER(T3.VERISEQ)) FROM BADAPR T3 WHERE T3.APNO = T1.APNO AND T3.ISSUYM = T2.ISSUYM) ORDER BY T1.APNO,T2.PAYYM,T1.SEQNO

SELECT T1.APNO ,T1.EVTIDNNO ,T1.EVTNAME ,T1.EVTBRDATE ,T1.APPDATE ,T1.EVTJOBDATE ,T2.ISSUYM ,T2.PAYYM ,T2.CHKDATE ,T2.APLPAYDATE ,T2.REMITDATE ,T2.SEQNO ,T1.BENNAME ,T1.BENIDNNO ,T1.BENEVTREL ,T2.ISSUEAMT ,T2.APLPAYAMT ,T2.MTESTMK ,T2.BAAPPBASEID FROM BAAPPBASE T1, BADAPR T2 WHERE T1.APNO = T2.APNO AND T1.SEQNO = T2.SEQNO AND T1.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND T2.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND NVL(T2.MANPAYCHGMK,' ') = 'Y' AND T2.VERISEQ = (SELECT MAX(TO_NUMBER(T3.VERISEQ)) FROM BADAPR T3 WHERE T3.APNO = T1.APNO AND T3.ISSUYM = T2.ISSUYM) ORDER BY T1.APNO,T2.PAYYM,T1.SEQNO

SELECT T1.APNO ,T1.EVTIDNNO ,T1.EVTNAME ,T1.EVTBRDATE ,T1.APPDATE ,T1.EVTJOBDATE ,T2.ISSUYM ,T2.PAYYM ,T2.CHKDATE ,T2.APLPAYDATE ,T2.REMITDATE ,T2.SEQNO ,T1.BENNAME ,T1.BENIDNNO ,T1.BENEVTREL ,T2.ISSUEAMT ,T2.APLPAYAMT ,T2.MTESTMK ,T2.BAAPPBASEID FROM BAAPPBASE T1, BADAPR T2 WHERE T1.APNO = T2.APNO AND T1.SEQNO = T2.SEQNO AND T1.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND T2.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND (TRIM(T2.APLPAYMK) IS NULL OR NVL(T2.APLPAYMK,' ') = ' ') AND (TRIM(T2.APLPAYDATE) IS NULL OR NVL(T2.APLPAYDATE,' ') = ' ') AND T2.VERISEQ = (SELECT MAX(TO_NUMBER(T3.VERISEQ)) FROM BADAPR T3 WHERE T3.APNO = T1.APNO AND T3.ISSUYM = T2.ISSUYM) ORDER BY T1.APNO,T2.PAYYM,T1.SEQNO
sqlMap.update: UPDATE BAAPPBASE SET CASEMK = 'D', UPDUSER = #updUser:VARCHAR#, UPDTIME = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') WHERE APNO = #apno:VARCHAR# AND SEQNO LIKE #seqno:VARCHAR# || '%'
sqlMap.select: SELECT BAAPNOK3.NEXTVAL AS BAKAPNO FROM DUAL
